verses.translation: No burdened soul can carry the burden of another. Even if one weighted down calls for help with its burden, nothing can be lifted from it, even if they were related. You are to warn those who fear their Lord inwardly, and perform the prayer. He who purifies himself purifies himself for his own good. To God is the ultimate return.

verses.arabic: وَمَا يَسْتَوِى ٱلْأَعْمَىٰ وَٱلْبَصِيرُ
verses.translation: Not equal are the blind and the seeing.

verses.arabic: وَلَا ٱلظُّلُمَٰتُ وَلَا ٱلنُّورُ
verses.translation: Nor are the darkness and the light.

verses.arabic: وَلَا ٱلظِّلُّ وَلَا ٱلْحَرُورُ
verses.translation: Nor are the shade and the torrid heat.

verses.arabic: وَمَا يَسْتَوِى ٱلْأَحْيَآءُ وَلَا ٱلْأَمْوَٰتُ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُسْمِعُ مَن يَشَآءُ ۖ وَمَآ أَنتَ بِمُسْمِعٍۢ مَّن فِى ٱلْقُبُورِ
verses.translation: Nor are equal the living and the dead. God causes whomever He wills to hear, but you cannot make those in the graves hear.

verses.arabic: إِنْ أَنتَ إِلَّا نَذِيرٌ
verses.translation: You are only a warner.

verses.arabic: إِنَّآ أَرْسَلْنَٰكَ بِٱلْحَقِّ بَشِيرًۭا وَنَذِيرًۭا ۚ وَإِن مِّنْ أُمَّةٍ إِلَّا خَلَا فِيهَا نَذِيرٌۭ
verses.translation: We sent you with the truth; a bearer of good news, and a warner. There is no community but a warner has passed through it.

verses.arabic: وَإِن يُكَذِّبُوكَ فَقَدْ كَذَّبَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ جَآءَتْهُمْ رُسُلُهُم بِٱلْبَيِّنَٰتِ وَبِٱلزُّبُرِ وَبِٱلْكِتَٰبِ ٱلْمُنِيرِ
verses.translation: If they disbelieve you, those before them also disbelieved. Their messengers came to them with the clear proofs, with the Psalms, and with the Enlightening Scripture.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ أَخَذْتُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ ۖ فَكَيْفَ كَانَ نَكِيرِ
verses.translation: Then I seized those who disbelieved-so how was My rejection?

verses.arabic: أَلَمْ تَرَ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ أَنزَلَ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءًۭ فَأَخْرَجْنَا بِهِۦ ثَمَرَٰتٍۢ مُّخْتَلِفًا أَلْوَٰنُهَا ۚ وَمِنَ ٱلْجِبَالِ جُدَدٌۢ بِيضٌۭ وَحُمْرٌۭ مُّخْتَلِفٌ أَلْوَٰنُهَا وَغَرَابِيبُ سُودٌۭ
verses.translation: Have you not seen that God sends down water from the sky? With it We produce fruits of various colors. And in the mountains are streaks of white and red-varying in their hue-and pitch-black.

verses.arabic: وَمِنَ ٱلنَّاسِ وَٱلدَّوَآبِّ وَٱلْأَنْعَٰمِ مُخْتَلِفٌ أَلْوَٰنُهُۥ كَذَٰلِكَ ۗ إِنَّمَا يَخْشَى ٱللَّهَ مِنْ عِبَادِهِ ٱلْعُلَمَٰٓؤُا۟ ۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَزِيزٌ غَفُورٌ
verses.translation: Likewise, human beings, animals, and livestock come in various colors. From among His servants, the learned fear God. God is Almighty, Oft-Forgiving.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يَتْلُونَ كِتَٰبَ ٱللَّهِ وَأَقَامُوا۟ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَأَنفَقُوا۟ مِمَّا رَزَقْنَٰهُمْ سِرًّۭا وَعَلَانِيَةًۭ يَرْجُونَ تِجَٰرَةًۭ لَّن تَبُورَ
verses.translation: Those who recite the Book of God, and perform the prayer, and spend of what We have provided for them, secretly and publicly, expect a trade that will not fail.

verses.arabic: لِيُوَفِّيَهُمْ أُجُورَهُمْ وَيَزِيدَهُم مِّن فَضْلِهِۦٓ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ غَفُورٌۭ شَكُورٌۭ
verses.translation: He will pay them their dues in full, and will increase them from His bounty. He is Forgiving and Appreciative.

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِىٓ أَوْحَيْنَآ إِلَيْكَ مِنَ ٱلْكِتَٰبِ هُوَ ٱلْحَقُّ مُصَدِّقًۭا لِّمَا بَيْنَ يَدَيْهِ ۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ بِعِبَادِهِۦ لَخَبِيرٌۢ بَصِيرٌۭ
verses.translation: What We inspired in you, of the Book, is the truth, confirming what preceded it. God is Well-Informed of His servants, All-Seeing.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ أَوْرَثْنَا ٱلْكِتَٰبَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱصْطَفَيْنَا مِنْ عِبَادِنَا ۖ فَمِنْهُمْ ظَالِمٌۭ لِّنَفْسِهِۦ وَمِنْهُم مُّقْتَصِدٌۭ وَمِنْهُمْ سَابِقٌۢ بِٱلْخَيْرَٰتِ بِإِذْنِ ٱللَّهِ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلْفَضْلُ ٱلْكَبِيرُ
verses.translation: Then We passed the Book to those of Our servants whom We chose. Some of them wrong their souls, and some follow a middle course, and some are in the foremost in good deeds by God's leave; that is the greatest blessing.

verses.arabic: جَنَّٰتُ عَدْنٍۢ يَدْخُلُونَهَا يُحَلَّوْنَ فِيهَا مِنْ أَسَاوِرَ مِن ذَهَبٍۢ وَلُؤْلُؤًۭا ۖ وَلِبَاسُهُمْ فِيهَا حَرِيرٌۭ
verses.translation: The Gardens of Eden, which they will enter. They will be adorned therein with gold bracelets and pearls, and their garments therein will be of silk.

verses.arabic: وَقَالُوا۟ ٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَذْهَبَ عَنَّا ٱلْحَزَنَ ۖ إِنَّ رَبَّنَا لَغَفُورٌۭ شَكُورٌ
verses.translation: And they will say, "Praise God, who has lifted all sorrow from us. Our Lord is Most Forgiving, Most Appreciative.

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِىٓ أَحَلَّنَا دَارَ ٱلْمُقَامَةِ مِن فَضْلِهِۦ لَا يَمَسُّنَا فِيهَا نَصَبٌۭ وَلَا يَمَسُّنَا فِيهَا لُغُوبٌۭ
verses.translation: He Who settled us in the Home of Permanence, by His grace, where boredom will not touch us, and fatigue will not afflict us."

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ لَهُمْ نَارُ جَهَنَّمَ لَا يُقْضَىٰ عَلَيْهِمْ فَيَمُوتُوا۟ وَلَا يُخَفَّفُ عَنْهُم مِّنْ عَذَابِهَا ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِى كُلَّ كَفُورٍۢ
verses.translation: As for those who disbelieve, for them is the Fire of Hell, wherein they will never be finished off and die, nor will its punishment be lightened for them. Thus We will repay every ingrate.

verses.arabic: وَهُمْ يَصْطَرِخُونَ فِيهَا رَبَّنَآ أَخْرِجْنَا نَعْمَلْ صَٰلِحًا غَيْرَ ٱلَّذِى كُنَّا نَعْمَلُ ۚ أَوَلَمْ نُعَمِّرْكُم مَّا يَتَذَكَّرُ فِيهِ مَن تَذَكَّرَ وَجَآءَكُمُ ٱلنَّذِيرُ ۖ فَذُوقُوا۟ فَمَا لِلظَّٰلِمِينَ مِن نَّصِيرٍ
verses.translation: And they will scream therein, "Our Lord, let us out, and we will act righteously, differently from the way we used to act." Did We not give you a life long enough, in which anyone who wanted to understand would have understood? And the warner did come to you. So taste. The evildoers will have no helper.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَٰلِمُ غَيْبِ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ عَلِيمٌۢ بِذَاتِ ٱلصُّدُورِ
verses.translation: God is the Knower of the future of the heavens and the earth. He knows what the hearts contain.

verses.arabic: هُوَ ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَكُمْ خَلَٰٓئِفَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ فَمَن كَفَرَ فَعَلَيْهِ كُفْرُهُۥ ۖ وَلَا يَزِيدُ ٱلْكَٰفِرِينَ كُفْرُهُمْ عِندَ رَبِّهِمْ إِلَّا مَقْتًۭا ۖ وَلَا يَزِيدُ ٱلْكَٰفِرِينَ كُفْرُهُمْ إِلَّا خَسَارًۭا
verses.translation: It is He who made you successors on earth. Whoever disbelieves, his disbelief will recoil upon him. The disbelief of the disbelievers adds only to their Lord's disfavor of them. The disbelief of the disbelievers adds only to their perdition.

verses.arabic: قُلْ أَرَءَيْتُمْ شُرَكَآءَكُمُ ٱلَّذِينَ تَدْعُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ أَرُونِى مَاذَا خَلَقُوا۟ مِنَ ٱلْأَرْضِ أَمْ لَهُمْ شِرْكٌۭ فِى ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ أَمْ ءَاتَيْنَٰهُمْ كِتَٰبًۭا فَهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَيِّنَتٍۢ مِّنْهُ ۚ بَلْ إِن يَعِدُ ٱلظَّٰلِمُونَ بَعْضُهُم بَعْضًا إِلَّا غُرُورًا
verses.translation: Say, "Have you considered those partners of yours that you worship instead of God? Show me what they have created on earth. Or do they have any share in the heavens?" Or have We given them a book whose clear teachings they follow? In fact, the wrongdoers promise one another nothing but delusions.

verses.arabic: ۞ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُمْسِكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ أَن تَزُولَا ۚ وَلَئِن زَالَتَآ إِنْ أَمْسَكَهُمَا مِنْ أَحَدٍۢ مِّنۢ بَعْدِهِۦٓ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ حَلِيمًا غَفُورًۭا
verses.translation: God holds the heavens and the earth, lest they fall apart. And were they to fall apart, there is none to hold them together except He. He is Most Clement, Most Forgiving.

verses.arabic: وَأَقْسَمُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ جَهْدَ أَيْمَٰنِهِمْ لَئِن جَآءَهُمْ نَذِيرٌۭ لَّيَكُونُنَّ أَهْدَىٰ مِنْ إِحْدَى ٱلْأُمَمِ ۖ فَلَمَّا جَآءَهُمْ نَذِيرٌۭ مَّا زَادَهُمْ إِلَّا نُفُورًا
verses.translation: And they swore by God with their solemn oaths, that if a warner came to them, they would be more guided than any other people. Yet when a warner came to them, it only increased them in aversion.

verses.arabic: ٱسْتِكْبَارًۭا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَكْرَ ٱلسَّيِّئِ ۚ وَلَا يَحِيقُ ٱلْمَكْرُ ٱلسَّيِّئُ إِلَّا بِأَهْلِهِۦ ۚ فَهَلْ يَنظُرُونَ إِلَّا سُنَّتَ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ ۚ فَلَن تَجِدَ لِسُنَّتِ ٱللَّهِ تَبْدِيلًۭا ۖ وَلَن تَجِدَ لِسُنَّتِ ٱللَّهِ تَحْوِيلًا
verses.translation: Priding themselves on earth, and scheming evil. But evil scheming overwhelms none but its authors. Do they expect anything but the precedent of the ancients? You will not find any change in God's practice, and you will not find any substitute to God's practice.

verses.arabic: أَوَلَمْ يَسِيرُوا۟ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ فَيَنظُرُوا۟ كَيْفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ وَكَانُوٓا۟ أَشَدَّ مِنْهُمْ قُوَّةًۭ ۚ وَمَا كَانَ ٱللَّهُ لِيُعْجِزَهُۥ مِن شَىْءٍۢ فِى ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَلَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ عَلِيمًۭا قَدِيرًۭا
verses.translation: Have they not journeyed in the land and observed the fate of those who preceded them? They were superior to them in strength. But nothing can defeat God in the heavens or on Earth. He is indeed Omniscient and Omnipotent.

verses.arabic: وَلَوْ يُؤَاخِذُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلنَّاسَ بِمَا كَسَبُوا۟ مَا تَرَكَ عَلَىٰ ظَهْرِهَا مِن دَآبَّةٍۢ وَلَٰكِن يُؤَخِّرُهُمْ إِلَىٰٓ أَجَلٍۢ مُّسَمًّۭى ۖ فَإِذَا جَآءَ أَجَلُهُمْ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ بِعِبَادِهِۦ بَصِيرًۢا
verses.translation: If God were to punish the people for what they have earned, He would not leave a single living creature on its surface. But He defers them until a stated time. Then, when their time has arrived-God is Observant of His creatures.

verses.arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.translation: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.

verses.arabic: يسٓ
verses.translation: Ya, Seen.

verses.arabic: وَٱلْقُرْءَانِ ٱلْحَكِيمِ
verses.translation: By the Wise Quran.

verses.arabic: إِنَّكَ لَمِنَ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.translation: You are one of the messengers.

verses.arabic: عَلَىٰ صِرَٰطٍۢ مُّسْتَقِيمٍۢ
verses.translation: On a straight path.

verses.arabic: تَنزِيلَ ٱلْعَزِيزِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ
verses.translation: The revelation of the Almighty, the Merciful.

verses.arabic: لِتُنذِرَ قَوْمًۭا مَّآ أُنذِرَ ءَابَآؤُهُمْ فَهُمْ غَٰفِلُونَ
verses.translation: To warn a people whose ancestors were not warned, and so they are unaware.

verses.arabic: لَقَدْ حَقَّ ٱلْقَوْلُ عَلَىٰٓ أَكْثَرِهِمْ فَهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.translation: The Word was realized against most of them, for they do not believe.

verses.arabic: إِنَّا جَعَلْنَا فِىٓ أَعْنَٰقِهِمْ أَغْلَٰلًۭا فَهِىَ إِلَى ٱلْأَذْقَانِ فَهُم مُّقْمَحُونَ
verses.translation: We placed shackles around their necks, up to their chins, so they are stiff-necked.

verses.arabic: وَجَعَلْنَا مِنۢ بَيْنِ أَيْدِيهِمْ سَدًّۭا وَمِنْ خَلْفِهِمْ سَدًّۭا فَأَغْشَيْنَٰهُمْ فَهُمْ لَا يُبْصِرُونَ
verses.translation: And We placed a barrier in front of them, and a barrier behind them, and We have enshrouded them, so they cannot see.

verses.arabic: وَسَوَآءٌ عَلَيْهِمْ ءَأَنذَرْتَهُمْ أَمْ لَمْ تُنذِرْهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.translation: It is the same for them, whether you warn them, or do not warn them-they will not believe.

verses.arabic: إِنَّمَا تُنذِرُ مَنِ ٱتَّبَعَ ٱلذِّكْرَ وَخَشِىَ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنَ بِٱلْغَيْبِ ۖ فَبَشِّرْهُ بِمَغْفِرَةٍۢ وَأَجْرٍۢ كَرِيمٍ
verses.translation: You warn only him who follows the Message, and fears the Most Gracious inwardly. So give him good news of forgiveness, and a generous reward.

verses.arabic: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نُحْىِ ٱلْمَوْتَىٰ وَنَكْتُبُ مَا قَدَّمُوا۟ وَءَاثَٰرَهُمْ ۚ وَكُلَّ شَىْءٍ أَحْصَيْنَٰهُ فِىٓ إِمَامٍۢ مُّبِينٍۢ
verses.translation: It is We who revive the dead; and We write down what they have forwarded, and their traces. We have tallied all things in a Clear Record.

verses.arabic: وَٱضْرِبْ لَهُم مَّثَلًا أَصْحَٰبَ ٱلْقَرْيَةِ إِذْ جَآءَهَا ٱلْمُرْسَلُونَ
verses.translation: And cite for them the parable of the landlords of the town-when the messengers came to it.

verses.arabic: إِذْ أَرْسَلْنَآ إِلَيْهِمُ ٱثْنَيْنِ فَكَذَّبُوهُمَا فَعَزَّزْنَا بِثَالِثٍۢ فَقَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّآ إِلَيْكُم مُّرْسَلُونَ
verses.translation: We sent them two messengers, but they denied them both, so We reinforced them with a third. They said, "We are messengers to you."

verses.arabic: قَالُوا۟ مَآ أَنتُمْ إِلَّا بَشَرٌۭ مِّثْلُنَا وَمَآ أَنزَلَ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنُ مِن شَىْءٍ إِنْ أَنتُمْ إِلَّا تَكْذِبُونَ
verses.translation: They said, "You are nothing but humans like us, and the Gracious did not send down anything; you are only lying."

verses.arabic: قَالُوا۟ رَبُّنَا يَعْلَمُ إِنَّآ إِلَيْكُمْ لَمُرْسَلُونَ
verses.translation: They said, "Our Lord knows that we are messengers to you.

verses.arabic: وَمَا عَلَيْنَآ إِلَّا ٱلْبَلَٰغُ ٱلْمُبِينُ
verses.translation: And our only duty is clear communication."

verses.arabic: قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّا تَطَيَّرْنَا بِكُمْ ۖ لَئِن لَّمْ تَنتَهُوا۟ لَنَرْجُمَنَّكُمْ وَلَيَمَسَّنَّكُم مِّنَّا عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌۭ
verses.translation: They said, "We see an evil omen in you; if you do not give up, we will stone you, and a painful punishment from us will befall you."

verses.arabic: قَالُوا۟ طَٰٓئِرُكُم مَّعَكُمْ ۚ أَئِن ذُكِّرْتُم ۚ بَلْ أَنتُمْ قَوْمٌۭ مُّسْرِفُونَ
verses.translation: They said, "Your evil omen is upon you. Is it because you were reminded? But you are an extravagant people."

verses.arabic: وَجَآءَ مِنْ أَقْصَا ٱلْمَدِينَةِ رَجُلٌۭ يَسْعَىٰ قَالَ يَٰقَوْمِ ٱتَّبِعُوا۟ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.translation: Then a man came running from the remotest part of the city. He said, "O my people, follow the messengers.

verses.arabic: ٱتَّبِعُوا۟ مَن لَّا يَسْـَٔلُكُمْ أَجْرًۭا وَهُم مُّهْتَدُونَ
verses.translation: Follow those who ask you of no wage, and are themselves guided.

verses.arabic: وَمَا لِىَ لَآ أَعْبُدُ ٱلَّذِى فَطَرَنِى وَإِلَيْهِ تُرْجَعُونَ
verses.translation: "And why should I not worship Him Who created me, and to Whom you will be returned?

verses.arabic: ءَأَتَّخِذُ مِن دُونِهِۦٓ ءَالِهَةً إِن يُرِدْنِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنُ بِضُرٍّۢ لَّا تُغْنِ عَنِّى شَفَٰعَتُهُمْ شَيْـًۭٔا وَلَا يُنقِذُونِ
verses.translation: Shall I take other gods instead of Him? If the Merciful desires harm for me, their intercession will not avail me at all, nor will they save me.

verses.arabic: إِنِّىٓ إِذًۭا لَّفِى ضَلَٰلٍۢ مُّبِينٍ
verses.translation: In that case, I would be completely lost.

verses.arabic: إِنِّىٓ ءَامَنتُ بِرَبِّكُمْ فَٱسْمَعُونِ
verses.translation: I have believed in your Lord, so listen to me."

verses.arabic: قِيلَ ٱدْخُلِ ٱلْجَنَّةَ ۖ قَالَ يَٰلَيْتَ قَوْمِى يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: It was said, "Enter Paradise." He said, "If only my people knew.

verses.arabic: بِمَا غَفَرَ لِى رَبِّى وَجَعَلَنِى مِنَ ٱلْمُكْرَمِينَ
verses.translation: How my Lord has forgiven me, and made me one of the honored."

verses.arabic: ۞ وَمَآ أَنزَلْنَا عَلَىٰ قَوْمِهِۦ مِنۢ بَعْدِهِۦ مِن جُندٍۢ مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَمَا كُنَّا مُنزِلِينَ
verses.translation: After him, We sent down no hosts from heaven to his people; nor would We ever send any down.

verses.arabic: إِن كَانَتْ إِلَّا صَيْحَةًۭ وَٰحِدَةًۭ فَإِذَا هُمْ خَٰمِدُونَ
verses.translation: It was just one Cry, and they were stilled.

verses.arabic: يَٰحَسْرَةً عَلَى ٱلْعِبَادِ ۚ مَا يَأْتِيهِم مِّن رَّسُولٍ إِلَّا كَانُوا۟ بِهِۦ يَسْتَهْزِءُونَ
verses.translation: Alas for the servants. No messenger ever came to them, but they ridiculed him.

verses.arabic: أَلَمْ يَرَوْا۟ كَمْ أَهْلَكْنَا قَبْلَهُم مِّنَ ٱلْقُرُونِ أَنَّهُمْ إِلَيْهِمْ لَا يَرْجِعُونَ
verses.translation: Have they not considered how many generations We destroyed before them; and that unto them they will not return?

verses.arabic: وَإِن كُلٌّۭ لَّمَّا جَمِيعٌۭ لَّدَيْنَا مُحْضَرُونَ
verses.translation: All of them, every single one of them, will be arraigned before Us.

verses.arabic: وَءَايَةٌۭ لَّهُمُ ٱلْأَرْضُ ٱلْمَيْتَةُ أَحْيَيْنَٰهَا وَأَخْرَجْنَا مِنْهَا حَبًّۭا فَمِنْهُ يَأْكُلُونَ
verses.translation: And there is a sign for them in the dead land: We give it life, and produce from it grains from which they eat.

verses.arabic: وَجَعَلْنَا فِيهَا جَنَّٰتٍۢ مِّن نَّخِيلٍۢ وَأَعْنَٰبٍۢ وَفَجَّرْنَا فِيهَا مِنَ ٱلْعُيُونِ
verses.translation: And We place in it gardens of palm-trees and vines, and cause springs to gush out of it.

verses.arabic: لِيَأْكُلُوا۟ مِن ثَمَرِهِۦ وَمَا عَمِلَتْهُ أَيْدِيهِمْ ۖ أَفَلَا يَشْكُرُونَ
verses.translation: That they may eat from its fruits, although their hands did not make it. Will they not be appreciative?

verses.arabic: سُبْحَٰنَ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ ٱلْأَزْوَٰجَ كُلَّهَا مِمَّا تُنۢبِتُ ٱلْأَرْضُ وَمِنْ أَنفُسِهِمْ وَمِمَّا لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: Glory be to Him who created all the pairs; of what the earth produces, and of their own selves, and of what they do not know.

verses.arabic: وَءَايَةٌۭ لَّهُمُ ٱلَّيْلُ نَسْلَخُ مِنْهُ ٱلنَّهَارَ فَإِذَا هُم مُّظْلِمُونَ
verses.translation: Another sign for them is the night: We strip the day out of it-and they are in darkness.

verses.arabic: وَٱلشَّمْسُ تَجْرِى لِمُسْتَقَرٍّۢ لَّهَا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ تَقْدِيرُ ٱلْعَزِيزِ ٱلْعَلِيمِ
verses.translation: And the sun runs towards its destination. Such is the design of the Almighty, the All-Knowing.

verses.arabic: وَٱلْقَمَرَ قَدَّرْنَٰهُ مَنَازِلَ حَتَّىٰ عَادَ كَٱلْعُرْجُونِ ٱلْقَدِيمِ
verses.translation: And the moon: We have disposed it in phases, until it returns like the old twig.

verses.arabic: لَا ٱلشَّمْسُ يَنۢبَغِى لَهَآ أَن تُدْرِكَ ٱلْقَمَرَ وَلَا ٱلَّيْلُ سَابِقُ ٱلنَّهَارِ ۚ وَكُلٌّۭ فِى فَلَكٍۢ يَسْبَحُونَ
verses.translation: The sun is not to overtake the moon, nor is the night to outpace the day. Each floats in an orbit.

verses.arabic: وَءَايَةٌۭ لَّهُمْ أَنَّا حَمَلْنَا ذُرِّيَّتَهُمْ فِى ٱلْفُلْكِ ٱلْمَشْحُونِ
verses.translation: Another sign for them is that We carried their offspring in the laden Ark.

verses.arabic: وَخَلَقْنَا لَهُم مِّن مِّثْلِهِۦ مَا يَرْكَبُونَ
verses.translation: And We created for them the like of it, in which they ride.

verses.arabic: وَإِن نَّشَأْ نُغْرِقْهُمْ فَلَا صَرِيخَ لَهُمْ وَلَا هُمْ يُنقَذُونَ
verses.translation: If We will, We can drown them-with no screaming to be heard from them, nor will they be saved.

verses.arabic: إِلَّا رَحْمَةًۭ مِّنَّا وَمَتَٰعًا إِلَىٰ حِينٍۢ
verses.translation: Except by a mercy from Us, and enjoyment for a while.

verses.arabic: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ ٱتَّقُوا۟ مَا بَيْنَ أَيْدِيكُمْ وَمَا خَلْفَكُمْ لَعَلَّكُمْ تُرْحَمُونَ
verses.translation: Yet when it is said to them, "Beware of what lies before you, and what lies behind you, that you may receive mercy."

verses.arabic: وَمَا تَأْتِيهِم مِّنْ ءَايَةٍۢ مِّنْ ءَايَٰتِ رَبِّهِمْ إِلَّا كَانُوا۟ عَنْهَا مُعْرِضِينَ
verses.translation: Yet never came to them a sign of their Lord's signs, but they turned away from it.

verses.arabic: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمْ أَنفِقُوا۟ مِمَّا رَزَقَكُمُ ٱللَّهُ قَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ لِلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ أَنُطْعِمُ مَن لَّوْ يَشَآءُ ٱللَّهُ أَطْعَمَهُۥٓ إِنْ أَنتُمْ إِلَّا فِى ضَلَٰلٍۢ مُّبِينٍۢ
verses.translation: And when it is said to them, "Spend of what God has provided for you," those who disbelieve say to those who believe, "Shall we feed someone whom God could feed, if He so willed? You must be deeply misguided."

verses.arabic: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَٰذَا ٱلْوَعْدُ إِن كُنتُمْ صَٰدِقِينَ
verses.translation: And they say, "When will this promise be, if you are truthful?"

verses.arabic: مَا يَنظُرُونَ إِلَّا صَيْحَةًۭ وَٰحِدَةًۭ تَأْخُذُهُمْ وَهُمْ يَخِصِّمُونَ
verses.translation: All they can expect is a single blast, which will seize them while they feud.

verses.arabic: فَلَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ تَوْصِيَةًۭ وَلَآ إِلَىٰٓ أَهْلِهِمْ يَرْجِعُونَ
verses.translation: They will not be able to make a will, nor will they return to their families.

verses.arabic: وَنُفِخَ فِى ٱلصُّورِ فَإِذَا هُم مِّنَ ٱلْأَجْدَاثِ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِمْ يَنسِلُونَ
verses.translation: The Trumpet will be blown, then behold, they will rush from the tombs to their Lord.

verses.arabic: قَالُوا۟ يَٰوَيْلَنَا مَنۢ بَعَثَنَا مِن مَّرْقَدِنَا ۜ ۗ هَٰذَا مَا وَعَدَ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنُ وَصَدَقَ ٱلْمُرْسَلُونَ
verses.translation: They will say, "Woe to us! Who resurrected us from our resting-place?" This is what the Most Gracious had promised, and the messengers have spoken the truth."

verses.arabic: إِن كَانَتْ إِلَّا صَيْحَةًۭ وَٰحِدَةًۭ فَإِذَا هُمْ جَمِيعٌۭ لَّدَيْنَا مُحْضَرُونَ
verses.translation: It will be but a single scream; and behold, they will all be brought before Us.

verses.arabic: فَٱلْيَوْمَ لَا تُظْلَمُ نَفْسٌۭ شَيْـًۭٔا وَلَا تُجْزَوْنَ إِلَّا مَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.translation: On that Day, no soul will be wronged in the least, and you will be recompensed only for what you used to do.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ أَصْحَٰبَ ٱلْجَنَّةِ ٱلْيَوْمَ فِى شُغُلٍۢ فَٰكِهُونَ
verses.translation: The inhabitants of Paradise, on that Day, will be happily busy.

verses.arabic: هُمْ وَأَزْوَٰجُهُمْ فِى ظِلَٰلٍ عَلَى ٱلْأَرَآئِكِ مُتَّكِـُٔونَ
verses.translation: They and their spouses, in shades, reclining on couches.

verses.arabic: لَهُمْ فِيهَا فَٰكِهَةٌۭ وَلَهُم مَّا يَدَّعُونَ
verses.translation: They will have therein fruits. They will have whatever they call for.

verses.arabic: سَلَٰمٌۭ قَوْلًۭا مِّن رَّبٍّۢ رَّحِيمٍۢ
verses.translation: Peace-a saying from a Most Merciful Lord.

verses.arabic: وَٱمْتَٰزُوا۟ ٱلْيَوْمَ أَيُّهَا ٱلْمُجْرِمُونَ
verses.translation: But step aside today, you criminals.

verses.arabic: ۞ أَلَمْ أَعْهَدْ إِلَيْكُمْ يَٰبَنِىٓ ءَادَمَ أَن لَّا تَعْبُدُوا۟ ٱلشَّيْطَٰنَ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ لَكُمْ عَدُوٌّۭ مُّبِينٌۭ
verses.translation: Did I not covenant with you, O Children of Adam, that you shall not serve the devil? That he is your sworn enemy?

verses.arabic: وَأَنِ ٱعْبُدُونِى ۚ هَٰذَا صِرَٰطٌۭ مُّسْتَقِيمٌۭ
verses.translation: And that you shall serve Me? This is a straight path.

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ أَضَلَّ مِنكُمْ جِبِلًّۭا كَثِيرًا ۖ أَفَلَمْ تَكُونُوا۟ تَعْقِلُونَ
verses.translation: He has misled a great multitude of you. Did you not understand?

verses.arabic: هَٰذِهِۦ جَهَنَّمُ ٱلَّتِى كُنتُمْ تُوعَدُونَ
verses.translation: This is Hellfire, which you were promised.

verses.arabic: ٱصْلَوْهَا ٱلْيَوْمَ بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَكْفُرُونَ
verses.translation: Roast in it today, because you persistently disbelieved.

verses.arabic: ٱلْيَوْمَ نَخْتِمُ عَلَىٰٓ أَفْوَٰهِهِمْ وَتُكَلِّمُنَآ أَيْدِيهِمْ وَتَشْهَدُ أَرْجُلُهُم بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَكْسِبُونَ
verses.translation: On this Day, We will seal their mouths, and their hands will speak to Us, and their feet will testify to everything they had done.

verses.arabic: وَلَوْ نَشَآءُ لَطَمَسْنَا عَلَىٰٓ أَعْيُنِهِمْ فَٱسْتَبَقُوا۟ ٱلصِّرَٰطَ فَأَنَّىٰ يُبْصِرُونَ
verses.translation: If We will, We can blind their eyes as they rush towards the path-but how will they see?

verses.arabic: وَلَوْ نَشَآءُ لَمَسَخْنَٰهُمْ عَلَىٰ مَكَانَتِهِمْ فَمَا ٱسْتَطَٰعُوا۟ مُضِيًّۭا وَلَا يَرْجِعُونَ
verses.translation: And if We will, We can cripple them in their place; so they can neither move forward, nor go back.

verses.arabic: وَمَن نُّعَمِّرْهُ نُنَكِّسْهُ فِى ٱلْخَلْقِ ۖ أَفَلَا يَعْقِلُونَ
verses.translation: Whomever We grant old age, We reverse his development. Do they not understand?

verses.arabic: وَمَا عَلَّمْنَٰهُ ٱلشِّعْرَ وَمَا يَنۢبَغِى لَهُۥٓ ۚ إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكْرٌۭ وَقُرْءَانٌۭ مُّبِينٌۭ
verses.translation: We did not teach him poetry, nor is it proper for him. It is only a reminder, and a Clear Quran.

verses.arabic: لِّيُنذِرَ مَن كَانَ حَيًّۭا وَيَحِقَّ ٱلْقَوْلُ عَلَى ٱلْكَٰفِرِينَ
verses.translation: That he may warn whoever is alive, and prove the Word against the faithless.

verses.arabic: أَوَلَمْ يَرَوْا۟ أَنَّا خَلَقْنَا لَهُم مِّمَّا عَمِلَتْ أَيْدِينَآ أَنْعَٰمًۭا فَهُمْ لَهَا مَٰلِكُونَ
verses.translation: Have they not seen that We created for them, of Our Handiwork, livestock that they own?

verses.arabic: وَذَلَّلْنَٰهَا لَهُمْ فَمِنْهَا رَكُوبُهُمْ وَمِنْهَا يَأْكُلُونَ
verses.translation: And We subdued them for them. Some they ride, and some they eat.

verses.arabic: وَلَهُمْ فِيهَا مَنَٰفِعُ وَمَشَارِبُ ۖ أَفَلَا يَشْكُرُونَ
verses.translation: And they have in them other benefits, and drinks. Will they not give thanks?

verses.arabic: وَٱتَّخَذُوا۟ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ ءَالِهَةًۭ لَّعَلَّهُمْ يُنصَرُونَ
verses.translation: Yet they have taken to themselves gods other than God, that perhaps they may be helped.

verses.arabic: لَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ نَصْرَهُمْ وَهُمْ لَهُمْ جُندٌۭ مُّحْضَرُونَ
verses.translation: They cannot help them, although they are arrayed as troops for them.

verses.arabic: فَلَا يَحْزُنكَ قَوْلُهُمْ ۘ إِنَّا نَعْلَمُ مَا يُسِرُّونَ وَمَا يُعْلِنُونَ
verses.translation: So let their words not sadden you. We know what they conceal, and what they reveal.

verses.arabic: أَوَلَمْ يَرَ ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ أَنَّا خَلَقْنَٰهُ مِن نُّطْفَةٍۢ فَإِذَا هُوَ خَصِيمٌۭ مُّبِينٌۭ
verses.translation: Does the human being not consider that We created him from a seed? Yet he becomes a fierce adversary.

verses.arabic: وَضَرَبَ لَنَا مَثَلًۭا وَنَسِىَ خَلْقَهُۥ ۖ قَالَ مَن يُحْىِ ٱلْعِظَٰمَ وَهِىَ رَمِيمٌۭ
verses.translation: And he produces arguments against Us, and he forgets his own creation. He says, "Who will revive the bones when they have decayed?"

verses.arabic: قُلْ يُحْيِيهَا ٱلَّذِىٓ أَنشَأَهَآ أَوَّلَ مَرَّةٍۢ ۖ وَهُوَ بِكُلِّ خَلْقٍ عَلِيمٌ
verses.translation: Say, "He who initiated them in the first instance will revive them. He has knowledge of every creation."

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَ لَكُم مِّنَ ٱلشَّجَرِ ٱلْأَخْضَرِ نَارًۭا فَإِذَآ أَنتُم مِّنْهُ تُوقِدُونَ
verses.translation: He who produced fuel for you from the green trees, with which you kindle a fire.

verses.arabic: أَوَلَيْسَ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ بِقَٰدِرٍ عَلَىٰٓ أَن يَخْلُقَ مِثْلَهُم ۚ بَلَىٰ وَهُوَ ٱلْخَلَّٰقُ ٱلْعَلِيمُ
verses.translation: Is not He who created the heavens and the earth able to create the like of them? Certainly. He is the Supreme All-Knowing Creator.

verses.arabic: إِنَّمَآ أَمْرُهُۥٓ إِذَآ أَرَادَ شَيْـًٔا أَن يَقُولَ لَهُۥ كُن فَيَكُونُ
verses.translation: His command, when He wills a thing, is to say to it, "Be," and it comes to be.

verses.arabic: فَسُبْحَٰنَ ٱلَّذِى بِيَدِهِۦ مَلَكُوتُ كُلِّ شَىْءٍۢ وَإِلَيْهِ تُرْجَعُونَ
verses.translation: So glory be to Him in whose hand is the dominion of everything, and to Him you will be returned.

verses.arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.translation: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.

verses.arabic: وَٱلصَّٰٓفَّٰتِ صَفًّۭا
verses.translation: By the aligners aligning.

verses.arabic: فَٱلزَّٰجِرَٰتِ زَجْرًۭا
verses.translation: And the drivers driving.

verses.arabic: فَٱلتَّٰلِيَٰتِ ذِكْرًا
verses.translation: And the reciters of the Reminder.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ إِلَٰهَكُمْ لَوَٰحِدٌۭ
verses.translation: Your God is indeed One.

verses.arabic: رَّبُّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا وَرَبُّ ٱلْمَشَٰرِقِ
verses.translation: Lord of the heavens and the earth, and everything between them; and Lord of the Easts.

verses.arabic: إِنَّا زَيَّنَّا ٱلسَّمَآءَ ٱلدُّنْيَا بِزِينَةٍ ٱلْكَوَاكِبِ
verses.translation: We have adorned the lower heaven with the beauty of the planets.

verses.arabic: وَحِفْظًۭا مِّن كُلِّ شَيْطَٰنٍۢ مَّارِدٍۢ
verses.translation: And guarded it against every defiant devil.

verses.arabic: لَّا يَسَّمَّعُونَ إِلَى ٱلْمَلَإِ ٱلْأَعْلَىٰ وَيُقْذَفُونَ مِن كُلِّ جَانِبٍۢ
verses.translation: They cannot eavesdrop on the Supernal Elite, for they get bombarded from every side.

verses.arabic: دُحُورًۭا ۖ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابٌۭ وَاصِبٌ
verses.translation: Repelled-they will have a lingering torment.

verses.arabic: إِلَّا مَنْ خَطِفَ ٱلْخَطْفَةَ فَأَتْبَعَهُۥ شِهَابٌۭ ثَاقِبٌۭ
verses.translation: Except for him who snatches a fragment-he gets pursued by a piercing projectile.

verses.arabic: فَٱسْتَفْتِهِمْ أَهُمْ أَشَدُّ خَلْقًا أَم مَّنْ خَلَقْنَآ ۚ إِنَّا خَلَقْنَٰهُم مِّن طِينٍۢ لَّازِبٍۭ
verses.translation: Inquire of them, "Are they more difficult to create, or the others We created?" We created them from sticky clay.

verses.arabic: بَلْ عَجِبْتَ وَيَسْخَرُونَ
verses.translation: But you wonder, and they ridicule.

verses.arabic: وَإِذَا ذُكِّرُوا۟ لَا يَذْكُرُونَ
verses.translation: And when reminded, they pay no attention.

verses.arabic: وَإِذَا رَأَوْا۟ ءَايَةًۭ يَسْتَسْخِرُونَ
verses.translation: And when they see a sign, they ridicule.

verses.arabic: وَقَالُوٓا۟ إِنْ هَٰذَآ إِلَّا سِحْرٌۭ مُّبِينٌ
verses.translation: And they say, "This is nothing but plain magic.

verses.arabic: أَءِذَا مِتْنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابًۭا وَعِظَٰمًا أَءِنَّا لَمَبْعُوثُونَ
verses.translation: When we have died and become dust and bones, shall we be resurrected?

verses.arabic: أَوَءَابَآؤُنَا ٱلْأَوَّلُونَ
verses.translation: And our ancestors of old?"

verses.arabic: قُلْ نَعَمْ وَأَنتُمْ دَٰخِرُونَ
verses.translation: Say, "Yes indeed, and you will be totally subdued."

verses.arabic: فَإِنَّمَا هِىَ زَجْرَةٌۭ وَٰحِدَةٌۭ فَإِذَا هُمْ يَنظُرُونَ
verses.translation: It will be a single nudge, and they will be staring.

verses.arabic: وَقَالُوا۟ يَٰوَيْلَنَا هَٰذَا يَوْمُ ٱلدِّينِ
verses.translation: They will say, "Woe to us. This is the Day of Judgment."

verses.arabic: هَٰذَا يَوْمُ ٱلْفَصْلِ ٱلَّذِى كُنتُم بِهِۦ تُكَذِّبُونَ
verses.translation: "This is the Day of Separation which you used to deny.

verses.arabic: ۞ ٱحْشُرُوا۟ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ وَأَزْوَٰجَهُمْ وَمَا كَانُوا۟ يَعْبُدُونَ
verses.translation: Gather those who did wrong, and their mates, and what they used to worship.

verses.arabic: مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ فَٱهْدُوهُمْ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطِ ٱلْجَحِيمِ
verses.translation: Besides God, and lead them to the way to Hell.

verses.arabic: وَقِفُوهُمْ ۖ إِنَّهُم مَّسْـُٔولُونَ
verses.translation: And stop them. They are to be questioned."

verses.arabic: مَا لَكُمْ لَا تَنَاصَرُونَ
verses.translation: What is the matter with you? Why do you not help one another?

verses.arabic: بَلْ هُمُ ٱلْيَوْمَ مُسْتَسْلِمُونَ
verses.translation: In fact, on that Day, they will be submissive.

verses.arabic: وَأَقْبَلَ بَعْضُهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍۢ يَتَسَآءَلُونَ
verses.translation: They will come to one another, questioning one another.

verses.arabic: قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّكُمْ كُنتُمْ تَأْتُونَنَا عَنِ ٱلْيَمِينِ
verses.translation: They will say, "You used to come at us from the right."

verses.arabic: قَالُوا۟ بَل لَّمْ تَكُونُوا۟ مُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: They will say, "You yourselves were not believers.

verses.arabic: وَمَا كَانَ لَنَا عَلَيْكُم مِّن سُلْطَٰنٍۭ ۖ بَلْ كُنتُمْ قَوْمًۭا طَٰغِينَ
verses.translation: We had no authority over you. You yourselves were rebellious people.

verses.arabic: فَحَقَّ عَلَيْنَا قَوْلُ رَبِّنَآ ۖ إِنَّا لَذَآئِقُونَ
verses.translation: The Word of our Lord has been realized against us. We are tasting it.

verses.arabic: فَأَغْوَيْنَٰكُمْ إِنَّا كُنَّا غَٰوِينَ
verses.translation: We seduced you. We were seducers."

verses.arabic: فَإِنَّهُمْ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ فِى ٱلْعَذَابِ مُشْتَرِكُونَ
verses.translation: On that Day, they will share in the punishment.

verses.arabic: إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَفْعَلُ بِٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ
verses.translation: Thus We deal with the sinners.

verses.arabic: إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوٓا۟ إِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمْ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا ٱللَّهُ يَسْتَكْبِرُونَ
verses.translation: When it was said to them, "There is no god except God," they grew arrogant.

verses.arabic: وَيَقُولُونَ أَئِنَّا لَتَارِكُوٓا۟ ءَالِهَتِنَا لِشَاعِرٍۢ مَّجْنُونٍۭ
verses.translation: And said, "Are we to abandon our gods for a mad poet?"

verses.arabic: بَلْ جَآءَ بِٱلْحَقِّ وَصَدَّقَ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.translation: In fact, he came with the truth, and he confirmed the messengers.

verses.arabic: إِنَّكُمْ لَذَآئِقُوا۟ ٱلْعَذَابِ ٱلْأَلِيمِ
verses.translation: Most assuredly, you will taste the painful punishment.

verses.arabic: وَمَا تُجْزَوْنَ إِلَّا مَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.translation: And you will be repaid only for what you used to do.

verses.arabic: إِلَّا عِبَادَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلْمُخْلَصِينَ
verses.translation: Except for God's sincere servants.

verses.arabic: أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ لَهُمْ رِزْقٌۭ مَّعْلُومٌۭ
verses.translation: For them is a known provision.

verses.arabic: فَوَٰكِهُ ۖ وَهُم مُّكْرَمُونَ
verses.translation: Fruits; and they will be honored.

verses.arabic: فِى جَنَّٰتِ ٱلنَّعِيمِ
verses.translation: In the Gardens of Bliss.

verses.arabic: عَلَىٰ سُرُرٍۢ مُّتَقَٰبِلِينَ
verses.translation: On furnishings, facing one another.

verses.arabic: يُطَافُ عَلَيْهِم بِكَأْسٍۢ مِّن مَّعِينٍۭ
verses.translation: They will be offered a cup of pure drink.

verses.arabic: بَيْضَآءَ لَذَّةٍۢ لِّلشَّٰرِبِينَ
verses.translation: White; a delight to those who drink.

verses.arabic: لَا فِيهَا غَوْلٌۭ وَلَا هُمْ عَنْهَا يُنزَفُونَ
verses.translation: Never polluted, and never intoxicating.

verses.arabic: وَعِندَهُمْ قَٰصِرَٰتُ ٱلطَّرْفِ عِينٌۭ
verses.translation: With them will be bashful women with lovely eyes.

verses.arabic: كَأَنَّهُنَّ بَيْضٌۭ مَّكْنُونٌۭ
verses.translation: As if they were closely guarded pearls.

verses.arabic: فَأَقْبَلَ بَعْضُهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍۢ يَتَسَآءَلُونَ
verses.translation: Then they will approach one another, questioning.

verses.arabic: قَالَ قَآئِلٌۭ مِّنْهُمْ إِنِّى كَانَ لِى قَرِينٌۭ
verses.translation: One of them will say, "I used to have a friend.

verses.arabic: يَقُولُ أَءِنَّكَ لَمِنَ ٱلْمُصَدِّقِينَ
verses.translation: Who used to say, "Are you of those who believe?

verses.arabic: أَءِذَا مِتْنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابًۭا وَعِظَٰمًا أَءِنَّا لَمَدِينُونَ
verses.translation: That after we die and become dust and bones, we will be called to account?"

verses.arabic: قَالَ هَلْ أَنتُم مُّطَّلِعُونَ
verses.translation: He will say, "Will you have a look?"

verses.arabic: فَٱطَّلَعَ فَرَءَاهُ فِى سَوَآءِ ٱلْجَحِيمِ
verses.translation: He will look, and will see him in the pit of Hell.

verses.arabic: قَالَ تَٱللَّهِ إِن كِدتَّ لَتُرْدِينِ
verses.translation: He will say, "By God, you almost ruined me.

verses.arabic: وَلَوْلَا نِعْمَةُ رَبِّى لَكُنتُ مِنَ ٱلْمُحْضَرِينَ
verses.translation: Were it not for the grace of my Lord, I would have been among the arraigned."

verses.arabic: أَفَمَا نَحْنُ بِمَيِّتِينَ
verses.translation: "We will not die.

verses.arabic: إِلَّا مَوْتَتَنَا ٱلْأُولَىٰ وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمُعَذَّبِينَ
verses.translation: Except for our first death, and we will not be punished."

verses.arabic: إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَهُوَ ٱلْفَوْزُ ٱلْعَظِيمُ
verses.translation: This is the supreme triumph.

verses.arabic: لِمِثْلِ هَٰذَا فَلْيَعْمَلِ ٱلْعَٰمِلُونَ
verses.translation: For the like of this let the workers work.

verses.arabic: أَذَٰلِكَ خَيْرٌۭ نُّزُلًا أَمْ شَجَرَةُ ٱلزَّقُّومِ
verses.translation: Is this a better hospitality, or the Tree of Bitterness?

verses.arabic: إِنَّا جَعَلْنَٰهَا فِتْنَةًۭ لِّلظَّٰلِمِينَ
verses.translation: We made it an ordeal for the unjust.

verses.arabic: إِنَّهَا شَجَرَةٌۭ تَخْرُجُ فِىٓ أَصْلِ ٱلْجَحِيمِ
verses.translation: It is a tree that grows from the bottom of Hell.

verses.arabic: طَلْعُهَا كَأَنَّهُۥ رُءُوسُ ٱلشَّيَٰطِينِ
verses.translation: Its fruits are like the devils' heads.

verses.arabic: فَإِنَّهُمْ لَءَاكِلُونَ مِنْهَا فَمَالِـُٔونَ مِنْهَا ٱلْبُطُونَ
verses.translation: They will eat from it, and fill their bellies with it.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ إِنَّ لَهُمْ عَلَيْهَا لَشَوْبًۭا مِّنْ حَمِيمٍۢ
verses.translation: Then, on top of it, they will have a brew of boiling liquid.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ إِنَّ مَرْجِعَهُمْ لَإِلَى ٱلْجَحِيمِ
verses.translation: Then their return will be to the Blaze.

verses.arabic: إِنَّهُمْ أَلْفَوْا۟ ءَابَآءَهُمْ ضَآلِّينَ
verses.translation: They had found their parents astray.

verses.arabic: فَهُمْ عَلَىٰٓ ءَاثَٰرِهِمْ يُهْرَعُونَ
verses.translation: And rushed along in their footsteps.

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ ضَلَّ قَبْلَهُمْ أَكْثَرُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.translation: And most of the ancients before them went astray.

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ أَرْسَلْنَا فِيهِم مُّنذِرِينَ
verses.translation: Even though We sent messengers to warn them.

verses.arabic: فَٱنظُرْ كَيْفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلْمُنذَرِينَ
verses.translation: So observe the end of those who were warned.

verses.arabic: إِلَّا عِبَادَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلْمُخْلَصِينَ
verses.translation: Except for the sincere servants of God.

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ نَادَىٰنَا نُوحٌۭ فَلَنِعْمَ ٱلْمُجِيبُونَ
verses.translation: And Noah called out to Us, and We are the Best of responders.

verses.arabic: وَنَجَّيْنَٰهُ وَأَهْلَهُۥ مِنَ ٱلْكَرْبِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ
verses.translation: And We saved him and his family from the great calamity.

verses.arabic: وَجَعَلْنَا ذُرِّيَّتَهُۥ هُمُ ٱلْبَاقِينَ
verses.translation: And We made his descendants the survivors.

verses.arabic: وَتَرَكْنَا عَلَيْهِ فِى ٱلْءَاخِرِينَ
verses.translation: And We left mention of him among those who succeeded.

verses.arabic: سَلَٰمٌ عَلَىٰ نُوحٍۢ فِى ٱلْعَٰلَمِينَ
verses.translation: Peace be upon Noah among all people.

verses.arabic: إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِى ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ
verses.translation: We thus reward the righteous.

verses.arabic: إِنَّهُۥ مِنْ عِبَادِنَا ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: He was one of Our believing servants.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ أَغْرَقْنَا ٱلْءَاخَرِينَ
verses.translation: Then We drowned the others.

verses.arabic: ۞ وَإِنَّ مِن شِيعَتِهِۦ لَإِبْرَٰهِيمَ
verses.translation: Of his kind was Abraham.

verses.arabic: إِذْ جَآءَ رَبَّهُۥ بِقَلْبٍۢ سَلِيمٍ
verses.translation: When he came to his Lord with a sound heart.

verses.arabic: إِذْ قَالَ لِأَبِيهِ وَقَوْمِهِۦ مَاذَا تَعْبُدُونَ
verses.translation: He said to his father and his people, "What are you worshiping?

verses.arabic: أَئِفْكًا ءَالِهَةًۭ دُونَ ٱللَّهِ تُرِيدُونَ
verses.translation: Is it falsified gods, instead of God, that you want?

verses.arabic: فَمَا ظَنُّكُم بِرَبِّ ٱلْعَٰلَمِينَ
verses.translation: So what is your opinion about the Lord of the Worlds?"

verses.arabic: فَنَظَرَ نَظْرَةًۭ فِى ٱلنُّجُومِ
verses.translation: Then he took a glance at the stars.

verses.arabic: فَقَالَ إِنِّى سَقِيمٌۭ
verses.translation: And said, "I am sick."

verses.arabic: فَتَوَلَّوْا۟ عَنْهُ مُدْبِرِينَ
verses.translation: But they turned their backs on him, and went away.

verses.arabic: فَرَاغَ إِلَىٰٓ ءَالِهَتِهِمْ فَقَالَ أَلَا تَأْكُلُونَ
verses.translation: Then he turned to their gods, and said, "will you not eat?

verses.arabic: مَا لَكُمْ لَا تَنطِقُونَ
verses.translation: What is it with you, that you do not speak?"

verses.arabic: فَرَاغَ عَلَيْهِمْ ضَرْبًۢا بِٱلْيَمِينِ
verses.translation: Then he turned on them, striking with his right hand.

verses.arabic: فَأَقْبَلُوٓا۟ إِلَيْهِ يَزِفُّونَ
verses.translation: And they came running towards him.

verses.arabic: قَالَ أَتَعْبُدُونَ مَا تَنْحِتُونَ
verses.translation: He said, "Do you worship what you carve?

verses.arabic: وَٱللَّهُ خَلَقَكُمْ وَمَا تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.translation: When God created you, and what you manufacture?"

verses.arabic: قَالُوا۟ ٱبْنُوا۟ لَهُۥ بُنْيَٰنًۭا فَأَلْقُوهُ فِى ٱلْجَحِيمِ
verses.translation: They said, "Build a pyre for him, and throw him into the furnace."

verses.arabic: فَأَرَادُوا۟ بِهِۦ كَيْدًۭا فَجَعَلْنَٰهُمُ ٱلْأَسْفَلِينَ
verses.translation: They wished him ill, but We made them the losers.

verses.arabic: وَقَالَ إِنِّى ذَاهِبٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّى سَيَهْدِينِ
verses.translation: He said, "I am going towards my Lord, and He will guide me."

verses.arabic: رَبِّ هَبْ لِى مِنَ ٱلصَّٰلِحِينَ
verses.translation: "My Lord, give me one of the righteous."

verses.arabic: فَبَشَّرْنَٰهُ بِغُلَٰمٍ حَلِيمٍۢ
verses.translation: So We gave him good news of a clement boy.

verses.arabic: فَلَمَّا بَلَغَ مَعَهُ ٱلسَّعْىَ قَالَ يَٰبُنَىَّ إِنِّىٓ أَرَىٰ فِى ٱلْمَنَامِ أَنِّىٓ أَذْبَحُكَ فَٱنظُرْ مَاذَا تَرَىٰ ۚ قَالَ يَٰٓأَبَتِ ٱفْعَلْ مَا تُؤْمَرُ ۖ سَتَجِدُنِىٓ إِن شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰبِرِينَ
verses.translation: Then, when he was old enough to accompany him, he said, "O My son, I see in a dream that I am sacrificing you; see what you think." He said, "O my Father, do as you are commanded; you will find me, God willing, one of the steadfast."

verses.arabic: فَلَمَّآ أَسْلَمَا وَتَلَّهُۥ لِلْجَبِينِ
verses.translation: Then, when they had submitted, and he put his forehead down.

verses.arabic: وَنَٰدَيْنَٰهُ أَن يَٰٓإِبْرَٰهِيمُ
verses.translation: We called out to him, "O Abraham!

verses.arabic: قَدْ صَدَّقْتَ ٱلرُّءْيَآ ۚ إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِى ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ
verses.translation: You have fulfilled the vision." Thus We reward the doers of good.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَهُوَ ٱلْبَلَٰٓؤُا۟ ٱلْمُبِينُ
verses.translation: This was certainly an evident test.

verses.arabic: وَفَدَيْنَٰهُ بِذِبْحٍ عَظِيمٍۢ
verses.translation: And We redeemed him with a great sacrifice.

verses.arabic: وَتَرَكْنَا عَلَيْهِ فِى ٱلْءَاخِرِينَ
verses.translation: And We left with him for later generations.

verses.arabic: سَلَٰمٌ عَلَىٰٓ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ
verses.translation: Peace be upon Abraham.

verses.arabic: كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِى ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ
verses.translation: Thus We reward the doers of good.

verses.arabic: إِنَّهُۥ مِنْ عِبَادِنَا ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: He was one of Our believing servants.

verses.arabic: وَبَشَّرْنَٰهُ بِإِسْحَٰقَ نَبِيًّۭا مِّنَ ٱلصَّٰلِحِينَ
verses.translation: And We gave him good news of Isaac, a prophet, one of the righteous.

verses.arabic: وَبَٰرَكْنَا عَلَيْهِ وَعَلَىٰٓ إِسْحَٰقَ ۚ وَمِن ذُرِّيَّتِهِمَا مُحْسِنٌۭ وَظَالِمٌۭ لِّنَفْسِهِۦ مُبِينٌۭ
verses.translation: And We blessed him, and Isaac. But among their descendants are some who are righteous, and some who are clearly unjust to themselves.

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ مَنَنَّا عَلَىٰ مُوسَىٰ وَهَٰرُونَ
verses.translation: And We blessed Moses and Aaron.

verses.arabic: وَنَجَّيْنَٰهُمَا وَقَوْمَهُمَا مِنَ ٱلْكَرْبِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ
verses.translation: And We delivered them and their people from the terrible disaster.

verses.arabic: وَنَصَرْنَٰهُمْ فَكَانُوا۟ هُمُ ٱلْغَٰلِبِينَ
verses.translation: And We supported them, and so they were the victors.

verses.arabic: وَءَاتَيْنَٰهُمَا ٱلْكِتَٰبَ ٱلْمُسْتَبِينَ
verses.translation: And We gave them the Clarifying Scripture.

verses.arabic: وَهَدَيْنَٰهُمَا ٱلصِّرَٰطَ ٱلْمُسْتَقِيمَ
verses.translation: And We guided them upon the straight path.

verses.arabic: وَتَرَكْنَا عَلَيْهِمَا فِى ٱلْءَاخِرِينَ
verses.translation: And We left with them for later generations.

verses.arabic: سَلَٰمٌ عَلَىٰ مُوسَىٰ وَهَٰرُونَ
verses.translation: Peace be upon Moses and Aaron.

verses.arabic: إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِى ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ
verses.translation: Thus We reward the righteous.

verses.arabic: إِنَّهُمَا مِنْ عِبَادِنَا ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: They were of Our believing servants.

verses.arabic: وَإِنَّ إِلْيَاسَ لَمِنَ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.translation: Also Elijah was one of the messengers.

verses.arabic: إِذْ قَالَ لِقَوْمِهِۦٓ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
verses.translation: He said to his people, "Do you not fear?

verses.arabic: أَتَدْعُونَ بَعْلًۭا وَتَذَرُونَ أَحْسَنَ ٱلْخَٰلِقِينَ
verses.translation: Do you call on Baal, and forsake the Best of creators?

verses.arabic: ٱللَّهَ رَبَّكُمْ وَرَبَّ ءَابَآئِكُمُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.translation: God is your Lord, and the Lord of your ancestors."

verses.arabic: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَإِنَّهُمْ لَمُحْضَرُونَ
verses.translation: But they called him a liar, and thus they will be brought forward.

verses.arabic: إِلَّا عِبَادَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلْمُخْلَصِينَ
verses.translation: Except for God's sincere servants.

verses.arabic: وَتَرَكْنَا عَلَيْهِ فِى ٱلْءَاخِرِينَ
verses.translation: And We left with him for later generations.

verses.arabic: سَلَٰمٌ عَلَىٰٓ إِلْ يَاسِينَ
verses.translation: Peace be upon the House of Elijah.

verses.arabic: إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِى ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ
verses.translation: Thus We reward the virtuous.

verses.arabic: إِنَّهُۥ مِنْ عِبَادِنَا ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: He was one of Our believing servants.

verses.arabic: وَإِنَّ لُوطًۭا لَّمِنَ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.translation: And Lot was one of the messengers.

verses.arabic: إِذْ نَجَّيْنَٰهُ وَأَهْلَهُۥٓ أَجْمَعِينَ
verses.translation: We saved him and his family, all of them.

verses.arabic: إِلَّا عَجُوزًۭا فِى ٱلْغَٰبِرِينَ
verses.translation: Except for an old woman who lagged behind.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ دَمَّرْنَا ٱلْءَاخَرِينَ
verses.translation: Then We annihilated the others.

verses.arabic: وَإِنَّكُمْ لَتَمُرُّونَ عَلَيْهِم مُّصْبِحِينَ
verses.translation: You pass by them in the morning.

verses.arabic: وَبِٱلَّيْلِ ۗ أَفَلَا تَعْقِلُونَ
verses.translation: And at night. Do you not understand?

verses.arabic: وَإِنَّ يُونُسَ لَمِنَ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.translation: And Jonah was one of the messengers.

verses.arabic: إِذْ أَبَقَ إِلَى ٱلْفُلْكِ ٱلْمَشْحُونِ
verses.translation: When he fled to the laden boat.

verses.arabic: فَسَاهَمَ فَكَانَ مِنَ ٱلْمُدْحَضِينَ
verses.translation: He gambled and lost.

verses.arabic: فَٱلْتَقَمَهُ ٱلْحُوتُ وَهُوَ مُلِيمٌۭ
verses.translation: Then the fish swallowed him, and he was to blame.

verses.arabic: فَلَوْلَآ أَنَّهُۥ كَانَ مِنَ ٱلْمُسَبِّحِينَ
verses.translation: Had he not been one of those who praised.

verses.arabic: لَلَبِثَ فِى بَطْنِهِۦٓ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ يُبْعَثُونَ
verses.translation: He would have stayed in its belly until the Day they are raised.

verses.arabic: ۞ فَنَبَذْنَٰهُ بِٱلْعَرَآءِ وَهُوَ سَقِيمٌۭ
verses.translation: Then We threw him into the wilderness, and he was sick.

verses.arabic: وَأَنۢبَتْنَا عَلَيْهِ شَجَرَةًۭ مِّن يَقْطِينٍۢ
verses.translation: And We made a gourd tree grow over him.

verses.arabic: وَأَرْسَلْنَٰهُ إِلَىٰ مِا۟ئَةِ أَلْفٍ أَوْ يَزِيدُونَ
verses.translation: Then We sent him to a hundred thousand, or more.

verses.arabic: فَـَٔامَنُوا۟ فَمَتَّعْنَٰهُمْ إِلَىٰ حِينٍۢ
verses.translation: And they believed, so We gave them enjoyment for a while.

verses.arabic: فَٱسْتَفْتِهِمْ أَلِرَبِّكَ ٱلْبَنَاتُ وَلَهُمُ ٱلْبَنُونَ
verses.translation: Ask them, "Are the daughters for your Lord, while for them the sons?"

verses.arabic: أَمْ خَلَقْنَا ٱلْمَلَٰٓئِكَةَ إِنَٰثًۭا وَهُمْ شَٰهِدُونَ
verses.translation: Or did We create the angels females, as they witnessed?"

verses.arabic: أَلَآ إِنَّهُم مِّنْ إِفْكِهِمْ لَيَقُولُونَ
verses.translation: No indeed! It is one of their lies when they say.

verses.arabic: وَلَدَ ٱللَّهُ وَإِنَّهُمْ لَكَٰذِبُونَ
verses.translation: "God has begotten." They are indeed lying.

verses.arabic: أَصْطَفَى ٱلْبَنَاتِ عَلَى ٱلْبَنِينَ
verses.translation: So He preferred girls over boys?

verses.arabic: مَا لَكُمْ كَيْفَ تَحْكُمُونَ
verses.translation: What is the matter with you? How do you judge?

verses.arabic: أَفَلَا تَذَكَّرُونَ
verses.translation: Will you not reflect?

verses.arabic: أَمْ لَكُمْ سُلْطَٰنٌۭ مُّبِينٌۭ
verses.translation: Or do you have some clear proof?

verses.arabic: فَأْتُوا۟ بِكِتَٰبِكُمْ إِن كُنتُمْ صَٰدِقِينَ
verses.translation: Then bring your book, if you are telling the truth.

verses.arabic: وَجَعَلُوا۟ بَيْنَهُۥ وَبَيْنَ ٱلْجِنَّةِ نَسَبًۭا ۚ وَلَقَدْ عَلِمَتِ ٱلْجِنَّةُ إِنَّهُمْ لَمُحْضَرُونَ
verses.translation: And they invented a relationship between Him and the jinn. But the jinn know that they will be arraigned.

verses.arabic: سُبْحَٰنَ ٱللَّهِ عَمَّا يَصِفُونَ
verses.translation: God be glorified, far above what they allege.

verses.arabic: إِلَّا عِبَادَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلْمُخْلَصِينَ
verses.translation: Except for God's sincere servants.

verses.arabic: فَإِنَّكُمْ وَمَا تَعْبُدُونَ
verses.translation: Surely, you and what you serve.

verses.arabic: مَآ أَنتُمْ عَلَيْهِ بِفَٰتِنِينَ
verses.translation: Cannot seduce away from Him.

verses.arabic: إِلَّا مَنْ هُوَ صَالِ ٱلْجَحِيمِ
verses.translation: Except for he who will be roasting in Hell.

verses.arabic: وَمَا مِنَّآ إِلَّا لَهُۥ مَقَامٌۭ مَّعْلُومٌۭ
verses.translation: "There is not one of us but has an assigned position.

verses.arabic: وَإِنَّا لَنَحْنُ ٱلصَّآفُّونَ
verses.translation: And we are the arrangers.

verses.arabic: وَإِنَّا لَنَحْنُ ٱلْمُسَبِّحُونَ
verses.translation: And we are the glorifiers."

verses.arabic: وَإِن كَانُوا۟ لَيَقُولُونَ
verses.translation: Even though they used to say.

verses.arabic: لَوْ أَنَّ عِندَنَا ذِكْرًۭا مِّنَ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.translation: "Had we received advice from the ancients.

verses.arabic: لَكُنَّا عِبَادَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلْمُخْلَصِينَ
verses.translation: We would have been God's faithful servants."

verses.arabic: فَكَفَرُوا۟ بِهِۦ ۖ فَسَوْفَ يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: But they rejected it, so they will find out.

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ سَبَقَتْ كَلِمَتُنَا لِعِبَادِنَا ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.translation: Our Word has already gone out to our servant messengers.

verses.arabic: إِنَّهُمْ لَهُمُ ٱلْمَنصُورُونَ
verses.translation: It is they who will be supported.

verses.arabic: وَإِنَّ جُندَنَا لَهُمُ ٱلْغَٰلِبُونَ
verses.translation: And Our troops will be the victors.

verses.arabic: فَتَوَلَّ عَنْهُمْ حَتَّىٰ حِينٍۢ
verses.translation: So disregard them for a while.

verses.arabic: وَأَبْصِرْهُمْ فَسَوْفَ يُبْصِرُونَ
verses.translation: And watch them-they will soon see.

verses.arabic: أَفَبِعَذَابِنَا يَسْتَعْجِلُونَ
verses.translation: Are they seeking to hasten Our punishment?

verses.arabic: فَإِذَا نَزَلَ بِسَاحَتِهِمْ فَسَآءَ صَبَاحُ ٱلْمُنذَرِينَ
verses.translation: When it descends into their yard, miserable will be the morning of those forewarned.

verses.arabic: وَتَوَلَّ عَنْهُمْ حَتَّىٰ حِينٍۢ
verses.translation: So avoid them for a while.

verses.arabic: وَأَبْصِرْ فَسَوْفَ يُبْصِرُونَ
verses.translation: And watch-they will soon see.

verses.arabic: سُبْحَٰنَ رَبِّكَ رَبِّ ٱلْعِزَّةِ عَمَّا يَصِفُونَ
verses.translation: Exalted be your Lord, the Lord of Glory, beyond their allegations.

verses.arabic: وَسَلَٰمٌ عَلَى ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.translation: And peace be upon the messengers.

verses.arabic: وَٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلْعَٰلَمِينَ
verses.translation: And praise be to God, the Lord of the Worlds.

verses.arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.translation: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.

verses.arabic: صٓ ۚ وَٱلْقُرْءَانِ ذِى ٱلذِّكْرِ
verses.translation: Saad. By the renowned Quran.

verses.arabic: بَلِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ فِى عِزَّةٍۢ وَشِقَاقٍۢ
verses.translation: Those who disbelieve are steeped in arrogance and defiance.

verses.arabic: كَمْ أَهْلَكْنَا مِن قَبْلِهِم مِّن قَرْنٍۢ فَنَادَوا۟ وَّلَاتَ حِينَ مَنَاصٍۢ
verses.translation: How many generations have We destroyed before them? They cried out when it was too late to escape.

verses.arabic: وَعَجِبُوٓا۟ أَن جَآءَهُم مُّنذِرٌۭ مِّنْهُمْ ۖ وَقَالَ ٱلْكَٰفِرُونَ هَٰذَا سَٰحِرٌۭ كَذَّابٌ
verses.translation: And they marveled that a warner has come to them from among them. The disbelievers said, "This is a lying magician."

verses.arabic: أَجَعَلَ ٱلْءَالِهَةَ إِلَٰهًۭا وَٰحِدًا ۖ إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَشَىْءٌ عُجَابٌۭ
verses.translation: "Did he turn all the gods into one God? This is something strange."

verses.arabic: وَٱنطَلَقَ ٱلْمَلَأُ مِنْهُمْ أَنِ ٱمْشُوا۟ وَٱصْبِرُوا۟ عَلَىٰٓ ءَالِهَتِكُمْ ۖ إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَشَىْءٌۭ يُرَادُ
verses.translation: The notables among them announced: "Go on, and hold fast to your gods. This is something planned.

verses.arabic: مَا سَمِعْنَا بِهَٰذَا فِى ٱلْمِلَّةِ ٱلْءَاخِرَةِ إِنْ هَٰذَآ إِلَّا ٱخْتِلَٰقٌ
verses.translation: We never heard of this in the former faith. This is nothing but a fabrication.

verses.arabic: أَءُنزِلَ عَلَيْهِ ٱلذِّكْرُ مِنۢ بَيْنِنَا ۚ بَلْ هُمْ فِى شَكٍّۢ مِّن ذِكْرِى ۖ بَل لَّمَّا يَذُوقُوا۟ عَذَابِ
verses.translation: Was the message sent down to him, out of all of us?" In fact, they are doubtful of My warning. In fact, they have not yet tasted My punishment.

verses.arabic: أَمْ عِندَهُمْ خَزَآئِنُ رَحْمَةِ رَبِّكَ ٱلْعَزِيزِ ٱلْوَهَّابِ
verses.translation: Or do they possess the treasuries of the mercy of your Lord-the Majestic, the Giver?

verses.arabic: أَمْ لَهُم مُّلْكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا ۖ فَلْيَرْتَقُوا۟ فِى ٱلْأَسْبَٰبِ
verses.translation: Or do they possess the sovereignty of the heavens and the earth and what is between them? Then let them ascend the ropes.

verses.arabic: جُندٌۭ مَّا هُنَالِكَ مَهْزُومٌۭ مِّنَ ٱلْأَحْزَابِ
verses.translation: An army of confederates with be defeated there.

verses.arabic: كَذَّبَتْ قَبْلَهُمْ قَوْمُ نُوحٍۢ وَعَادٌۭ وَفِرْعَوْنُ ذُو ٱلْأَوْتَادِ
verses.translation: Before them the people of Noah denied the truth; as did Aad, and Pharaoh of the Stakes.

verses.arabic: وَثَمُودُ وَقَوْمُ لُوطٍۢ وَأَصْحَٰبُ لْـَٔيْكَةِ ۚ أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ ٱلْأَحْزَابُ
verses.translation: And Thamood, and the people of Lot, and the dwellers of the Woods-these were the confederates.

verses.arabic: إِن كُلٌّ إِلَّا كَذَّبَ ٱلرُّسُلَ فَحَقَّ عِقَابِ
verses.translation: None of them but denied the messengers, so My retribution was deserved.

verses.arabic: وَمَا يَنظُرُ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ إِلَّا صَيْحَةًۭ وَٰحِدَةًۭ مَّا لَهَا مِن فَوَاقٍۢ
verses.translation: These can expect only a single scream, from which there is no recovery.

verses.arabic: وَقَالُوا۟ رَبَّنَا عَجِّل لَّنَا قِطَّنَا قَبْلَ يَوْمِ ٱلْحِسَابِ
verses.translation: And they say, "Our Lord, hasten Your writ upon us, before the Day of Account."

verses.arabic: ٱصْبِرْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَٱذْكُرْ عَبْدَنَا دَاوُۥدَ ذَا ٱلْأَيْدِ ۖ إِنَّهُۥٓ أَوَّابٌ
verses.translation: Be patient in the face of what they say, and mention Our servant David, the resourceful. He was obedient.

verses.arabic: إِنَّا سَخَّرْنَا ٱلْجِبَالَ مَعَهُۥ يُسَبِّحْنَ بِٱلْعَشِىِّ وَٱلْإِشْرَاقِ
verses.translation: We committed the mountains to glorify with him, in the evening and at daybreak.

verses.arabic: وَٱلطَّيْرَ مَحْشُورَةًۭ ۖ كُلٌّۭ لَّهُۥٓ أَوَّابٌۭ
verses.translation: And the birds, gathered together. All obedient to him.

verses.arabic: وَشَدَدْنَا مُلْكَهُۥ وَءَاتَيْنَٰهُ ٱلْحِكْمَةَ وَفَصْلَ ٱلْخِطَابِ
verses.translation: And We strengthened his kingdom, and gave him wisdom and decisive speech.

verses.arabic: ۞ وَهَلْ أَتَىٰكَ نَبَؤُا۟ ٱلْخَصْمِ إِذْ تَسَوَّرُوا۟ ٱلْمِحْرَابَ
verses.translation: Has the story of the two disputants reached you? When they scaled the sanctuary?

verses.arabic: إِذْ دَخَلُوا۟ عَلَىٰ دَاوُۥدَ فَفَزِعَ مِنْهُمْ ۖ قَالُوا۟ لَا تَخَفْ ۖ خَصْمَانِ بَغَىٰ بَعْضُنَا عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍۢ فَٱحْكُم بَيْنَنَا بِٱلْحَقِّ وَلَا تُشْطِطْ وَٱهْدِنَآ إِلَىٰ سَوَآءِ ٱلصِّرَٰطِ
verses.translation: When they entered upon David, and he was startled by them. They said, "Do not fear. Two disputants; one of us has wronged the other; so judge between us fairly, and do not be biased, and guide us to the straight way."

verses.arabic: إِنَّ هَٰذَآ أَخِى لَهُۥ تِسْعٌۭ وَتِسْعُونَ نَعْجَةًۭ وَلِىَ نَعْجَةٌۭ وَٰحِدَةٌۭ فَقَالَ أَكْفِلْنِيهَا وَعَزَّنِى فِى ٱلْخِطَابِ
verses.translation: "This brother of mine has ninety nine ewes, and I have one ewe, and he said, 'Entrust it to me,' and he pressured me with words."

verses.arabic: قَالَ لَقَدْ ظَلَمَكَ بِسُؤَالِ نَعْجَتِكَ إِلَىٰ نِعَاجِهِۦ ۖ وَإِنَّ كَثِيرًۭا مِّنَ ٱلْخُلَطَآءِ لَيَبْغِى بَعْضُهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ وَقَلِيلٌۭ مَّا هُمْ ۗ وَظَنَّ دَاوُۥدُ أَنَّمَا فَتَنَّٰهُ فَٱسْتَغْفَرَ رَبَّهُۥ وَخَرَّ رَاكِعًۭا وَأَنَابَ ۩
verses.translation: He said, "He has done you wrong by asking your ewe in addition to his ewes. Many partners take advantage of one another, except those who believe and do good deeds, but these are so few." David realized that We were testing him, so he sought forgiveness from his Lord, and fell down to his knees, and repented.

verses.arabic: فَغَفَرْنَا لَهُۥ ذَٰلِكَ ۖ وَإِنَّ لَهُۥ عِندَنَا لَزُلْفَىٰ وَحُسْنَ مَـَٔابٍۢ
verses.translation: So We forgave him that. And for him is nearness to Us, and a good place of return.

verses.arabic: يَٰدَاوُۥدُ إِنَّا جَعَلْنَٰكَ خَلِيفَةًۭ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ فَٱحْكُم بَيْنَ ٱلنَّاسِ بِٱلْحَقِّ وَلَا تَتَّبِعِ ٱلْهَوَىٰ فَيُضِلَّكَ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ ۚ إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يَضِلُّونَ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ لَهُمْ عَذَابٌۭ شَدِيدٌۢ بِمَا نَسُوا۟ يَوْمَ ٱلْحِسَابِ
verses.translation: "O David, We made you a ruler in the land, so judge between the people with justice, and do not follow desire, lest it diverts you from God's path. Those who stray from God's path will have a painful punishment, for having ignored the Day of Account."

verses.arabic: وَمَا خَلَقْنَا ٱلسَّمَآءَ وَٱلْأَرْضَ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا بَٰطِلًۭا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ ظَنُّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ ۚ فَوَيْلٌۭ لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِنَ ٱلنَّارِ
verses.translation: We did not create the heaven and the earth and everything between them in vain. That is the assumption of those who disbelieve-so woe to those who disbelieve because of the Fire.

verses.arabic: أَمْ نَجْعَلُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ كَٱلْمُفْسِدِينَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ أَمْ نَجْعَلُ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ كَٱلْفُجَّارِ
verses.translation: Or are We to treat those who believe and do righteous deeds like those who make trouble on earth? Or are We to treat the pious like the shameless?

verses.arabic: كِتَٰبٌ أَنزَلْنَٰهُ إِلَيْكَ مُبَٰرَكٌۭ لِّيَدَّبَّرُوٓا۟ ءَايَٰتِهِۦ وَلِيَتَذَكَّرَ أُو۟لُوا۟ ٱلْأَلْبَٰبِ
verses.translation: A blessed Book that We sent down to you, that they may ponder its Verses, and for those with intelligence to take heed.

verses.arabic: وَوَهَبْنَا لِدَاوُۥدَ سُلَيْمَٰنَ ۚ نِعْمَ ٱلْعَبْدُ ۖ إِنَّهُۥٓ أَوَّابٌ
verses.translation: And We granted David, Solomon, an excellent servant. He was penitent.

verses.arabic: إِذْ عُرِضَ عَلَيْهِ بِٱلْعَشِىِّ ٱلصَّٰفِنَٰتُ ٱلْجِيَادُ
verses.translation: When the beautiful horses were paraded before him in the evening.

verses.arabic: فَقَالَ إِنِّىٓ أَحْبَبْتُ حُبَّ ٱلْخَيْرِ عَن ذِكْرِ رَبِّى حَتَّىٰ تَوَارَتْ بِٱلْحِجَابِ
verses.translation: He said, "I have preferred the love of niceties to the remembrance of my Lord-until it disappeared behind the veil.

verses.arabic: رُدُّوهَا عَلَىَّ ۖ فَطَفِقَ مَسْحًۢا بِٱلسُّوقِ وَٱلْأَعْنَاقِ
verses.translation: Bring them back to me." And he began caressing their legs and necks.

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ فَتَنَّا سُلَيْمَٰنَ وَأَلْقَيْنَا عَلَىٰ كُرْسِيِّهِۦ جَسَدًۭا ثُمَّ أَنَابَ
verses.translation: We tested Solomon, and placed a body on his throne; then he repented.

verses.arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ ٱغْفِرْ لِى وَهَبْ لِى مُلْكًۭا لَّا يَنۢبَغِى لِأَحَدٍۢ مِّنۢ بَعْدِىٓ ۖ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ ٱلْوَهَّابُ
verses.translation: He said, "My Lord, forgive me, and grant me a kingdom never to be attained by anyone after me. You are the Giver."

verses.arabic: فَسَخَّرْنَا لَهُ ٱلرِّيحَ تَجْرِى بِأَمْرِهِۦ رُخَآءً حَيْثُ أَصَابَ
verses.translation: So We placed the wind at his service, blowing gently by his command, wherever he directed.

verses.arabic: وَٱلشَّيَٰطِينَ كُلَّ بَنَّآءٍۢ وَغَوَّاصٍۢ
verses.translation: And the demons-every builder and diver.

verses.arabic: وَءَاخَرِينَ مُقَرَّنِينَ فِى ٱلْأَصْفَادِ
verses.translation: And others fettered in chains.

verses.arabic: هَٰذَا عَطَآؤُنَا فَٱمْنُنْ أَوْ أَمْسِكْ بِغَيْرِ حِسَابٍۢ
verses.translation: "This is Our gift; so give generously, or withhold; without account."

verses.arabic: وَإِنَّ لَهُۥ عِندَنَا لَزُلْفَىٰ وَحُسْنَ مَـَٔابٍۢ
verses.translation: For him is nearness to Us, and a beautiful resort.

verses.arabic: وَٱذْكُرْ عَبْدَنَآ أَيُّوبَ إِذْ نَادَىٰ رَبَّهُۥٓ أَنِّى مَسَّنِىَ ٱلشَّيْطَٰنُ بِنُصْبٍۢ وَعَذَابٍ
verses.translation: And mention Our servant Job, when he called out to his Lord, "Satan has afflicted me with hardship and pain."

verses.arabic: ٱرْكُضْ بِرِجْلِكَ ۖ هَٰذَا مُغْتَسَلٌۢ بَارِدٌۭ وَشَرَابٌۭ
verses.translation: "Stamp with your foot-here is cool water to wash with, and to drink."

verses.arabic: وَوَهَبْنَا لَهُۥٓ أَهْلَهُۥ وَمِثْلَهُم مَّعَهُمْ رَحْمَةًۭ مِّنَّا وَذِكْرَىٰ لِأُو۟لِى ٱلْأَلْبَٰبِ
verses.translation: And We restored his family for him, and their like with them; as a mercy from Us, and a lesson for those who possess insight.

verses.arabic: وَخُذْ بِيَدِكَ ضِغْثًۭا فَٱضْرِب بِّهِۦ وَلَا تَحْنَثْ ۗ إِنَّا وَجَدْنَٰهُ صَابِرًۭا ۚ نِّعْمَ ٱلْعَبْدُ ۖ إِنَّهُۥٓ أَوَّابٌۭ
verses.translation: "Take with your hand a bundle, and strike with it, and do not break your oath." We found him patient. What an excellent servant! He was obedient.

verses.arabic: وَٱذْكُرْ عِبَٰدَنَآ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ وَإِسْحَٰقَ وَيَعْقُوبَ أُو۟لِى ٱلْأَيْدِى وَٱلْأَبْصَٰرِ
verses.translation: And mention Our servants Abraham, Isaac, and Jacob-endowed with ability and vision.

verses.arabic: إِنَّآ أَخْلَصْنَٰهُم بِخَالِصَةٍۢ ذِكْرَى ٱلدَّارِ
verses.translation: We distinguished them with a distinct quality: the remembrance of the Home.

verses.arabic: وَإِنَّهُمْ عِندَنَا لَمِنَ ٱلْمُصْطَفَيْنَ ٱلْأَخْيَارِ
verses.translation: To Us they are among the chosen, the outstanding.

verses.arabic: وَٱذْكُرْ إِسْمَٰعِيلَ وَٱلْيَسَعَ وَذَا ٱلْكِفْلِ ۖ وَكُلٌّۭ مِّنَ ٱلْأَخْيَارِ
verses.translation: And mention Ishmael, Elisha, and Ezekiel; all are among the outstanding.

verses.arabic: هَٰذَا ذِكْرٌۭ ۚ وَإِنَّ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ لَحُسْنَ مَـَٔابٍۢ
verses.translation: This is a reminder. The devout will have a good place of return.

verses.arabic: جَنَّٰتِ عَدْنٍۢ مُّفَتَّحَةًۭ لَّهُمُ ٱلْأَبْوَٰبُ
verses.translation: The Gardens of Eden, with their doors wide-open for them.

verses.arabic: مُتَّكِـِٔينَ فِيهَا يَدْعُونَ فِيهَا بِفَٰكِهَةٍۢ كَثِيرَةٍۢ وَشَرَابٍۢ
verses.translation: Relaxing therein, and calling for abundant fruit and beverage.

verses.arabic: ۞ وَعِندَهُمْ قَٰصِرَٰتُ ٱلطَّرْفِ أَتْرَابٌ
verses.translation: With them will be attendants with modest gaze, of same age.

verses.arabic: هَٰذَا مَا تُوعَدُونَ لِيَوْمِ ٱلْحِسَابِ
verses.translation: This is what you are promised for the Day of Account.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَرِزْقُنَا مَا لَهُۥ مِن نَّفَادٍ
verses.translation: Such is Our bounty, inexhaustible.

verses.arabic: هَٰذَا ۚ وَإِنَّ لِلطَّٰغِينَ لَشَرَّ مَـَٔابٍۢ
verses.translation: All This. But the transgressors will have a miserable return.

verses.arabic: جَهَنَّمَ يَصْلَوْنَهَا فَبِئْسَ ٱلْمِهَادُ
verses.translation: Hell; in which they will roast; what a miserable abode!

verses.arabic: هَٰذَا فَلْيَذُوقُوهُ حَمِيمٌۭ وَغَسَّاقٌۭ
verses.translation: All this. Let them taste it-boiling and bitter cold.

verses.arabic: وَءَاخَرُ مِن شَكْلِهِۦٓ أَزْوَٰجٌ
verses.translation: And similar torments of diverse kinds.

verses.arabic: هَٰذَا فَوْجٌۭ مُّقْتَحِمٌۭ مَّعَكُمْ ۖ لَا مَرْحَبًۢا بِهِمْ ۚ إِنَّهُمْ صَالُوا۟ ٱلنَّارِ
verses.translation: "This is a crowd rushing headlong with you." There is no welcome for them. They will be scorched by the Fire.

verses.arabic: قَالُوا۟ بَلْ أَنتُمْ لَا مَرْحَبًۢا بِكُمْ ۖ أَنتُمْ قَدَّمْتُمُوهُ لَنَا ۖ فَبِئْسَ ٱلْقَرَارُ
verses.translation: They will say, "But it is you! There is no welcome for you! It is you who brought it upon us! What a miserable end!"

verses.arabic: قَالُوا۟ رَبَّنَا مَن قَدَّمَ لَنَا هَٰذَا فَزِدْهُ عَذَابًۭا ضِعْفًۭا فِى ٱلنَّارِ
verses.translation: They will say, "Our Lord, whoever brought this upon us, give him double torment in the Fire."

verses.arabic: وَقَالُوا۟ مَا لَنَا لَا نَرَىٰ رِجَالًۭا كُنَّا نَعُدُّهُم مِّنَ ٱلْأَشْرَارِ
verses.translation: And they will say, "What is it with us that we do not see men we used to count among the wicked?

verses.arabic: أَتَّخَذْنَٰهُمْ سِخْرِيًّا أَمْ زَاغَتْ عَنْهُمُ ٱلْأَبْصَٰرُ
verses.translation: Did we take them for mockery, or have our eyes swerved from them?

verses.arabic: إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ لَحَقٌّۭ تَخَاصُمُ أَهْلِ ٱلنَّارِ
verses.translation: This is certainly true-the feuding of the people of the Fire.

verses.arabic: قُلْ إِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ مُنذِرٌۭ ۖ وَمَا مِنْ إِلَٰهٍ إِلَّا ٱللَّهُ ٱلْوَٰحِدُ ٱلْقَهَّارُ
verses.translation: Say, "I am only a warner, and there is no god except God-the One, the Conqueror.

verses.arabic: رَبُّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْغَفَّٰرُ
verses.translation: The Lord of the heavens and the earth, and everything between them; the Mighty, the Forgiver."

verses.arabic: قُلْ هُوَ نَبَؤٌا۟ عَظِيمٌ
verses.translation: Say, "It is a message of great importance.

verses.arabic: أَنتُمْ عَنْهُ مُعْرِضُونَ
verses.translation: From which you are turning away.

verses.arabic: مَا كَانَ لِىَ مِنْ عِلْمٍۭ بِٱلْمَلَإِ ٱلْأَعْلَىٰٓ إِذْ يَخْتَصِمُونَ
verses.translation: I have no knowledge of the Highest Assembly as they dispute.

verses.arabic: إِن يُوحَىٰٓ إِلَىَّ إِلَّآ أَنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ نَذِيرٌۭ مُّبِينٌ
verses.translation: It is only revealed to me that I am a clear warner."

verses.arabic: إِذْ قَالَ رَبُّكَ لِلْمَلَٰٓئِكَةِ إِنِّى خَٰلِقٌۢ بَشَرًۭا مِّن طِينٍۢ
verses.translation: Your Lord said to the angels, "I am creating a human being from clay.

verses.arabic: فَإِذَا سَوَّيْتُهُۥ وَنَفَخْتُ فِيهِ مِن رُّوحِى فَقَعُوا۟ لَهُۥ سَٰجِدِينَ
verses.translation: When I have formed him, and breathed into him of My spirit, fall prostrate before him.

verses.arabic: فَسَجَدَ ٱلْمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ كُلُّهُمْ أَجْمَعُونَ
verses.translation: So the angels fell prostrate, all of them.

verses.arabic: إِلَّآ إِبْلِيسَ ٱسْتَكْبَرَ وَكَانَ مِنَ ٱلْكَٰفِرِينَ
verses.translation: Except for Satan. He was too proud, and one of the faithless.

verses.arabic: قَالَ يَٰٓإِبْلِيسُ مَا مَنَعَكَ أَن تَسْجُدَ لِمَا خَلَقْتُ بِيَدَىَّ ۖ أَسْتَكْبَرْتَ أَمْ كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلْعَالِينَ
verses.translation: He said, "O Satan, what prevented you from prostrating before what I created with My Own hands? Are you too proud, or were you one of the exalted?"

verses.arabic: قَالَ أَنَا۠ خَيْرٌۭ مِّنْهُ ۖ خَلَقْتَنِى مِن نَّارٍۢ وَخَلَقْتَهُۥ مِن طِينٍۢ
verses.translation: He said, "I am better than he; You created me from fire, and You created him from clay."

verses.arabic: قَالَ فَٱخْرُجْ مِنْهَا فَإِنَّكَ رَجِيمٌۭ
verses.translation: He said, "Then get out of here! You are an outcast!

verses.arabic: وَإِنَّ عَلَيْكَ لَعْنَتِىٓ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ ٱلدِّينِ
verses.translation: And My curse will be upon you until the Day of Judgment."

verses.arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ فَأَنظِرْنِىٓ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ يُبْعَثُونَ
verses.translation: He said, "Lord, defer me until the Day they are resurrected."

verses.arabic: قَالَ فَإِنَّكَ مِنَ ٱلْمُنظَرِينَ
verses.translation: He said, "You are one of those deferred.

verses.arabic: إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ ٱلْوَقْتِ ٱلْمَعْلُومِ
verses.translation: Until the Day of the Time Appointed."

verses.arabic: قَالَ فَبِعِزَّتِكَ لَأُغْوِيَنَّهُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ
verses.translation: He said, "By Your majesty, I will seduce them all.

verses.arabic: إِلَّا عِبَادَكَ مِنْهُمُ ٱلْمُخْلَصِينَ
verses.translation: Except for your loyal servants among them."

verses.arabic: قَالَ فَٱلْحَقُّ وَٱلْحَقَّ أَقُولُ
verses.translation: He said, "The truth is, and I say the truth.

verses.arabic: لَأَمْلَأَنَّ جَهَنَّمَ مِنكَ وَمِمَّن تَبِعَكَ مِنْهُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ
verses.translation: I will fill Hell with you, and with every one of them who follows you."

verses.arabic: قُلْ مَآ أَسْـَٔلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ أَجْرٍۢ وَمَآ أَنَا۠ مِنَ ٱلْمُتَكَلِّفِينَ
verses.translation: Say, "I ask of you no wage for this, and I am not a pretender.

verses.arabic: إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكْرٌۭ لِّلْعَٰلَمِينَ
verses.translation: It is but a reminder to mankind.

verses.arabic: وَلَتَعْلَمُنَّ نَبَأَهُۥ بَعْدَ حِينٍۭ
verses.translation: And you will know its message after a while."

verses.arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.translation: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.

verses.arabic: تَنزِيلُ ٱلْكِتَٰبِ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلْعَزِيزِ ٱلْحَكِيمِ
verses.translation: The revelation of the Book is from God, the Mighty and Wise.

verses.arabic: إِنَّآ أَنزَلْنَآ إِلَيْكَ ٱلْكِتَٰبَ بِٱلْحَقِّ فَٱعْبُدِ ٱللَّهَ مُخْلِصًۭا لَّهُ ٱلدِّينَ
verses.translation: We sent down to you the Book with the truth, so serve God, devoting your religion to Him.

verses.arabic: أَلَا لِلَّهِ ٱلدِّينُ ٱلْخَالِصُ ۚ وَٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّخَذُوا۟ مِن دُونِهِۦٓ أَوْلِيَآءَ مَا نَعْبُدُهُمْ إِلَّا لِيُقَرِّبُونَآ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ زُلْفَىٰٓ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَحْكُمُ بَيْنَهُمْ فِى مَا هُمْ فِيهِ يَخْتَلِفُونَ ۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَهْدِى مَنْ هُوَ كَٰذِبٌۭ كَفَّارٌۭ
verses.translation: Is not to God that sincere faith is due? As for those who take guardians besides Him, "We only worship them that they may bring us nearer to God." God will judge between them regarding their differences. God does not guide the lying blasphemer.

verses.arabic: لَّوْ أَرَادَ ٱللَّهُ أَن يَتَّخِذَ وَلَدًۭا لَّٱصْطَفَىٰ مِمَّا يَخْلُقُ مَا يَشَآءُ ۚ سُبْحَٰنَهُۥ ۖ هُوَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلْوَٰحِدُ ٱلْقَهَّارُ
verses.translation: If God wanted to have a son, He could have selected from His creation at will. Glory be to Him. He is God, the One, the Prevailing.

verses.arabic: خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ بِٱلْحَقِّ ۖ يُكَوِّرُ ٱلَّيْلَ عَلَى ٱلنَّهَارِ وَيُكَوِّرُ ٱلنَّهَارَ عَلَى ٱلَّيْلِ ۖ وَسَخَّرَ ٱلشَّمْسَ وَٱلْقَمَرَ ۖ كُلٌّۭ يَجْرِى لِأَجَلٍۢ مُّسَمًّى ۗ أَلَا هُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْغَفَّٰرُ
verses.translation: He created the heavens and the earth with reason. He wraps the night around the day, and He wraps the day around the night. And He regulates the sun and the moon, each running along a specific course. He is indeed the Almighty, the Forgiver.

verses.arabic: خَلَقَكُم مِّن نَّفْسٍۢ وَٰحِدَةٍۢ ثُمَّ جَعَلَ مِنْهَا زَوْجَهَا وَأَنزَلَ لَكُم مِّنَ ٱلْأَنْعَٰمِ ثَمَٰنِيَةَ أَزْوَٰجٍۢ ۚ يَخْلُقُكُمْ فِى بُطُونِ أُمَّهَٰتِكُمْ خَلْقًۭا مِّنۢ بَعْدِ خَلْقٍۢ فِى ظُلُمَٰتٍۢ ثَلَٰثٍۢ ۚ ذَٰلِكُمُ ٱللَّهُ رَبُّكُمْ لَهُ ٱلْمُلْكُ ۖ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ۖ فَأَنَّىٰ تُصْرَفُونَ
verses.translation: He created you from one person, then made from it its mate, and brought down livestock for you-eight kinds in pairs. He creates you in the wombs of your mothers, in successive formations, in a triple darkness. Such is God, your Lord. His is the kingdom. There is no god but He. So what made you deviate?

verses.arabic: إِن تَكْفُرُوا۟ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَنِىٌّ عَنكُمْ ۖ وَلَا يَرْضَىٰ لِعِبَادِهِ ٱلْكُفْرَ ۖ وَإِن تَشْكُرُوا۟ يَرْضَهُ لَكُمْ ۗ وَلَا تَزِرُ وَازِرَةٌۭ وِزْرَ أُخْرَىٰ ۗ ثُمَّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكُم مَّرْجِعُكُمْ فَيُنَبِّئُكُم بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ عَلِيمٌۢ بِذَاتِ ٱلصُّدُورِ
verses.translation: If you disbelieve, God is Independent of you, yet He does not approve ingratitude on the part of His servants. And if you are thankful, He will approve that in you. No bearer of burden can bear the burden of another. Then to your Lord is your return; and He will inform you of what you used to do. He is aware of what the hearts contain.

verses.arabic: ۞ وَإِذَا مَسَّ ٱلْإِنسَٰنَ ضُرٌّۭ دَعَا رَبَّهُۥ مُنِيبًا إِلَيْهِ ثُمَّ إِذَا خَوَّلَهُۥ نِعْمَةًۭ مِّنْهُ نَسِىَ مَا كَانَ يَدْعُوٓا۟ إِلَيْهِ مِن قَبْلُ وَجَعَلَ لِلَّهِ أَندَادًۭا لِّيُضِلَّ عَن سَبِيلِهِۦ ۚ قُلْ تَمَتَّعْ بِكُفْرِكَ قَلِيلًا ۖ إِنَّكَ مِنْ أَصْحَٰبِ ٱلنَّارِ
verses.translation: When some adversity touches the human being, he prays to his Lord, repenting to Him. But then, when He confers on him a grace of His, he forgets what he was praying for before, and he attributes rivals to God, in order to lead astray from His way. Say, "Enjoy your disbelief for a little while; you will be among the inmates of the Fire."

verses.arabic: أَمَّنْ هُوَ قَٰنِتٌ ءَانَآءَ ٱلَّيْلِ سَاجِدًۭا وَقَآئِمًۭا يَحْذَرُ ٱلْءَاخِرَةَ وَيَرْجُوا۟ رَحْمَةَ رَبِّهِۦ ۗ قُلْ هَلْ يَسْتَوِى ٱلَّذِينَ يَعْلَمُونَ وَٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ ۗ إِنَّمَا يَتَذَكَّرُ أُو۟لُوا۟ ٱلْأَلْبَٰبِ
verses.translation: Is he who worships devoutly during the watches of the night, prostrating himself and standing up, mindful of the Hereafter, and placing his hope in the mercy of his Lord? Say, "Are those who know and those who do not know equal?" Only those possessed of reason will remember.

verses.arabic: قُلْ يَٰعِبَادِ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ ٱتَّقُوا۟ رَبَّكُمْ ۚ لِلَّذِينَ أَحْسَنُوا۟ فِى هَٰذِهِ ٱلدُّنْيَا حَسَنَةٌۭ ۗ وَأَرْضُ ٱللَّهِ وَٰسِعَةٌ ۗ إِنَّمَا يُوَفَّى ٱلصَّٰبِرُونَ أَجْرَهُم بِغَيْرِ حِسَابٍۢ
verses.translation: Say, "O My devotees who have believed, keep your duty to your Lord. For those who do good in this world, is goodness. And God's earth is vast. The steadfast will be paid their wages in full, without reckoning."

verses.arabic: قُلْ إِنِّىٓ أُمِرْتُ أَنْ أَعْبُدَ ٱللَّهَ مُخْلِصًۭا لَّهُ ٱلدِّينَ
verses.translation: Say, "I was commanded to serve God, devoting my religion exclusively to Him.

verses.arabic: وَأُمِرْتُ لِأَنْ أَكُونَ أَوَّلَ ٱلْمُسْلِمِينَ
verses.translation: And I was commanded to be the first of those who submit."

verses.arabic: قُلْ إِنِّىٓ أَخَافُ إِنْ عَصَيْتُ رَبِّى عَذَابَ يَوْمٍ عَظِيمٍۢ
verses.translation: Say, "I fear, if I disobeyed my Lord, the punishment of a horrendous Day."

verses.arabic: قُلِ ٱللَّهَ أَعْبُدُ مُخْلِصًۭا لَّهُۥ دِينِى
verses.translation: Say, "It is God I worship, sincere in my faith in Him."

verses.arabic: فَٱعْبُدُوا۟ مَا شِئْتُم مِّن دُونِهِۦ ۗ قُلْ إِنَّ ٱلْخَٰسِرِينَ ٱلَّذِينَ خَسِرُوٓا۟ أَنفُسَهُمْ وَأَهْلِيهِمْ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَٰمَةِ ۗ أَلَا ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلْخُسْرَانُ ٱلْمُبِينُ
verses.translation: "But you can worship whatever you wish besides Him." Say, "The losers are those who lose their souls and their people on the Day of Resurrection." That is indeed the obvious loss.

verses.arabic: لَهُم مِّن فَوْقِهِمْ ظُلَلٌۭ مِّنَ ٱلنَّارِ وَمِن تَحْتِهِمْ ظُلَلٌۭ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ يُخَوِّفُ ٱللَّهُ بِهِۦ عِبَادَهُۥ ۚ يَٰعِبَادِ فَٱتَّقُونِ
verses.translation: They will have layers of Fire above them, and layers beneath them. That is how God strikes fear into His servants-"O My servants! Beware of Me!"

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ ٱجْتَنَبُوا۟ ٱلطَّٰغُوتَ أَن يَعْبُدُوهَا وَأَنَابُوٓا۟ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ لَهُمُ ٱلْبُشْرَىٰ ۚ فَبَشِّرْ عِبَادِ
verses.translation: As for those who avoid the worship of idols, and devote themselves to God-theirs is the good news. So give good news to My servants.

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يَسْتَمِعُونَ ٱلْقَوْلَ فَيَتَّبِعُونَ أَحْسَنَهُۥٓ ۚ أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ هَدَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّهُ ۖ وَأُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ هُمْ أُو۟لُوا۟ ٱلْأَلْبَٰبِ
verses.translation: Those who listen to the Word, and follow the best of it. These are they whom God has guided. These are they who possess intellect.

verses.arabic: أَفَمَنْ حَقَّ عَلَيْهِ كَلِمَةُ ٱلْعَذَابِ أَفَأَنتَ تُنقِذُ مَن فِى ٱلنَّارِ
verses.translation: What about someone who has deserved the sentence of punishment? Is it you who can save those in the Fire?

verses.arabic: لَٰكِنِ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّقَوْا۟ رَبَّهُمْ لَهُمْ غُرَفٌۭ مِّن فَوْقِهَا غُرَفٌۭ مَّبْنِيَّةٌۭ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَٰرُ ۖ وَعْدَ ٱللَّهِ ۖ لَا يُخْلِفُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلْمِيعَادَ
verses.translation: But those who fear their Lord will have mansions upon mansions, built high, with streams flowing beneath them. The promise of God; and God never breaks a promise.

verses.arabic: أَلَمْ تَرَ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ أَنزَلَ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءًۭ فَسَلَكَهُۥ يَنَٰبِيعَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ثُمَّ يُخْرِجُ بِهِۦ زَرْعًۭا مُّخْتَلِفًا أَلْوَٰنُهُۥ ثُمَّ يَهِيجُ فَتَرَىٰهُ مُصْفَرًّۭا ثُمَّ يَجْعَلُهُۥ حُطَٰمًا ۚ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَذِكْرَىٰ لِأُو۟لِى ٱلْأَلْبَٰبِ
verses.translation: Have you not considered how God sends down water from the sky, then He makes it flow into underground wells, then He produces with it plants of various colors, then they wither and you see them yellowing, then He turns them into debris? Surely in this is a reminder for those with understanding.

verses.arabic: أَفَمَن شَرَحَ ٱللَّهُ صَدْرَهُۥ لِلْإِسْلَٰمِ فَهُوَ عَلَىٰ نُورٍۢ مِّن رَّبِّهِۦ ۚ فَوَيْلٌۭ لِّلْقَٰسِيَةِ قُلُوبُهُم مِّن ذِكْرِ ٱللَّهِ ۚ أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ فِى ضَلَٰلٍۢ مُّبِينٍ
verses.translation: What about someone whose heart God has opened to Islam, so that he follows a light from His Lord? Woe to those whose hearts are hardened against the mention of God. Those are in manifest error.

verses.arabic: ٱللَّهُ نَزَّلَ أَحْسَنَ ٱلْحَدِيثِ كِتَٰبًۭا مُّتَشَٰبِهًۭا مَّثَانِىَ تَقْشَعِرُّ مِنْهُ جُلُودُ ٱلَّذِينَ يَخْشَوْنَ رَبَّهُمْ ثُمَّ تَلِينُ جُلُودُهُمْ وَقُلُوبُهُمْ إِلَىٰ ذِكْرِ ٱللَّهِ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُدَى ٱللَّهِ يَهْدِى بِهِۦ مَن يَشَآءُ ۚ وَمَن يُضْلِلِ ٱللَّهُ فَمَا لَهُۥ مِنْ هَادٍ
verses.translation: God has sent down the best of narrations: a Scripture consistent and paired. The skins of those who reverence their Lord shiver from it, then their skins and their hearts soften up to the remembrance of God. Such is God's guidance; He guides with it whomever He wills. But whomever God leaves astray, for him there is no guide.

verses.arabic: أَفَمَن يَتَّقِى بِوَجْهِهِۦ سُوٓءَ ٱلْعَذَابِ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَٰمَةِ ۚ وَقِيلَ لِلظَّٰلِمِينَ ذُوقُوا۟ مَا كُنتُمْ تَكْسِبُونَ
verses.translation: What about someone who covers his face against the terrible misery of the Day of Resurrection? To the evildoers it will be said, "Taste what you used to earn."

verses.arabic: كَذَّبَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ فَأَتَىٰهُمُ ٱلْعَذَابُ مِنْ حَيْثُ لَا يَشْعُرُونَ
verses.translation: Those before them also denied the truth, so the penalty came upon them from where they did not perceive.

verses.arabic: فَأَذَاقَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلْخِزْىَ فِى ٱلْحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنْيَا ۖ وَلَعَذَابُ ٱلْءَاخِرَةِ أَكْبَرُ ۚ لَوْ كَانُوا۟ يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: God made them taste disgrace in the present life, but the punishment of the Hereafter is worse, if they only knew.

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ ضَرَبْنَا لِلنَّاسِ فِى هَٰذَا ٱلْقُرْءَانِ مِن كُلِّ مَثَلٍۢ لَّعَلَّهُمْ يَتَذَكَّرُونَ
verses.translation: We have cited in this Quran for mankind every ideal, that they may take heed.

verses.arabic: قُرْءَانًا عَرَبِيًّا غَيْرَ ذِى عِوَجٍۢ لَّعَلَّهُمْ يَتَّقُونَ
verses.translation: An Arabic Quran, without any defect, so they may become righteous.

verses.arabic: ضَرَبَ ٱللَّهُ مَثَلًۭا رَّجُلًۭا فِيهِ شُرَكَآءُ مُتَشَٰكِسُونَ وَرَجُلًۭا سَلَمًۭا لِّرَجُلٍ هَلْ يَسْتَوِيَانِ مَثَلًا ۚ ٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ ۚ بَلْ أَكْثَرُهُمْ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: God cites the example of a man shared by partners at odds, and a man belonging exclusively to one man. Are they equal in status? Praise be to God, but most of them do not know.

verses.arabic: إِنَّكَ مَيِّتٌۭ وَإِنَّهُم مَّيِّتُونَ
verses.translation: You will die, and they will die.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ إِنَّكُمْ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَٰمَةِ عِندَ رَبِّكُمْ تَخْتَصِمُونَ
verses.translation: Then, on the Day of Resurrection, you will be quarrelling before your Lord.

verses.arabic: ۞ فَمَنْ أَظْلَمُ مِمَّن كَذَبَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ وَكَذَّبَ بِٱلصِّدْقِ إِذْ جَآءَهُۥٓ ۚ أَلَيْسَ فِى جَهَنَّمَ مَثْوًۭى لِّلْكَٰفِرِينَ
verses.translation: Who is more evil than he who lies about God, and denies the truth when it has come to him? Is there not in Hell room for the ungrateful?

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِى جَآءَ بِٱلصِّدْقِ وَصَدَّقَ بِهِۦٓ ۙ أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْمُتَّقُونَ
verses.translation: But he who promotes the truth, and testifies to it-these are the righteous.

verses.arabic: لَهُم مَّا يَشَآءُونَ عِندَ رَبِّهِمْ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ جَزَآءُ ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ
verses.translation: They will have whatever they please with their Lord. Such is the reward for the virtuous.

verses.arabic: لِيُكَفِّرَ ٱللَّهُ عَنْهُمْ أَسْوَأَ ٱلَّذِى عَمِلُوا۟ وَيَجْزِيَهُمْ أَجْرَهُم بِأَحْسَنِ ٱلَّذِى كَانُوا۟ يَعْمَلُونَ
verses.translation: God will acquit them of the worst of their deeds, and will reward them according to the best of what they used to do.

verses.arabic: أَلَيْسَ ٱللَّهُ بِكَافٍ عَبْدَهُۥ ۖ وَيُخَوِّفُونَكَ بِٱلَّذِينَ مِن دُونِهِۦ ۚ وَمَن يُضْلِلِ ٱللَّهُ فَمَا لَهُۥ مِنْ هَادٍۢ
verses.translation: Is God not enough for His servant? And they frighten you with those besides Him. Whomever God sends astray, for him there is no guide.

verses.arabic: وَمَن يَهْدِ ٱللَّهُ فَمَا لَهُۥ مِن مُّضِلٍّ ۗ أَلَيْسَ ٱللَّهُ بِعَزِيزٍۢ ذِى ٱنتِقَامٍۢ
verses.translation: And whomever God guides, for him there is no misleader. Is God not Powerful and Vengeful?

verses.arabic: وَلَئِن سَأَلْتَهُم مَّنْ خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ لَيَقُولُنَّ ٱللَّهُ ۚ قُلْ أَفَرَءَيْتُم مَّا تَدْعُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ إِنْ أَرَادَنِىَ ٱللَّهُ بِضُرٍّ هَلْ هُنَّ كَٰشِفَٰتُ ضُرِّهِۦٓ أَوْ أَرَادَنِى بِرَحْمَةٍ هَلْ هُنَّ مُمْسِكَٰتُ رَحْمَتِهِۦ ۚ قُلْ حَسْبِىَ ٱللَّهُ ۖ عَلَيْهِ يَتَوَكَّلُ ٱلْمُتَوَكِّلُونَ
