verses.translation: Their eyes cast down; overwhelmed by humiliation. This is the Day which they were promised.

verses.arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.translation: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.

verses.arabic: إِنَّآ أَرْسَلْنَا نُوحًا إِلَىٰ قَوْمِهِۦٓ أَنْ أَنذِرْ قَوْمَكَ مِن قَبْلِ أَن يَأْتِيَهُمْ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌۭ
verses.translation: We sent Noah to his people: "Warn your people before there comes upon them a painful punishment."

verses.arabic: قَالَ يَٰقَوْمِ إِنِّى لَكُمْ نَذِيرٌۭ مُّبِينٌ
verses.translation: He said, "O my people, I am to you a clear warner.

verses.arabic: أَنِ ٱعْبُدُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَٱتَّقُوهُ وَأَطِيعُونِ
verses.translation: Worship God and reverence Him, and obey me.

verses.arabic: يَغْفِرْ لَكُم مِّن ذُنُوبِكُمْ وَيُؤَخِّرْكُمْ إِلَىٰٓ أَجَلٍۢ مُّسَمًّى ۚ إِنَّ أَجَلَ ٱللَّهِ إِذَا جَآءَ لَا يُؤَخَّرُ ۖ لَوْ كُنتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: And He will forgive you of your sins, and reprieve you until a stated term. God's term cannot be deferred once it has arrived, if you only knew."

verses.arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّى دَعَوْتُ قَوْمِى لَيْلًۭا وَنَهَارًۭا
verses.translation: He said, "My Lord, I have called my people night and day.

verses.arabic: فَلَمْ يَزِدْهُمْ دُعَآءِىٓ إِلَّا فِرَارًۭا
verses.translation: But my call added only to their flight.

verses.arabic: وَإِنِّى كُلَّمَا دَعَوْتُهُمْ لِتَغْفِرَ لَهُمْ جَعَلُوٓا۟ أَصَٰبِعَهُمْ فِىٓ ءَاذَانِهِمْ وَٱسْتَغْشَوْا۟ ثِيَابَهُمْ وَأَصَرُّوا۟ وَٱسْتَكْبَرُوا۟ ٱسْتِكْبَارًۭا
verses.translation: Whenever I called them to Your forgiveness, they thrust their fingers into their ears, and wrapped themselves in their garments, and insisted, and became more and more arrogant.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ إِنِّى دَعَوْتُهُمْ جِهَارًۭا
verses.translation: Then I called them openly.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ إِنِّىٓ أَعْلَنتُ لَهُمْ وَأَسْرَرْتُ لَهُمْ إِسْرَارًۭا
verses.translation: Then I appealed to them publicly, and I spoke to them privately.

verses.arabic: فَقُلْتُ ٱسْتَغْفِرُوا۟ رَبَّكُمْ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ غَفَّارًۭا
verses.translation: I said, 'Ask your Lord for forgiveness; He is Forgiving.

verses.arabic: يُرْسِلِ ٱلسَّمَآءَ عَلَيْكُم مِّدْرَارًۭا
verses.translation: He will let loose the sky upon you in torrents.

verses.arabic: وَيُمْدِدْكُم بِأَمْوَٰلٍۢ وَبَنِينَ وَيَجْعَل لَّكُمْ جَنَّٰتٍۢ وَيَجْعَل لَّكُمْ أَنْهَٰرًۭا
verses.translation: And provide you with wealth and children, and allot for you gardens, and allot for you rivers.

verses.arabic: مَّا لَكُمْ لَا تَرْجُونَ لِلَّهِ وَقَارًۭا
verses.translation: What is the matter with you, that you do not appreciate God's Greatness?

verses.arabic: وَقَدْ خَلَقَكُمْ أَطْوَارًا
verses.translation: Although He created you in stages.

verses.arabic: أَلَمْ تَرَوْا۟ كَيْفَ خَلَقَ ٱللَّهُ سَبْعَ سَمَٰوَٰتٍۢ طِبَاقًۭا
verses.translation: Do you not realize that God created seven heavens in layers?

verses.arabic: وَجَعَلَ ٱلْقَمَرَ فِيهِنَّ نُورًۭا وَجَعَلَ ٱلشَّمْسَ سِرَاجًۭا
verses.translation: And He set the moon in their midst for light, and He made the sun a lamp.

verses.arabic: وَٱللَّهُ أَنۢبَتَكُم مِّنَ ٱلْأَرْضِ نَبَاتًۭا
verses.translation: And God germinated you from the earth like plants.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ يُعِيدُكُمْ فِيهَا وَيُخْرِجُكُمْ إِخْرَاجًۭا
verses.translation: Then He will return you into it, and will bring you out again.

verses.arabic: وَٱللَّهُ جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلْأَرْضَ بِسَاطًۭا
verses.translation: And God made the earth a spread for you.

verses.arabic: لِّتَسْلُكُوا۟ مِنْهَا سُبُلًۭا فِجَاجًۭا
verses.translation: That you may travel its diverse roads.'"

verses.arabic: قَالَ نُوحٌۭ رَّبِّ إِنَّهُمْ عَصَوْنِى وَٱتَّبَعُوا۟ مَن لَّمْ يَزِدْهُ مَالُهُۥ وَوَلَدُهُۥٓ إِلَّا خَسَارًۭا
verses.translation: Noah said, "My Lord, they have defied me, and followed him whose wealth and children increase him only in perdition."

verses.arabic: وَمَكَرُوا۟ مَكْرًۭا كُبَّارًۭا
verses.translation: And they schemed outrageous schemes.

verses.arabic: وَقَالُوا۟ لَا تَذَرُنَّ ءَالِهَتَكُمْ وَلَا تَذَرُنَّ وَدًّۭا وَلَا سُوَاعًۭا وَلَا يَغُوثَ وَيَعُوقَ وَنَسْرًۭا
verses.translation: And they said, "Do not give up your gods; do not give up Wadd, nor Souwa, nor Yaghoos, and Yaooq, and Nassr.

verses.arabic: وَقَدْ أَضَلُّوا۟ كَثِيرًۭا ۖ وَلَا تَزِدِ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ إِلَّا ضَلَٰلًۭا
verses.translation: They have misled many, so do not increase the wrongdoers except in confusion."

verses.arabic: مِّمَّا خَطِيٓـَٰٔتِهِمْ أُغْرِقُوا۟ فَأُدْخِلُوا۟ نَارًۭا فَلَمْ يَجِدُوا۟ لَهُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ أَنصَارًۭا
verses.translation: Because of their wrongs, they were drowned, and were hurled into a Fire. They did not find apart from God any helpers.

verses.arabic: وَقَالَ نُوحٌۭ رَّبِّ لَا تَذَرْ عَلَى ٱلْأَرْضِ مِنَ ٱلْكَٰفِرِينَ دَيَّارًا
verses.translation: Noah said, "My Lord, do not leave of the unbelievers a single dweller on earth.

verses.arabic: إِنَّكَ إِن تَذَرْهُمْ يُضِلُّوا۟ عِبَادَكَ وَلَا يَلِدُوٓا۟ إِلَّا فَاجِرًۭا كَفَّارًۭا
verses.translation: If You leave them, they will mislead your servants, and will breed only wicked unbelievers.

verses.arabic: رَّبِّ ٱغْفِرْ لِى وَلِوَٰلِدَىَّ وَلِمَن دَخَلَ بَيْتِىَ مُؤْمِنًۭا وَلِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَٱلْمُؤْمِنَٰتِ وَلَا تَزِدِ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ إِلَّا تَبَارًۢا
verses.translation: My Lord! Forgive me and my parents, and anyone who enters my home in faith, and all the believing men and believing women; and do not increase the wrongdoers except in perdition."

verses.arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.translation: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.

verses.arabic: قُلْ أُوحِىَ إِلَىَّ أَنَّهُ ٱسْتَمَعَ نَفَرٌۭ مِّنَ ٱلْجِنِّ فَقَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّا سَمِعْنَا قُرْءَانًا عَجَبًۭا
verses.translation: Say, "It was revealed to me that a band of jinn listened in, and said, 'We have heard a wondrous Quran.

verses.arabic: يَهْدِىٓ إِلَى ٱلرُّشْدِ فَـَٔامَنَّا بِهِۦ ۖ وَلَن نُّشْرِكَ بِرَبِّنَآ أَحَدًۭا
verses.translation: It guides to rectitude, so we have believed in it; and we will never associate anyone with our Lord.

verses.arabic: وَأَنَّهُۥ تَعَٰلَىٰ جَدُّ رَبِّنَا مَا ٱتَّخَذَ صَٰحِبَةًۭ وَلَا وَلَدًۭا
verses.translation: And Exalted is the Grandeur of our Lord-He never had a mate, nor a child.

verses.arabic: وَأَنَّهُۥ كَانَ يَقُولُ سَفِيهُنَا عَلَى ٱللَّهِ شَطَطًۭا
verses.translation: But the fools among us used to say nonsense about God.

verses.arabic: وَأَنَّا ظَنَنَّآ أَن لَّن تَقُولَ ٱلْإِنسُ وَٱلْجِنُّ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبًۭا
verses.translation: And we thought that humans and jinn would never utter lies about God.

verses.arabic: وَأَنَّهُۥ كَانَ رِجَالٌۭ مِّنَ ٱلْإِنسِ يَعُوذُونَ بِرِجَالٍۢ مِّنَ ٱلْجِنِّ فَزَادُوهُمْ رَهَقًۭا
verses.translation: Some individual humans used to seek power through some individual jinn, but they only increased them in confusion.

verses.arabic: وَأَنَّهُمْ ظَنُّوا۟ كَمَا ظَنَنتُمْ أَن لَّن يَبْعَثَ ٱللَّهُ أَحَدًۭا
verses.translation: They thought, as you thought, that God would never resurrect anyone.

verses.arabic: وَأَنَّا لَمَسْنَا ٱلسَّمَآءَ فَوَجَدْنَٰهَا مُلِئَتْ حَرَسًۭا شَدِيدًۭا وَشُهُبًۭا
verses.translation: We probed the heaven, and found it filled with stern guards and projectiles.

verses.arabic: وَأَنَّا كُنَّا نَقْعُدُ مِنْهَا مَقَٰعِدَ لِلسَّمْعِ ۖ فَمَن يَسْتَمِعِ ٱلْءَانَ يَجِدْ لَهُۥ شِهَابًۭا رَّصَدًۭا
verses.translation: We used to take up positions to listen in; but whoever listens now finds a projectile in wait for him.

verses.arabic: وَأَنَّا لَا نَدْرِىٓ أَشَرٌّ أُرِيدَ بِمَن فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ أَمْ أَرَادَ بِهِمْ رَبُّهُمْ رَشَدًۭا
verses.translation: We do not know whether ill is intended for those on earth, or if their Lord intends goodness for them.

verses.arabic: وَأَنَّا مِنَّا ٱلصَّٰلِحُونَ وَمِنَّا دُونَ ذَٰلِكَ ۖ كُنَّا طَرَآئِقَ قِدَدًۭا
verses.translation: Some of us are righteous, but some of us are less than that; we follow divergent paths.

verses.arabic: وَأَنَّا ظَنَنَّآ أَن لَّن نُّعْجِزَ ٱللَّهَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَلَن نُّعْجِزَهُۥ هَرَبًۭا
verses.translation: We realized that we cannot defeat God on earth, and that we cannot escape Him by fleeing.

verses.arabic: وَأَنَّا لَمَّا سَمِعْنَا ٱلْهُدَىٰٓ ءَامَنَّا بِهِۦ ۖ فَمَن يُؤْمِنۢ بِرَبِّهِۦ فَلَا يَخَافُ بَخْسًۭا وَلَا رَهَقًۭا
verses.translation: And when we heard the guidance, we believed in it. Whoever believes in his Lord fears neither loss, nor burden.

verses.arabic: وَأَنَّا مِنَّا ٱلْمُسْلِمُونَ وَمِنَّا ٱلْقَٰسِطُونَ ۖ فَمَنْ أَسْلَمَ فَأُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ تَحَرَّوْا۟ رَشَدًۭا
verses.translation: Among us are those who are submitting, and among us are the compromisers. As for those who have submitted-it is they who pursue rectitude.

verses.arabic: وَأَمَّا ٱلْقَٰسِطُونَ فَكَانُوا۟ لِجَهَنَّمَ حَطَبًۭا
verses.translation: But as for the compromisers-they will be firewood for Hell.'"

verses.arabic: وَأَلَّوِ ٱسْتَقَٰمُوا۟ عَلَى ٱلطَّرِيقَةِ لَأَسْقَيْنَٰهُم مَّآءً غَدَقًۭا
verses.translation: Had they kept true to the Path, We would have given them plenty water to drink.

verses.arabic: لِّنَفْتِنَهُمْ فِيهِ ۚ وَمَن يُعْرِضْ عَن ذِكْرِ رَبِّهِۦ يَسْلُكْهُ عَذَابًۭا صَعَدًۭا
verses.translation: To test them with it. Whoever turns away from the remembrance of his Lord, He will direct him to torment ever mounting.

verses.arabic: وَأَنَّ ٱلْمَسَٰجِدَ لِلَّهِ فَلَا تَدْعُوا۟ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ أَحَدًۭا
verses.translation: The places of worship are for God. So do not call, besides God, upon anyone else.

verses.arabic: وَأَنَّهُۥ لَمَّا قَامَ عَبْدُ ٱللَّهِ يَدْعُوهُ كَادُوا۟ يَكُونُونَ عَلَيْهِ لِبَدًۭا
verses.translation: And when the servant of God got up calling on Him, they almost fell on him in a mass.

verses.arabic: قُلْ إِنَّمَآ أَدْعُوا۟ رَبِّى وَلَآ أُشْرِكُ بِهِۦٓ أَحَدًۭا
verses.translation: Say, "I pray only to my Lord, and I never associate anyone with Him."

verses.arabic: قُلْ إِنِّى لَآ أَمْلِكُ لَكُمْ ضَرًّۭا وَلَا رَشَدًۭا
verses.translation: Say, "It is not in my power to harm you, nor to bring you to right conduct."

verses.arabic: قُلْ إِنِّى لَن يُجِيرَنِى مِنَ ٱللَّهِ أَحَدٌۭ وَلَنْ أَجِدَ مِن دُونِهِۦ مُلْتَحَدًا
verses.translation: Say, "No one can protect me from God, and I will not find any refuge except with Him.

verses.arabic: إِلَّا بَلَٰغًۭا مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَرِسَٰلَٰتِهِۦ ۚ وَمَن يَعْصِ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ فَإِنَّ لَهُۥ نَارَ جَهَنَّمَ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدًا
verses.translation: Except for a proclamation from God and His messages. He who defies God and His Messenger-for him is the Fire of Hell, in which they will dwell forever."

verses.arabic: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا رَأَوْا۟ مَا يُوعَدُونَ فَسَيَعْلَمُونَ مَنْ أَضْعَفُ نَاصِرًۭا وَأَقَلُّ عَدَدًۭا
verses.translation: Until, when they see what they were promised, they will know who is weaker in helpers, and fewer in numbers.

verses.arabic: قُلْ إِنْ أَدْرِىٓ أَقَرِيبٌۭ مَّا تُوعَدُونَ أَمْ يَجْعَلُ لَهُۥ رَبِّىٓ أَمَدًا
verses.translation: Say, "I do not know whether what you are promised is near, or whether my Lord will extend it for a period."

verses.arabic: عَٰلِمُ ٱلْغَيْبِ فَلَا يُظْهِرُ عَلَىٰ غَيْبِهِۦٓ أَحَدًا
verses.translation: The Knower of the Invisible; He does not disclose His Invisible to anyone.

verses.arabic: إِلَّا مَنِ ٱرْتَضَىٰ مِن رَّسُولٍۢ فَإِنَّهُۥ يَسْلُكُ مِنۢ بَيْنِ يَدَيْهِ وَمِنْ خَلْفِهِۦ رَصَدًۭا
verses.translation: Except to a Messenger of His choosing. He then dispatches guards before him and behind him.

verses.arabic: لِّيَعْلَمَ أَن قَدْ أَبْلَغُوا۟ رِسَٰلَٰتِ رَبِّهِمْ وَأَحَاطَ بِمَا لَدَيْهِمْ وَأَحْصَىٰ كُلَّ شَىْءٍ عَدَدًۢا
verses.translation: That He may know that they have conveyed the messages of their Lord. He encompasses what they have, and has tallied everything by number.

verses.arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.translation: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.

verses.arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلْمُزَّمِّلُ
verses.translation: O you Enwrapped one.

verses.arabic: قُمِ ٱلَّيْلَ إِلَّا قَلِيلًۭا
verses.translation: Stay up during the night, except a little.

verses.arabic: نِّصْفَهُۥٓ أَوِ ٱنقُصْ مِنْهُ قَلِيلًا
verses.translation: For half of it, or reduce it a little.

verses.arabic: أَوْ زِدْ عَلَيْهِ وَرَتِّلِ ٱلْقُرْءَانَ تَرْتِيلًا
verses.translation: Or add to it; and chant the Quran rhythmically.

verses.arabic: إِنَّا سَنُلْقِى عَلَيْكَ قَوْلًۭا ثَقِيلًا
verses.translation: We are about to give you a heavy message.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ نَاشِئَةَ ٱلَّيْلِ هِىَ أَشَدُّ وَطْـًۭٔا وَأَقْوَمُ قِيلًا
verses.translation: The vigil of night is more effective, and better suited for recitation.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ لَكَ فِى ٱلنَّهَارِ سَبْحًۭا طَوِيلًۭا
verses.translation: In the daytime, you have lengthy work to do.

verses.arabic: وَٱذْكُرِ ٱسْمَ رَبِّكَ وَتَبَتَّلْ إِلَيْهِ تَبْتِيلًۭا
verses.translation: So remember the Name of your Lord, and devote yourself to Him wholeheartedly.

verses.arabic: رَّبُّ ٱلْمَشْرِقِ وَٱلْمَغْرِبِ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ فَٱتَّخِذْهُ وَكِيلًۭا
verses.translation: Lord of the East and the West. There is no god but He, so take Him as a Trustee.

verses.arabic: وَٱصْبِرْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَٱهْجُرْهُمْ هَجْرًۭا جَمِيلًۭا
verses.translation: And endure patiently what they say, and withdraw from them politely.

verses.arabic: وَذَرْنِى وَٱلْمُكَذِّبِينَ أُو۟لِى ٱلنَّعْمَةِ وَمَهِّلْهُمْ قَلِيلًا
verses.translation: And leave Me to those who deny the truth, those of luxury, and give them a brief respite.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ لَدَيْنَآ أَنكَالًۭا وَجَحِيمًۭا
verses.translation: With Us are shackles, and a Fierce Fire.

verses.arabic: وَطَعَامًۭا ذَا غُصَّةٍۢ وَعَذَابًا أَلِيمًۭا
verses.translation: And food that chokes, and a painful punishment.

verses.arabic: يَوْمَ تَرْجُفُ ٱلْأَرْضُ وَٱلْجِبَالُ وَكَانَتِ ٱلْجِبَالُ كَثِيبًۭا مَّهِيلًا
verses.translation: On the Day when the earth and the mountains tremble, and the mountains become heaps of sand.

verses.arabic: إِنَّآ أَرْسَلْنَآ إِلَيْكُمْ رَسُولًۭا شَٰهِدًا عَلَيْكُمْ كَمَآ أَرْسَلْنَآ إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ رَسُولًۭا
verses.translation: We have sent to you a messenger, a witness over you, as We sent to Pharaoh a messenger.

verses.arabic: فَعَصَىٰ فِرْعَوْنُ ٱلرَّسُولَ فَأَخَذْنَٰهُ أَخْذًۭا وَبِيلًۭا
verses.translation: But Pharaoh defied the Messenger, so We seized him with a terrible seizing.

verses.arabic: فَكَيْفَ تَتَّقُونَ إِن كَفَرْتُمْ يَوْمًۭا يَجْعَلُ ٱلْوِلْدَٰنَ شِيبًا
verses.translation: So how will you, if you persist in unbelief, save yourself from a Day which will turn the children gray-haired?

verses.arabic: ٱلسَّمَآءُ مُنفَطِرٌۢ بِهِۦ ۚ كَانَ وَعْدُهُۥ مَفْعُولًا
verses.translation: The heaven will shatter thereby. His promise is always fulfilled.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ هَٰذِهِۦ تَذْكِرَةٌۭ ۖ فَمَن شَآءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ سَبِيلًا
verses.translation: This is a reminder. So whoever wills, let him take a path to his Lord.

verses.arabic: ۞ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ يَعْلَمُ أَنَّكَ تَقُومُ أَدْنَىٰ مِن ثُلُثَىِ ٱلَّيْلِ وَنِصْفَهُۥ وَثُلُثَهُۥ وَطَآئِفَةٌۭ مِّنَ ٱلَّذِينَ مَعَكَ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ يُقَدِّرُ ٱلَّيْلَ وَٱلنَّهَارَ ۚ عَلِمَ أَن لَّن تُحْصُوهُ فَتَابَ عَلَيْكُمْ ۖ فَٱقْرَءُوا۟ مَا تَيَسَّرَ مِنَ ٱلْقُرْءَانِ ۚ عَلِمَ أَن سَيَكُونُ مِنكُم مَّرْضَىٰ ۙ وَءَاخَرُونَ يَضْرِبُونَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ يَبْتَغُونَ مِن فَضْلِ ٱللَّهِ ۙ وَءَاخَرُونَ يُقَٰتِلُونَ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ ۖ فَٱقْرَءُوا۟ مَا تَيَسَّرَ مِنْهُ ۚ وَأَقِيمُوا۟ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَءَاتُوا۟ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَأَقْرِضُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ قَرْضًا حَسَنًۭا ۚ وَمَا تُقَدِّمُوا۟ لِأَنفُسِكُم مِّنْ خَيْرٍۢ تَجِدُوهُ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ هُوَ خَيْرًۭا وَأَعْظَمَ أَجْرًۭا ۚ وَٱسْتَغْفِرُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ ۖ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٌۭ رَّحِيمٌۢ
verses.translation: Your Lord knows that you stay up nearly two-thirds of the night, or half of it, or one-third of it, along with a group of those with you. God designed the night and the day. He knows that you are unable to sustain it, so He has pardoned you. So read of the Quran what is possible for you. He knows that some of you may be ill; and others travelling through the land, seeking God's bounty; and others fighting in God's cause. So read of it what is possible for you, and observe the prayers, and give regular charity, and lend God a generous loan. Whatever good you advance for yourselves, you will find it with God, better and generously rewarded. And seek God's forgiveness, for God is Forgiving and Merciful.

verses.arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.translation: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.

verses.arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلْمُدَّثِّرُ
verses.translation: O you Enrobed one.

verses.arabic: قُمْ فَأَنذِرْ
verses.translation: Arise and warn.

verses.arabic: وَرَبَّكَ فَكَبِّرْ
verses.translation: And magnify your Lord.

verses.arabic: وَثِيَابَكَ فَطَهِّرْ
verses.translation: And purify your clothes.

verses.arabic: وَٱلرُّجْزَ فَٱهْجُرْ
verses.translation: And abandon abominations.

verses.arabic: وَلَا تَمْنُن تَسْتَكْثِرُ
verses.translation: And show no favor seeking gain.

verses.arabic: وَلِرَبِّكَ فَٱصْبِرْ
verses.translation: And be constant for your Lord.

verses.arabic: فَإِذَا نُقِرَ فِى ٱلنَّاقُورِ
verses.translation: When the Trumpet is blown.

verses.arabic: فَذَٰلِكَ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ يَوْمٌ عَسِيرٌ
verses.translation: That Day will be a difficult day.

verses.arabic: عَلَى ٱلْكَٰفِرِينَ غَيْرُ يَسِيرٍۢ
verses.translation: For the disbelievers-not easy.

verses.arabic: ذَرْنِى وَمَنْ خَلَقْتُ وَحِيدًۭا
verses.translation: Leave Me to him whom I created alone.

verses.arabic: وَجَعَلْتُ لَهُۥ مَالًۭا مَّمْدُودًۭا
verses.translation: And gave him vast wealth.

verses.arabic: وَبَنِينَ شُهُودًۭا
verses.translation: And children as witnesses.

verses.arabic: وَمَهَّدتُّ لَهُۥ تَمْهِيدًۭا
verses.translation: And smoothed things for him.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ يَطْمَعُ أَنْ أَزِيدَ
verses.translation: Then he wants Me to add yet more!

verses.arabic: كَلَّآ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ لِءَايَٰتِنَا عَنِيدًۭا
verses.translation: By no means! He was stubborn towards Our revelations.

verses.arabic: سَأُرْهِقُهُۥ صَعُودًا
verses.translation: I will exhaust him increasingly.

verses.arabic: إِنَّهُۥ فَكَّرَ وَقَدَّرَ
verses.translation: He thought and analyzed.

verses.arabic: فَقُتِلَ كَيْفَ قَدَّرَ
verses.translation: May he perish, how he analyzed.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ قُتِلَ كَيْفَ قَدَّرَ
verses.translation: Again: may he perish, how he analyzed.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ نَظَرَ
verses.translation: Then he looked.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ عَبَسَ وَبَسَرَ
verses.translation: Then he frowned and whined.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ أَدْبَرَ وَٱسْتَكْبَرَ
verses.translation: Then he turned back and was proud.

verses.arabic: فَقَالَ إِنْ هَٰذَآ إِلَّا سِحْرٌۭ يُؤْثَرُ
verses.translation: And said, "This is nothing but magic from the past.

verses.arabic: إِنْ هَٰذَآ إِلَّا قَوْلُ ٱلْبَشَرِ
verses.translation: This is nothing but the word of a mortal."

verses.arabic: سَأُصْلِيهِ سَقَرَ
verses.translation: I will roast him in Saqar.

verses.arabic: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا سَقَرُ
verses.translation: But what will explain to you what Saqar is?

verses.arabic: لَا تُبْقِى وَلَا تَذَرُ
verses.translation: It neither leaves, nor spares.

verses.arabic: لَوَّاحَةٌۭ لِّلْبَشَرِ
verses.translation: It scorches the flesh.

verses.arabic: عَلَيْهَا تِسْعَةَ عَشَرَ
verses.translation: Over it are Nineteen.

verses.arabic: وَمَا جَعَلْنَآ أَصْحَٰبَ ٱلنَّارِ إِلَّا مَلَٰٓئِكَةًۭ ۙ وَمَا جَعَلْنَا عِدَّتَهُمْ إِلَّا فِتْنَةًۭ لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ لِيَسْتَيْقِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُوا۟ ٱلْكِتَٰبَ وَيَزْدَادَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ إِيمَٰنًۭا ۙ وَلَا يَرْتَابَ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُوا۟ ٱلْكِتَٰبَ وَٱلْمُؤْمِنُونَ ۙ وَلِيَقُولَ ٱلَّذِينَ فِى قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٌۭ وَٱلْكَٰفِرُونَ مَاذَآ أَرَادَ ٱللَّهُ بِهَٰذَا مَثَلًۭا ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ يُضِلُّ ٱللَّهُ مَن يَشَآءُ وَيَهْدِى مَن يَشَآءُ ۚ وَمَا يَعْلَمُ جُنُودَ رَبِّكَ إِلَّا هُوَ ۚ وَمَا هِىَ إِلَّا ذِكْرَىٰ لِلْبَشَرِ
verses.translation: We have appointed only angels to be wardens of the Fire, and caused their number to be a stumbling block for those who disbelieve; so that those given the Scripture may attain certainty; and those who believe may increase in faith; and those given the Scripture and the believers may not doubt; and those in whose hearts is sickness and the unbelievers may say, "What did God intend by this parable?" Thus God leads astray whom He wills, and guides whom He wills. None knows the soldiers of your Lord except He. This is nothing but a reminder for the mortals.

verses.arabic: كَلَّا وَٱلْقَمَرِ
verses.translation: Nay! By the moon.

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّيْلِ إِذْ أَدْبَرَ
verses.translation: And the night as it retreats.

verses.arabic: وَٱلصُّبْحِ إِذَآ أَسْفَرَ
verses.translation: And the morning as it lights up.

verses.arabic: إِنَّهَا لَإِحْدَى ٱلْكُبَرِ
verses.translation: It is one of the greatest.

verses.arabic: نَذِيرًۭا لِّلْبَشَرِ
verses.translation: A warning to the mortals.

verses.arabic: لِمَن شَآءَ مِنكُمْ أَن يَتَقَدَّمَ أَوْ يَتَأَخَّرَ
verses.translation: To whomever among you wishes to advance, or regress.

verses.arabic: كُلُّ نَفْسٍۭ بِمَا كَسَبَتْ رَهِينَةٌ
verses.translation: Every soul is hostage to what it has earned.

verses.arabic: إِلَّآ أَصْحَٰبَ ٱلْيَمِينِ
verses.translation: Except for those on the Right.

verses.arabic: فِى جَنَّٰتٍۢ يَتَسَآءَلُونَ
verses.translation: In Gardens, inquiring.

verses.arabic: عَنِ ٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ
verses.translation: About the guilty.

verses.arabic: مَا سَلَكَكُمْ فِى سَقَرَ
verses.translation: "What drove you into Saqar?"

verses.arabic: قَالُوا۟ لَمْ نَكُ مِنَ ٱلْمُصَلِّينَ
verses.translation: They will say, "We were not of those who prayed.

verses.arabic: وَلَمْ نَكُ نُطْعِمُ ٱلْمِسْكِينَ
verses.translation: Nor did we feed the destitute.

verses.arabic: وَكُنَّا نَخُوضُ مَعَ ٱلْخَآئِضِينَ
verses.translation: And we used to indulge with those who indulge.

verses.arabic: وَكُنَّا نُكَذِّبُ بِيَوْمِ ٱلدِّينِ
verses.translation: And we used to deny the Day of Judgment.

verses.arabic: حَتَّىٰٓ أَتَىٰنَا ٱلْيَقِينُ
verses.translation: Until the Inevitable came upon us."

verses.arabic: فَمَا تَنفَعُهُمْ شَفَٰعَةُ ٱلشَّٰفِعِينَ
verses.translation: But the intercession of intercessors will not help them.

verses.arabic: فَمَا لَهُمْ عَنِ ٱلتَّذْكِرَةِ مُعْرِضِينَ
verses.translation: Why are they turning away from the Reminder?

verses.arabic: كَأَنَّهُمْ حُمُرٌۭ مُّسْتَنفِرَةٌۭ
verses.translation: As though they were panicked donkeys.

verses.arabic: فَرَّتْ مِن قَسْوَرَةٍۭ
verses.translation: Fleeing from a lion?

verses.arabic: بَلْ يُرِيدُ كُلُّ ٱمْرِئٍۢ مِّنْهُمْ أَن يُؤْتَىٰ صُحُفًۭا مُّنَشَّرَةًۭ
verses.translation: Yet every one of them desires to be given scrolls unrolled.

verses.arabic: كَلَّا ۖ بَل لَّا يَخَافُونَ ٱلْءَاخِرَةَ
verses.translation: No indeed! But they do not fear the Hereafter.

verses.arabic: كَلَّآ إِنَّهُۥ تَذْكِرَةٌۭ
verses.translation: Nevertheless, it is a reminder.

verses.arabic: فَمَن شَآءَ ذَكَرَهُۥ
verses.translation: So whoever wills, shall remember it.

verses.arabic: وَمَا يَذْكُرُونَ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُ ۚ هُوَ أَهْلُ ٱلتَّقْوَىٰ وَأَهْلُ ٱلْمَغْفِرَةِ
verses.translation: But they will not remember, unless God wills. He is the Source of Righteousness, and the Source of Forgiveness.

verses.arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.translation: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.

verses.arabic: لَآ أُقْسِمُ بِيَوْمِ ٱلْقِيَٰمَةِ
verses.translation: I swear by the Day of Resurrection.

verses.arabic: وَلَآ أُقْسِمُ بِٱلنَّفْسِ ٱللَّوَّامَةِ
verses.translation: And I swear by the blaming soul.

verses.arabic: أَيَحْسَبُ ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ أَلَّن نَّجْمَعَ عِظَامَهُۥ
verses.translation: Does man think that We will not reassemble his bones?

verses.arabic: بَلَىٰ قَٰدِرِينَ عَلَىٰٓ أَن نُّسَوِّىَ بَنَانَهُۥ
verses.translation: Yes indeed; We are Able to reconstruct his fingertips.

verses.arabic: بَلْ يُرِيدُ ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ لِيَفْجُرَ أَمَامَهُۥ
verses.translation: But man wants to deny what is ahead of him.

verses.arabic: يَسْـَٔلُ أَيَّانَ يَوْمُ ٱلْقِيَٰمَةِ
verses.translation: He asks, "When is the Day of Resurrection?"

verses.arabic: فَإِذَا بَرِقَ ٱلْبَصَرُ
verses.translation: When vision is dazzled.

verses.arabic: وَخَسَفَ ٱلْقَمَرُ
verses.translation: And the moon is eclipsed.

verses.arabic: وَجُمِعَ ٱلشَّمْسُ وَٱلْقَمَرُ
verses.translation: And the sun and the moon are joined together.

verses.arabic: يَقُولُ ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ يَوْمَئِذٍ أَيْنَ ٱلْمَفَرُّ
verses.translation: On that Day, man will say, "Where is the escape?"

verses.arabic: كَلَّا لَا وَزَرَ
verses.translation: No indeed! There is no refuge.

verses.arabic: إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ يَوْمَئِذٍ ٱلْمُسْتَقَرُّ
verses.translation: To your Lord on that Day is the settlement.

verses.arabic: يُنَبَّؤُا۟ ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ يَوْمَئِذٍۭ بِمَا قَدَّمَ وَأَخَّرَ
verses.translation: On that Day man will be informed of everything he put forward, and everything he left behind.

verses.arabic: بَلِ ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ عَلَىٰ نَفْسِهِۦ بَصِيرَةٌۭ
verses.translation: And man will be evidence against himself.

verses.arabic: وَلَوْ أَلْقَىٰ مَعَاذِيرَهُۥ
verses.translation: Even as he presents his excuses.

verses.arabic: لَا تُحَرِّكْ بِهِۦ لِسَانَكَ لِتَعْجَلَ بِهِۦٓ
verses.translation: Do not wag your tongue with it, to hurry on with it.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ عَلَيْنَا جَمْعَهُۥ وَقُرْءَانَهُۥ
verses.translation: Upon Us is its collection and its recitation.

verses.arabic: فَإِذَا قَرَأْنَٰهُ فَٱتَّبِعْ قُرْءَانَهُۥ
verses.translation: Then, when We have recited it, follow its recitation.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ إِنَّ عَلَيْنَا بَيَانَهُۥ
verses.translation: Then upon Us is its explanation.

verses.arabic: كَلَّا بَلْ تُحِبُّونَ ٱلْعَاجِلَةَ
verses.translation: Alas, you love the fleeting life.

verses.arabic: وَتَذَرُونَ ٱلْءَاخِرَةَ
verses.translation: And you disregard the Hereafter.

verses.arabic: وُجُوهٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ نَّاضِرَةٌ
verses.translation: Faces on that Day will be radiant.

verses.arabic: إِلَىٰ رَبِّهَا نَاظِرَةٌۭ
verses.translation: Looking towards their Lord.

verses.arabic: وَوُجُوهٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍۭ بَاسِرَةٌۭ
verses.translation: And faces on that Day will be gloomy.

verses.arabic: تَظُنُّ أَن يُفْعَلَ بِهَا فَاقِرَةٌۭ
verses.translation: Realizing that a back-breaker has befallen them.

verses.arabic: كَلَّآ إِذَا بَلَغَتِ ٱلتَّرَاقِىَ
verses.translation: Indeed, when it has reached the breast-bones.

verses.arabic: وَقِيلَ مَنْ ۜ رَاقٍۢ
verses.translation: And it is said, "Who is the healer?"

verses.arabic: وَظَنَّ أَنَّهُ ٱلْفِرَاقُ
verses.translation: And He realizes that it is the parting.

verses.arabic: وَٱلْتَفَّتِ ٱلسَّاقُ بِٱلسَّاقِ
verses.translation: And leg is entwined with leg.

verses.arabic: إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ يَوْمَئِذٍ ٱلْمَسَاقُ
verses.translation: To your Lord on that Day is the drive.

verses.arabic: فَلَا صَدَّقَ وَلَا صَلَّىٰ
verses.translation: He neither believed nor prayed.

verses.arabic: وَلَٰكِن كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ
verses.translation: But he denied and turned away.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ ذَهَبَ إِلَىٰٓ أَهْلِهِۦ يَتَمَطَّىٰٓ
verses.translation: Then he went to his family, full of pride.

verses.arabic: أَوْلَىٰ لَكَ فَأَوْلَىٰ
verses.translation: Woe to you; and woe.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ أَوْلَىٰ لَكَ فَأَوْلَىٰٓ
verses.translation: Then again: Woe to you; and woe.

verses.arabic: أَيَحْسَبُ ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ أَن يُتْرَكَ سُدًى
verses.translation: Does man think that he will be left without purpose?

verses.arabic: أَلَمْ يَكُ نُطْفَةًۭ مِّن مَّنِىٍّۢ يُمْنَىٰ
verses.translation: Was he not a drop of ejaculated semen?

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ كَانَ عَلَقَةًۭ فَخَلَقَ فَسَوَّىٰ
verses.translation: Then he became a clot. And He created and proportioned?

verses.arabic: فَجَعَلَ مِنْهُ ٱلزَّوْجَيْنِ ٱلذَّكَرَ وَٱلْأُنثَىٰٓ
verses.translation: And made of him the two sexes, the male and the female?

verses.arabic: أَلَيْسَ ذَٰلِكَ بِقَٰدِرٍ عَلَىٰٓ أَن يُحْۦِىَ ٱلْمَوْتَىٰ
verses.translation: Is He not Able to revive the dead?

verses.arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.translation: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.

verses.arabic: هَلْ أَتَىٰ عَلَى ٱلْإِنسَٰنِ حِينٌۭ مِّنَ ٱلدَّهْرِ لَمْ يَكُن شَيْـًۭٔا مَّذْكُورًا
verses.translation: Has there come upon man a period of time when he was nothing to be mentioned?

verses.arabic: إِنَّا خَلَقْنَا ٱلْإِنسَٰنَ مِن نُّطْفَةٍ أَمْشَاجٍۢ نَّبْتَلِيهِ فَجَعَلْنَٰهُ سَمِيعًۢا بَصِيرًا
verses.translation: We created man from a liquid mixture, to test him; and We made him hearing and seeing.

verses.arabic: إِنَّا هَدَيْنَٰهُ ٱلسَّبِيلَ إِمَّا شَاكِرًۭا وَإِمَّا كَفُورًا
verses.translation: We guided him to the way, be he appreciative or unappreciative.

verses.arabic: إِنَّآ أَعْتَدْنَا لِلْكَٰفِرِينَ سَلَٰسِلَا۟ وَأَغْلَٰلًۭا وَسَعِيرًا
verses.translation: We have prepared for the faithless chains, and yokes, and a Searing Fire.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلْأَبْرَارَ يَشْرَبُونَ مِن كَأْسٍۢ كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا كَافُورًا
verses.translation: But the righteous will drink from a cup whose mixture is aroma.

verses.arabic: عَيْنًۭا يَشْرَبُ بِهَا عِبَادُ ٱللَّهِ يُفَجِّرُونَهَا تَفْجِيرًۭا
verses.translation: A spring from which the servants of God will drink, making it gush abundantly.

verses.arabic: يُوفُونَ بِٱلنَّذْرِ وَيَخَافُونَ يَوْمًۭا كَانَ شَرُّهُۥ مُسْتَطِيرًۭا
verses.translation: They fulfill their vows, and dread a Day whose ill is widespread.

verses.arabic: وَيُطْعِمُونَ ٱلطَّعَامَ عَلَىٰ حُبِّهِۦ مِسْكِينًۭا وَيَتِيمًۭا وَأَسِيرًا
verses.translation: And they feed, for the love of Him, the poor, and the orphan, and the captive.

verses.arabic: إِنَّمَا نُطْعِمُكُمْ لِوَجْهِ ٱللَّهِ لَا نُرِيدُ مِنكُمْ جَزَآءًۭ وَلَا شُكُورًا
verses.translation: "We only feed you for the sake of God. We want from you neither compensation, nor gratitude.

verses.arabic: إِنَّا نَخَافُ مِن رَّبِّنَا يَوْمًا عَبُوسًۭا قَمْطَرِيرًۭا
verses.translation: We dread from our Lord a frowning grim Day."

verses.arabic: فَوَقَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّهُ شَرَّ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْيَوْمِ وَلَقَّىٰهُمْ نَضْرَةًۭ وَسُرُورًۭا
verses.translation: So God will protect them from the ills of that Day, and will grant them radiance and joy.

verses.arabic: وَجَزَىٰهُم بِمَا صَبَرُوا۟ جَنَّةًۭ وَحَرِيرًۭا
verses.translation: And will reward them for their patience with a Garden and silk.

verses.arabic: مُّتَّكِـِٔينَ فِيهَا عَلَى ٱلْأَرَآئِكِ ۖ لَا يَرَوْنَ فِيهَا شَمْسًۭا وَلَا زَمْهَرِيرًۭا
verses.translation: Reclining therein on the thrones; experiencing therein neither sun, nor frost.

verses.arabic: وَدَانِيَةً عَلَيْهِمْ ظِلَٰلُهَا وَذُلِّلَتْ قُطُوفُهَا تَذْلِيلًۭا
verses.translation: Its shade hovering over them, and its fruit brought low within reach.

verses.arabic: وَيُطَافُ عَلَيْهِم بِـَٔانِيَةٍۢ مِّن فِضَّةٍۢ وَأَكْوَابٍۢ كَانَتْ قَوَارِيرَا۠
verses.translation: Passing around them are vessels of silver, and cups of crystal.

verses.arabic: قَوَارِيرَا۟ مِن فِضَّةٍۢ قَدَّرُوهَا تَقْدِيرًۭا
verses.translation: Crystal of silver-they measured them exactly.

verses.arabic: وَيُسْقَوْنَ فِيهَا كَأْسًۭا كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا زَنجَبِيلًا
verses.translation: They will be served therein with a cup whose flavor is Zanjabeel.

verses.arabic: عَيْنًۭا فِيهَا تُسَمَّىٰ سَلْسَبِيلًۭا
verses.translation: A spring therein named Salsabeel.

verses.arabic: ۞ وَيَطُوفُ عَلَيْهِمْ وِلْدَٰنٌۭ مُّخَلَّدُونَ إِذَا رَأَيْتَهُمْ حَسِبْتَهُمْ لُؤْلُؤًۭا مَّنثُورًۭا
verses.translation: Passing among them are eternalized youths. If you see them, you would think them sprinkled pearls.

verses.arabic: وَإِذَا رَأَيْتَ ثَمَّ رَأَيْتَ نَعِيمًۭا وَمُلْكًۭا كَبِيرًا
verses.translation: Wherever you look, you see bliss, and a vast kingdom.

verses.arabic: عَٰلِيَهُمْ ثِيَابُ سُندُسٍ خُضْرٌۭ وَإِسْتَبْرَقٌۭ ۖ وَحُلُّوٓا۟ أَسَاوِرَ مِن فِضَّةٍۢ وَسَقَىٰهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ شَرَابًۭا طَهُورًا
verses.translation: Upon them are garments of green silk, and satin. And they will be adorned with bracelets of silver. And their Lord will offer them a pure drink.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ هَٰذَا كَانَ لَكُمْ جَزَآءًۭ وَكَانَ سَعْيُكُم مَّشْكُورًا
verses.translation: "This is a reward for you. Your efforts are well appreciated."

verses.arabic: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نَزَّلْنَا عَلَيْكَ ٱلْقُرْءَانَ تَنزِيلًۭا
verses.translation: It is We who sent down the Quran upon you-a gradual revelation.

verses.arabic: فَٱصْبِرْ لِحُكْمِ رَبِّكَ وَلَا تُطِعْ مِنْهُمْ ءَاثِمًا أَوْ كَفُورًۭا
verses.translation: So be patient for the decision of your Lord, and do not obey the sinner or the blasphemer among them.

verses.arabic: وَٱذْكُرِ ٱسْمَ رَبِّكَ بُكْرَةًۭ وَأَصِيلًۭا
verses.translation: And mention the Name of your Lord, morning and evening.

verses.arabic: وَمِنَ ٱلَّيْلِ فَٱسْجُدْ لَهُۥ وَسَبِّحْهُ لَيْلًۭا طَوِيلًا
verses.translation: And for part of the night, prostrate yourself to Him, and glorify Him long into the night.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ يُحِبُّونَ ٱلْعَاجِلَةَ وَيَذَرُونَ وَرَآءَهُمْ يَوْمًۭا ثَقِيلًۭا
verses.translation: As for these: they love the fleeting life, and leave behind a Heavy Day.

verses.arabic: نَّحْنُ خَلَقْنَٰهُمْ وَشَدَدْنَآ أَسْرَهُمْ ۖ وَإِذَا شِئْنَا بَدَّلْنَآ أَمْثَٰلَهُمْ تَبْدِيلًا
verses.translation: We created them, and strengthened their frame; and whenever We will, We can replace them with others like them.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ هَٰذِهِۦ تَذْكِرَةٌۭ ۖ فَمَن شَآءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ سَبِيلًۭا
verses.translation: This is a reminder; so whoever wills, let him take a path to his Lord.

verses.arabic: وَمَا تَشَآءُونَ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ عَلِيمًا حَكِيمًۭا
verses.translation: Yet you cannot will, unless God wills. God is Knowing and Wise.

verses.arabic: يُدْخِلُ مَن يَشَآءُ فِى رَحْمَتِهِۦ ۚ وَٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ أَعَدَّ لَهُمْ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًۢا
verses.translation: He admits into His mercy whomever He wills. But as for the wrongdoers, He has prepared for them a painful punishment.

verses.arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.translation: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.

verses.arabic: وَٱلْمُرْسَلَٰتِ عُرْفًۭا
verses.translation: By those unleashed in succession.

verses.arabic: فَٱلْعَٰصِفَٰتِ عَصْفًۭا
verses.translation: Storming turbulently.

verses.arabic: وَٱلنَّٰشِرَٰتِ نَشْرًۭا
verses.translation: Scattering far and wide.

verses.arabic: فَٱلْفَٰرِقَٰتِ فَرْقًۭا
verses.translation: Separating decisively.

verses.arabic: فَٱلْمُلْقِيَٰتِ ذِكْرًا
verses.translation: Delivering a message.

verses.arabic: عُذْرًا أَوْ نُذْرًا
verses.translation: Excusing or warning.

verses.arabic: إِنَّمَا تُوعَدُونَ لَوَٰقِعٌۭ
verses.translation: Surely what you are promised will happen.

verses.arabic: فَإِذَا ٱلنُّجُومُ طُمِسَتْ
verses.translation: When the stars are obliterated.

verses.arabic: وَإِذَا ٱلسَّمَآءُ فُرِجَتْ
verses.translation: And the sky is fractured.

verses.arabic: وَإِذَا ٱلْجِبَالُ نُسِفَتْ
verses.translation: And the mountains are blown away.

verses.arabic: وَإِذَا ٱلرُّسُلُ أُقِّتَتْ
verses.translation: And the messengers are alerted.

verses.arabic: لِأَىِّ يَوْمٍ أُجِّلَتْ
verses.translation: Until which day is it deferred?

verses.arabic: لِيَوْمِ ٱلْفَصْلِ
verses.translation: Until the Day of Decision.

verses.arabic: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا يَوْمُ ٱلْفَصْلِ
verses.translation: And what will teach you what the Day of Decision is?

verses.arabic: وَيْلٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe on that Day to the liars.

verses.arabic: أَلَمْ نُهْلِكِ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.translation: Did We not destroy the ancients?

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ نُتْبِعُهُمُ ٱلْءَاخِرِينَ
verses.translation: Then succeeded them with the others?

verses.arabic: كَذَٰلِكَ نَفْعَلُ بِٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ
verses.translation: This is how We deal with the guilty.

verses.arabic: وَيْلٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe on that Day to the rejecters.

verses.arabic: أَلَمْ نَخْلُقكُّم مِّن مَّآءٍۢ مَّهِينٍۢ
verses.translation: Did We not create you from an insignificant fluid?

verses.arabic: فَجَعَلْنَٰهُ فِى قَرَارٍۢ مَّكِينٍ
verses.translation: Then lodged it in a secure place?

verses.arabic: إِلَىٰ قَدَرٍۢ مَّعْلُومٍۢ
verses.translation: For a known term?

verses.arabic: فَقَدَرْنَا فَنِعْمَ ٱلْقَٰدِرُونَ
verses.translation: We measured precisely. We are the best to measure.

verses.arabic: وَيْلٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe on that Day to the falsifiers.

verses.arabic: أَلَمْ نَجْعَلِ ٱلْأَرْضَ كِفَاتًا
verses.translation: Did We not make the earth a homestead?

verses.arabic: أَحْيَآءًۭ وَأَمْوَٰتًۭا
verses.translation: For the living and the dead?

verses.arabic: وَجَعَلْنَا فِيهَا رَوَٰسِىَ شَٰمِخَٰتٍۢ وَأَسْقَيْنَٰكُم مَّآءًۭ فُرَاتًۭا
verses.translation: And set on it lofty mountains, and given you pure water to drink?

verses.arabic: وَيْلٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe on that Day to the deniers.

verses.arabic: ٱنطَلِقُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰ مَا كُنتُم بِهِۦ تُكَذِّبُونَ
verses.translation: "Proceed to what you used to deny."

verses.arabic: ٱنطَلِقُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰ ظِلٍّۢ ذِى ثَلَٰثِ شُعَبٍۢ
verses.translation: "Proceed to a shadow of three different masses."

verses.arabic: لَّا ظَلِيلٍۢ وَلَا يُغْنِى مِنَ ٱللَّهَبِ
verses.translation: Offering no shade, and unavailing against the flames.

verses.arabic: إِنَّهَا تَرْمِى بِشَرَرٍۢ كَٱلْقَصْرِ
verses.translation: It shoots sparks as castles.

verses.arabic: كَأَنَّهُۥ جِمَٰلَتٌۭ صُفْرٌۭ
verses.translation: As if they were yellow camels.

verses.arabic: وَيْلٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe on that Day to the liars.

verses.arabic: هَٰذَا يَوْمُ لَا يَنطِقُونَ
verses.translation: This is a Day when they will not speak.

verses.arabic: وَلَا يُؤْذَنُ لَهُمْ فَيَعْتَذِرُونَ
verses.translation: And they will not be allowed to apologize.

verses.arabic: وَيْلٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe on that Day to the rejecters.

verses.arabic: هَٰذَا يَوْمُ ٱلْفَصْلِ ۖ جَمَعْنَٰكُمْ وَٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.translation: This is the Day of Separation; We have gathered you, together with the ancients.

verses.arabic: فَإِن كَانَ لَكُمْ كَيْدٌۭ فَكِيدُونِ
verses.translation: So if you have a strategy, use it against Me.

verses.arabic: وَيْلٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe on that Day to the falsifiers.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ فِى ظِلَٰلٍۢ وَعُيُونٍۢ
verses.translation: The righteous will be amidst shades and fountains.

verses.arabic: وَفَوَٰكِهَ مِمَّا يَشْتَهُونَ
verses.translation: And fruits as they desire.

verses.arabic: كُلُوا۟ وَٱشْرَبُوا۟ هَنِيٓـًٔۢا بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.translation: "Eat and drink pleasantly, for what you used to do."

verses.arabic: إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِى ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ
verses.translation: This is how We reward the doers of good.

verses.arabic: وَيْلٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe on that Day to the deniers.

verses.arabic: كُلُوا۟ وَتَمَتَّعُوا۟ قَلِيلًا إِنَّكُم مُّجْرِمُونَ
verses.translation: "Eat and enjoy yourselves a little; you are indeed criminals."

verses.arabic: وَيْلٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe on that Day to the liars.

verses.arabic: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ ٱرْكَعُوا۟ لَا يَرْكَعُونَ
verses.translation: And when it is said to them, "Kneel", they do not kneel.

verses.arabic: وَيْلٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe on that Day to the rejecters.

verses.arabic: فَبِأَىِّ حَدِيثٍۭ بَعْدَهُۥ يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.translation: In what message, beyond this, will they believe?

verses.arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.translation: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.

verses.arabic: عَمَّ يَتَسَآءَلُونَ
verses.translation: What are they asking one another about?

verses.arabic: عَنِ ٱلنَّبَإِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ
verses.translation: About the Great Event.

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِى هُمْ فِيهِ مُخْتَلِفُونَ
verses.translation: About which they disagree.

verses.arabic: كَلَّا سَيَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: Surely, they will find out.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ كَلَّا سَيَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: Most certainly, they will find out.

verses.arabic: أَلَمْ نَجْعَلِ ٱلْأَرْضَ مِهَٰدًۭا
verses.translation: Did We not make the earth a cradle?

verses.arabic: وَٱلْجِبَالَ أَوْتَادًۭا
verses.translation: And the mountains pegs?

verses.arabic: وَخَلَقْنَٰكُمْ أَزْوَٰجًۭا
verses.translation: And created you in pairs?

verses.arabic: وَجَعَلْنَا نَوْمَكُمْ سُبَاتًۭا
verses.translation: And made your sleep for rest?

verses.arabic: وَجَعَلْنَا ٱلَّيْلَ لِبَاسًۭا
verses.translation: And made the night a cover?

verses.arabic: وَجَعَلْنَا ٱلنَّهَارَ مَعَاشًۭا
verses.translation: And made the day for livelihood?

verses.arabic: وَبَنَيْنَا فَوْقَكُمْ سَبْعًۭا شِدَادًۭا
verses.translation: And built above you seven strong ones?

verses.arabic: وَجَعَلْنَا سِرَاجًۭا وَهَّاجًۭا
verses.translation: And placed a blazing lamp?

verses.arabic: وَأَنزَلْنَا مِنَ ٱلْمُعْصِرَٰتِ مَآءًۭ ثَجَّاجًۭا
verses.translation: And brought down from the clouds pouring water?

verses.arabic: لِّنُخْرِجَ بِهِۦ حَبًّۭا وَنَبَاتًۭا
verses.translation: To produce with it grains and vegetation?

verses.arabic: وَجَنَّٰتٍ أَلْفَافًا
verses.translation: And luxuriant gardens?

verses.arabic: إِنَّ يَوْمَ ٱلْفَصْلِ كَانَ مِيقَٰتًۭا
verses.translation: The Day of Sorting has been appointed.

verses.arabic: يَوْمَ يُنفَخُ فِى ٱلصُّورِ فَتَأْتُونَ أَفْوَاجًۭا
verses.translation: The Day when the Trumpet is blown, and you will come in droves.

verses.arabic: وَفُتِحَتِ ٱلسَّمَآءُ فَكَانَتْ أَبْوَٰبًۭا
verses.translation: And the sky is opened up, and becomes gateways.

verses.arabic: وَسُيِّرَتِ ٱلْجِبَالُ فَكَانَتْ سَرَابًا
verses.translation: And the mountains are set in motion, and become a mirage.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ جَهَنَّمَ كَانَتْ مِرْصَادًۭا
verses.translation: Hell is lying in ambush.

verses.arabic: لِّلطَّٰغِينَ مَـَٔابًۭا
verses.translation: For the oppressors, a destination.

verses.arabic: لَّٰبِثِينَ فِيهَآ أَحْقَابًۭا
verses.translation: Where they will remain for eons.

verses.arabic: لَّا يَذُوقُونَ فِيهَا بَرْدًۭا وَلَا شَرَابًا
verses.translation: They will taste therein neither coolness, nor drink.

verses.arabic: إِلَّا حَمِيمًۭا وَغَسَّاقًۭا
verses.translation: Except boiling water, and freezing hail.

verses.arabic: جَزَآءًۭ وِفَاقًا
verses.translation: A fitting requital.

verses.arabic: إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا۟ لَا يَرْجُونَ حِسَابًۭا
verses.translation: For they were not anticipating any reckoning.

verses.arabic: وَكَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا كِذَّابًۭا
verses.translation: And they denied Our signs utterly.

verses.arabic: وَكُلَّ شَىْءٍ أَحْصَيْنَٰهُ كِتَٰبًۭا
verses.translation: But We have enumerated everything in writing.

verses.arabic: فَذُوقُوا۟ فَلَن نَّزِيدَكُمْ إِلَّا عَذَابًا
verses.translation: So taste! We will increase you only in suffering.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ مَفَازًا
verses.translation: But for the righteous there is triumph.

verses.arabic: حَدَآئِقَ وَأَعْنَٰبًۭا
verses.translation: Gardens and vineyards.

verses.arabic: وَكَوَاعِبَ أَتْرَابًۭا
verses.translation: And splendid spouses, well matched.

verses.arabic: وَكَأْسًۭا دِهَاقًۭا
verses.translation: And delicious drinks.

verses.arabic: لَّا يَسْمَعُونَ فِيهَا لَغْوًۭا وَلَا كِذَّٰبًۭا
verses.translation: They will hear therein neither gossip, nor lies.

verses.arabic: جَزَآءًۭ مِّن رَّبِّكَ عَطَآءً حِسَابًۭا
verses.translation: A reward from your Lord, a fitting gift.

verses.arabic: رَّبِّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ۖ لَا يَمْلِكُونَ مِنْهُ خِطَابًۭا
verses.translation: Lord of the heavens and the earth, and everything between them-The Most Merciful-none can argue with Him.

verses.arabic: يَوْمَ يَقُومُ ٱلرُّوحُ وَٱلْمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ صَفًّۭا ۖ لَّا يَتَكَلَّمُونَ إِلَّا مَنْ أَذِنَ لَهُ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنُ وَقَالَ صَوَابًۭا
verses.translation: On the Day when the Spirit and the angels stand in row. They will not speak, unless it be one permitted by the Most Merciful, and he will say what is right.

verses.arabic: ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْيَوْمُ ٱلْحَقُّ ۖ فَمَن شَآءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ مَـَٔابًا
verses.translation: That is the Day of Reality. So whoever wills, let him take a way back to his Lord.

verses.arabic: إِنَّآ أَنذَرْنَٰكُمْ عَذَابًۭا قَرِيبًۭا يَوْمَ يَنظُرُ ٱلْمَرْءُ مَا قَدَّمَتْ يَدَاهُ وَيَقُولُ ٱلْكَافِرُ يَٰلَيْتَنِى كُنتُ تُرَٰبًۢا
verses.translation: We have warned you of a near punishment-the Day when a person will observe what his hands have produced, and the faithless will say, "O, I wish I were dust."

verses.arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.translation: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.

verses.arabic: وَٱلنَّٰزِعَٰتِ غَرْقًۭا
verses.translation: By those who snatch violently.

verses.arabic: وَٱلنَّٰشِطَٰتِ نَشْطًۭا
verses.translation: And those who remove gently.

verses.arabic: وَٱلسَّٰبِحَٰتِ سَبْحًۭا
verses.translation: And those who glide smoothly.

verses.arabic: فَٱلسَّٰبِقَٰتِ سَبْقًۭا
verses.translation: And those who race swiftly.

verses.arabic: فَٱلْمُدَبِّرَٰتِ أَمْرًۭا
verses.translation: And those who regulate events.

verses.arabic: يَوْمَ تَرْجُفُ ٱلرَّاجِفَةُ
verses.translation: On the Day when the Quake quakes.

verses.arabic: تَتْبَعُهَا ٱلرَّادِفَةُ
verses.translation: And is followed by the Successor.

verses.arabic: قُلُوبٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ وَاجِفَةٌ
verses.translation: Hearts on that Day will be pounding.

verses.arabic: أَبْصَٰرُهَا خَٰشِعَةٌۭ
verses.translation: Their sights downcast.

verses.arabic: يَقُولُونَ أَءِنَّا لَمَرْدُودُونَ فِى ٱلْحَافِرَةِ
verses.translation: They say, "Are we to be restored to the original condition?

verses.arabic: أَءِذَا كُنَّا عِظَٰمًۭا نَّخِرَةًۭ
verses.translation: When we have become hollow bones?"

verses.arabic: قَالُوا۟ تِلْكَ إِذًۭا كَرَّةٌ خَاسِرَةٌۭ
verses.translation: They say, "This is a losing proposition."

verses.arabic: فَإِنَّمَا هِىَ زَجْرَةٌۭ وَٰحِدَةٌۭ
verses.translation: But it will be only a single nudge.

verses.arabic: فَإِذَا هُم بِٱلسَّاهِرَةِ
verses.translation: And they will be awake.

verses.arabic: هَلْ أَتَىٰكَ حَدِيثُ مُوسَىٰٓ
verses.translation: Has the story of Moses reached you?

verses.arabic: إِذْ نَادَىٰهُ رَبُّهُۥ بِٱلْوَادِ ٱلْمُقَدَّسِ طُوًى
verses.translation: When His Lord called out to him in the sacred valley of Tuwa.

verses.arabic: ٱذْهَبْ إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ إِنَّهُۥ طَغَىٰ
verses.translation: "Go to Pharaoh-he has transgressed."

verses.arabic: فَقُلْ هَل لَّكَ إِلَىٰٓ أَن تَزَكَّىٰ
verses.translation: And say, "Do you care to be cleansed?

verses.arabic: وَأَهْدِيَكَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ فَتَخْشَىٰ
verses.translation: And I will guide you to your Lord, and you will turn reverent."

verses.arabic: فَأَرَىٰهُ ٱلْءَايَةَ ٱلْكُبْرَىٰ
verses.translation: He showed him the Greatest Miracle.

verses.arabic: فَكَذَّبَ وَعَصَىٰ
verses.translation: But he denied and defied.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ أَدْبَرَ يَسْعَىٰ
verses.translation: Then turned his back, and tried.

verses.arabic: فَحَشَرَ فَنَادَىٰ
verses.translation: And gathered and proclaimed.

verses.arabic: فَقَالَ أَنَا۠ رَبُّكُمُ ٱلْأَعْلَىٰ
verses.translation: He said, "I am your Lord, the most high."

verses.arabic: فَأَخَذَهُ ٱللَّهُ نَكَالَ ٱلْءَاخِرَةِ وَٱلْأُولَىٰٓ
verses.translation: So God seized him with an exemplary punishment, in the last and in the first.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَعِبْرَةًۭ لِّمَن يَخْشَىٰٓ
verses.translation: In this is a lesson for whoever fears.

verses.arabic: ءَأَنتُمْ أَشَدُّ خَلْقًا أَمِ ٱلسَّمَآءُ ۚ بَنَىٰهَا
verses.translation: Are you more difficult to create, or the heaven? He constructed it.

verses.arabic: رَفَعَ سَمْكَهَا فَسَوَّىٰهَا
verses.translation: He raised its masses, and proportioned it.

verses.arabic: وَأَغْطَشَ لَيْلَهَا وَأَخْرَجَ ضُحَىٰهَا
verses.translation: And He dimmed its night, and brought out its daylight.

verses.arabic: وَٱلْأَرْضَ بَعْدَ ذَٰلِكَ دَحَىٰهَآ
verses.translation: And the earth after that He spread.

verses.arabic: أَخْرَجَ مِنْهَا مَآءَهَا وَمَرْعَىٰهَا
verses.translation: And from it, He produced its water and its pasture.

verses.arabic: وَٱلْجِبَالَ أَرْسَىٰهَا
verses.translation: And the mountains, He anchored.

verses.arabic: مَتَٰعًۭا لَّكُمْ وَلِأَنْعَٰمِكُمْ
verses.translation: A source of enjoyment for you and for your animals.

verses.arabic: فَإِذَا جَآءَتِ ٱلطَّآمَّةُ ٱلْكُبْرَىٰ
verses.translation: But when the Great Cataclysm arrives.

verses.arabic: يَوْمَ يَتَذَكَّرُ ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ مَا سَعَىٰ
verses.translation: A Day when man will remember what he has endeavored.

verses.arabic: وَبُرِّزَتِ ٱلْجَحِيمُ لِمَن يَرَىٰ
verses.translation: And Hell will be displayed to whoever sees.

verses.arabic: فَأَمَّا مَن طَغَىٰ
verses.translation: As for him who was defiant.

verses.arabic: وَءَاثَرَ ٱلْحَيَوٰةَ ٱلدُّنْيَا
verses.translation: And preferred the life of this world.

verses.arabic: فَإِنَّ ٱلْجَحِيمَ هِىَ ٱلْمَأْوَىٰ
verses.translation: Then Hell is the shelter.

verses.arabic: وَأَمَّا مَنْ خَافَ مَقَامَ رَبِّهِۦ وَنَهَى ٱلنَّفْسَ عَنِ ٱلْهَوَىٰ
verses.translation: But as for him who feared the Standing of his Lord, and restrained the self from desires.

verses.arabic: فَإِنَّ ٱلْجَنَّةَ هِىَ ٱلْمَأْوَىٰ
verses.translation: Then Paradise is the shelter.

verses.arabic: يَسْـَٔلُونَكَ عَنِ ٱلسَّاعَةِ أَيَّانَ مُرْسَىٰهَا
verses.translation: They ask you about the Hour, "When will it take place?"

verses.arabic: فِيمَ أَنتَ مِن ذِكْرَىٰهَآ
verses.translation: You have no knowledge of it.

verses.arabic: إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ مُنتَهَىٰهَآ
verses.translation: To your Lord is its finality.

verses.arabic: إِنَّمَآ أَنتَ مُنذِرُ مَن يَخْشَىٰهَا
verses.translation: You are just a warner for whoever dreads it.

verses.arabic: كَأَنَّهُمْ يَوْمَ يَرَوْنَهَا لَمْ يَلْبَثُوٓا۟ إِلَّا عَشِيَّةً أَوْ ضُحَىٰهَا
verses.translation: On the Day when they witness it-as though they only stayed an evening, or its morning.

verses.arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.translation: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.

verses.arabic: عَبَسَ وَتَوَلَّىٰٓ
verses.translation: He frowned and turned away.

verses.arabic: أَن جَآءَهُ ٱلْأَعْمَىٰ
verses.translation: When the blind man approached him.

verses.arabic: وَمَا يُدْرِيكَ لَعَلَّهُۥ يَزَّكَّىٰٓ
verses.translation: But how do you know? Perhaps he was seeking to purify himself.

verses.arabic: أَوْ يَذَّكَّرُ فَتَنفَعَهُ ٱلذِّكْرَىٰٓ
verses.translation: Or be reminded, and the message would benefit him.

verses.arabic: أَمَّا مَنِ ٱسْتَغْنَىٰ
verses.translation: But as for him who was indifferent.

verses.arabic: فَأَنتَ لَهُۥ تَصَدَّىٰ
verses.translation: You gave him your attention.

verses.arabic: وَمَا عَلَيْكَ أَلَّا يَزَّكَّىٰ
verses.translation: Though you are not liable if he does not purify himself.

verses.arabic: وَأَمَّا مَن جَآءَكَ يَسْعَىٰ
verses.translation: But as for him who came to you seeking.

verses.arabic: وَهُوَ يَخْشَىٰ
verses.translation: In awe.

verses.arabic: فَأَنتَ عَنْهُ تَلَهَّىٰ
verses.translation: To him you were inattentive.

verses.arabic: كَلَّآ إِنَّهَا تَذْكِرَةٌۭ
verses.translation: Do not. This is a Lesson.

verses.arabic: فَمَن شَآءَ ذَكَرَهُۥ
verses.translation: Whoever wills, shall remember it.

verses.arabic: فِى صُحُفٍۢ مُّكَرَّمَةٍۢ
verses.translation: On honorable pages.

verses.arabic: مَّرْفُوعَةٍۢ مُّطَهَّرَةٍۭ
verses.translation: Exalted and purified.

verses.arabic: بِأَيْدِى سَفَرَةٍۢ
verses.translation: By the hands of scribes.

verses.arabic: كِرَامٍۭ بَرَرَةٍۢ
verses.translation: Noble and devoted.

verses.arabic: قُتِلَ ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ مَآ أَكْفَرَهُۥ
verses.translation: Perish man! How thankless he is!

verses.arabic: مِنْ أَىِّ شَىْءٍ خَلَقَهُۥ
verses.translation: From what did He create him?

verses.arabic: مِن نُّطْفَةٍ خَلَقَهُۥ فَقَدَّرَهُۥ
verses.translation: From a sperm drop He created him, and enabled him.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ ٱلسَّبِيلَ يَسَّرَهُۥ
verses.translation: Then He eased the way for him.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ أَمَاتَهُۥ فَأَقْبَرَهُۥ
verses.translation: Then He puts him to death, and buries him.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ إِذَا شَآءَ أَنشَرَهُۥ
verses.translation: Then, when He wills, He will resurrect him.

verses.arabic: كَلَّا لَمَّا يَقْضِ مَآ أَمَرَهُۥ
verses.translation: But no, he did not fulfill what He has commanded him.

verses.arabic: فَلْيَنظُرِ ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ إِلَىٰ طَعَامِهِۦٓ
verses.translation: Let man consider his food.

verses.arabic: أَنَّا صَبَبْنَا ٱلْمَآءَ صَبًّۭا
verses.translation: We pour down water in abundance.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ شَقَقْنَا ٱلْأَرْضَ شَقًّۭا
verses.translation: Then crack the soil open.

verses.arabic: فَأَنۢبَتْنَا فِيهَا حَبًّۭا
verses.translation: And grow in it grains.

verses.arabic: وَعِنَبًۭا وَقَضْبًۭا
verses.translation: And grapes and herbs.

verses.arabic: وَزَيْتُونًۭا وَنَخْلًۭا
verses.translation: And olives and dates.

verses.arabic: وَحَدَآئِقَ غُلْبًۭا
verses.translation: And luscious gardens.

verses.arabic: وَفَٰكِهَةًۭ وَأَبًّۭا
verses.translation: And fruits and vegetables.

verses.arabic: مَّتَٰعًۭا لَّكُمْ وَلِأَنْعَٰمِكُمْ
verses.translation: Enjoyment for you, and for your livestock.

verses.arabic: فَإِذَا جَآءَتِ ٱلصَّآخَّةُ
verses.translation: But when the Deafening Noise comes to pass.

verses.arabic: يَوْمَ يَفِرُّ ٱلْمَرْءُ مِنْ أَخِيهِ
verses.translation: The Day when a person will flee from his brother.

verses.arabic: وَأُمِّهِۦ وَأَبِيهِ
verses.translation: And his mother and his father.

verses.arabic: وَصَٰحِبَتِهِۦ وَبَنِيهِ
verses.translation: And his consort and his children.

verses.arabic: لِكُلِّ ٱمْرِئٍۢ مِّنْهُمْ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ شَأْنٌۭ يُغْنِيهِ
verses.translation: Every one of them, on that Day, will have enough to preoccupy him.

verses.arabic: وُجُوهٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ مُّسْفِرَةٌۭ
verses.translation: Faces on that Day will be radiant.

verses.arabic: ضَاحِكَةٌۭ مُّسْتَبْشِرَةٌۭ
verses.translation: Laughing and rejoicing.

verses.arabic: وَوُجُوهٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍ عَلَيْهَا غَبَرَةٌۭ
verses.translation: And Faces on that Day will be covered with misery.

verses.arabic: تَرْهَقُهَا قَتَرَةٌ
verses.translation: Overwhelmed by remorse.

verses.arabic: أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْكَفَرَةُ ٱلْفَجَرَةُ
verses.translation: These are the faithless, the vicious.

verses.arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.translation: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.

verses.arabic: إِذَا ٱلشَّمْسُ كُوِّرَتْ
verses.translation: When the sun is rolled up.

verses.arabic: وَإِذَا ٱلنُّجُومُ ٱنكَدَرَتْ
verses.translation: When the stars are dimmed.

verses.arabic: وَإِذَا ٱلْجِبَالُ سُيِّرَتْ
verses.translation: When the mountains are set in motion.

verses.arabic: وَإِذَا ٱلْعِشَارُ عُطِّلَتْ
verses.translation: When the relationships are suspended.

verses.arabic: وَإِذَا ٱلْوُحُوشُ حُشِرَتْ
verses.translation: When the beasts are gathered.

verses.arabic: وَإِذَا ٱلْبِحَارُ سُجِّرَتْ
verses.translation: When the oceans are set aflame.

verses.arabic: وَإِذَا ٱلنُّفُوسُ زُوِّجَتْ
verses.translation: When the souls are paired.

verses.arabic: وَإِذَا ٱلْمَوْءُۥدَةُ سُئِلَتْ
verses.translation: When the girl, buried alive, is asked:

verses.arabic: بِأَىِّ ذَنۢبٍۢ قُتِلَتْ
verses.translation: For what crime was she killed?

verses.arabic: وَإِذَا ٱلصُّحُفُ نُشِرَتْ
verses.translation: When the records are made public.

verses.arabic: وَإِذَا ٱلسَّمَآءُ كُشِطَتْ
verses.translation: When the sky is peeled away.

verses.arabic: وَإِذَا ٱلْجَحِيمُ سُعِّرَتْ
verses.translation: When the Fire is set ablaze.

verses.arabic: وَإِذَا ٱلْجَنَّةُ أُزْلِفَتْ
verses.translation: When Paradise is brought near.

verses.arabic: عَلِمَتْ نَفْسٌۭ مَّآ أَحْضَرَتْ
verses.translation: Each soul will know what it has readied.

verses.arabic: فَلَآ أُقْسِمُ بِٱلْخُنَّسِ
verses.translation: I swear by the galaxies.

verses.arabic: ٱلْجَوَارِ ٱلْكُنَّسِ
verses.translation: Precisely running their courses.

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّيْلِ إِذَا عَسْعَسَ
verses.translation: And by the night as it recedes.

verses.arabic: وَٱلصُّبْحِ إِذَا تَنَفَّسَ
verses.translation: And by the morn as it breathes.

verses.arabic: إِنَّهُۥ لَقَوْلُ رَسُولٍۢ كَرِيمٍۢ
verses.translation: This is the speech of a noble messenger.

verses.arabic: ذِى قُوَّةٍ عِندَ ذِى ٱلْعَرْشِ مَكِينٍۢ
verses.translation: Endowed with power, eminent with the Lord of the Throne.

verses.arabic: مُّطَاعٍۢ ثَمَّ أَمِينٍۢ
verses.translation: Obeyed and honest.

verses.arabic: وَمَا صَاحِبُكُم بِمَجْنُونٍۢ
verses.translation: Your friend is not possessed.

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ رَءَاهُ بِٱلْأُفُقِ ٱلْمُبِينِ
verses.translation: He saw him on the luminous horizon.

verses.arabic: وَمَا هُوَ عَلَى ٱلْغَيْبِ بِضَنِينٍۢ
verses.translation: And He does not withhold knowledge of the Unseen.

verses.arabic: وَمَا هُوَ بِقَوْلِ شَيْطَٰنٍۢ رَّجِيمٍۢ
verses.translation: And it is not the word of an accursed devil.

verses.arabic: فَأَيْنَ تَذْهَبُونَ
verses.translation: So where are you heading?

verses.arabic: إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكْرٌۭ لِّلْعَٰلَمِينَ
verses.translation: It is only a Reminder to all mankind.

verses.arabic: لِمَن شَآءَ مِنكُمْ أَن يَسْتَقِيمَ
verses.translation: To whoever of you wills to go straight.

verses.arabic: وَمَا تَشَآءُونَ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُ رَبُّ ٱلْعَٰلَمِينَ
verses.translation: But you cannot will, unless God wills-The Lord of the Worlds.

verses.arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.translation: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.

verses.arabic: إِذَا ٱلسَّمَآءُ ٱنفَطَرَتْ
verses.translation: When the sky breaks apart.

verses.arabic: وَإِذَا ٱلْكَوَاكِبُ ٱنتَثَرَتْ
verses.translation: When the planets are scattered.

verses.arabic: وَإِذَا ٱلْبِحَارُ فُجِّرَتْ
verses.translation: When the oceans are exploded.

verses.arabic: وَإِذَا ٱلْقُبُورُ بُعْثِرَتْ
verses.translation: When the tombs are strewn around.

verses.arabic: عَلِمَتْ نَفْسٌۭ مَّا قَدَّمَتْ وَأَخَّرَتْ
verses.translation: Each soul will know what it has advanced, and what it has deferred.

verses.arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ مَا غَرَّكَ بِرَبِّكَ ٱلْكَرِيمِ
verses.translation: O man! What deluded you concerning your Lord, the Most Generous?

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَكَ فَسَوَّىٰكَ فَعَدَلَكَ
verses.translation: He Who created you, and formed you, and proportioned you?

verses.arabic: فِىٓ أَىِّ صُورَةٍۢ مَّا شَآءَ رَكَّبَكَ
verses.translation: In whatever shape He willed, He assembled you.

verses.arabic: كَلَّا بَلْ تُكَذِّبُونَ بِٱلدِّينِ
verses.translation: But you reject the religion.

verses.arabic: وَإِنَّ عَلَيْكُمْ لَحَٰفِظِينَ
verses.translation: Though over you are watchers.

verses.arabic: كِرَامًۭا كَٰتِبِينَ
verses.translation: Honest recorders.

verses.arabic: يَعْلَمُونَ مَا تَفْعَلُونَ
verses.translation: They know everything you do.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلْأَبْرَارَ لَفِى نَعِيمٍۢ
verses.translation: The virtuous will be in bliss.

verses.arabic: وَإِنَّ ٱلْفُجَّارَ لَفِى جَحِيمٍۢ
verses.translation: While the wicked will be in Hell.

verses.arabic: يَصْلَوْنَهَا يَوْمَ ٱلدِّينِ
verses.translation: They will enter it on the Day of Justice.

verses.arabic: وَمَا هُمْ عَنْهَا بِغَآئِبِينَ
verses.translation: And they will not be absent from it.

verses.arabic: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا يَوْمُ ٱلدِّينِ
verses.translation: But what will convey to you what the Day of Justice is?

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ مَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا يَوْمُ ٱلدِّينِ
verses.translation: Then again, what will convey to you what the Day of Justice is?

verses.arabic: يَوْمَ لَا تَمْلِكُ نَفْسٌۭ لِّنَفْسٍۢ شَيْـًۭٔا ۖ وَٱلْأَمْرُ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ لِّلَّهِ
verses.translation: The Day when no soul will avail another soul anything; and the decision on that Day is God's.

verses.arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.translation: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.

verses.arabic: وَيْلٌۭ لِّلْمُطَفِّفِينَ
verses.translation: Woe to the defrauders.

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ إِذَا ٱكْتَالُوا۟ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ يَسْتَوْفُونَ
verses.translation: Those who, when they take a measure from people, they take in full.

verses.arabic: وَإِذَا كَالُوهُمْ أَو وَّزَنُوهُمْ يُخْسِرُونَ
verses.translation: But when they measure or weigh to others, they cheat.

verses.arabic: أَلَا يَظُنُّ أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ أَنَّهُم مَّبْعُوثُونَ
verses.translation: Do these not know that they will be resurrected?

verses.arabic: لِيَوْمٍ عَظِيمٍۢ
verses.translation: For a Great Day?

verses.arabic: يَوْمَ يَقُومُ ٱلنَّاسُ لِرَبِّ ٱلْعَٰلَمِينَ
verses.translation: The Day when mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds?

verses.arabic: كَلَّآ إِنَّ كِتَٰبَ ٱلْفُجَّارِ لَفِى سِجِّينٍۢ
verses.translation: Not at all. The record of the wicked is in Sijjeen.

verses.arabic: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا سِجِّينٌۭ
verses.translation: But how can you know what Sijjeen is?

verses.arabic: كِتَٰبٌۭ مَّرْقُومٌۭ
verses.translation: A numerical book.

verses.arabic: وَيْلٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe on that Day to the deniers.

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يُكَذِّبُونَ بِيَوْمِ ٱلدِّينِ
verses.translation: Those who deny the Day of Reckoning.

verses.arabic: وَمَا يُكَذِّبُ بِهِۦٓ إِلَّا كُلُّ مُعْتَدٍ أَثِيمٍ
verses.translation: But none denies it except the sinful aggressor.

verses.arabic: إِذَا تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْهِ ءَايَٰتُنَا قَالَ أَسَٰطِيرُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.translation: When Our revelations are recited to him, he says, "Legends of the ancients."

verses.arabic: كَلَّا ۖ بَلْ ۜ رَانَ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِم مَّا كَانُوا۟ يَكْسِبُونَ
verses.translation: Not at all. Their hearts have become corroded by what they used to earn.

verses.arabic: كَلَّآ إِنَّهُمْ عَن رَّبِّهِمْ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ لَّمَحْجُوبُونَ
verses.translation: Not at all. On that Day, they will be screened from their Lord.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ إِنَّهُمْ لَصَالُوا۟ ٱلْجَحِيمِ
verses.translation: Then they will roast in Hell.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ يُقَالُ هَٰذَا ٱلَّذِى كُنتُم بِهِۦ تُكَذِّبُونَ
verses.translation: Then it will be said, "This is what you used to deny."

verses.arabic: كَلَّآ إِنَّ كِتَٰبَ ٱلْأَبْرَارِ لَفِى عِلِّيِّينَ
verses.translation: No indeed; the record of the righteous is in Elliyyeen.

verses.arabic: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا عِلِّيُّونَ
verses.translation: But how can you know what Elliyyoon is?

verses.arabic: كِتَٰبٌۭ مَّرْقُومٌۭ
verses.translation: A numerical book.

verses.arabic: يَشْهَدُهُ ٱلْمُقَرَّبُونَ
verses.translation: Witnessed by those brought near.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلْأَبْرَارَ لَفِى نَعِيمٍ
verses.translation: Indeed, the righteous will be amid bliss.

verses.arabic: عَلَى ٱلْأَرَآئِكِ يَنظُرُونَ
verses.translation: On thrones, looking on.

verses.arabic: تَعْرِفُ فِى وُجُوهِهِمْ نَضْرَةَ ٱلنَّعِيمِ
verses.translation: You will recognize on their faces the radiance of bliss.

verses.arabic: يُسْقَوْنَ مِن رَّحِيقٍۢ مَّخْتُومٍ
verses.translation: They will be given to drink a sealed wine.

verses.arabic: خِتَٰمُهُۥ مِسْكٌۭ ۚ وَفِى ذَٰلِكَ فَلْيَتَنَافَسِ ٱلْمُتَنَٰفِسُونَ
verses.translation: Whose seal is musk-this is what competitors should compete for.

verses.arabic: وَمِزَاجُهُۥ مِن تَسْنِيمٍ
verses.translation: Its mixture is of Tasneem.

verses.arabic: عَيْنًۭا يَشْرَبُ بِهَا ٱلْمُقَرَّبُونَ
verses.translation: A spring from which those brought near drink.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ أَجْرَمُوا۟ كَانُوا۟ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ يَضْحَكُونَ
verses.translation: Those who committed crimes used to laugh at those who believed.

verses.arabic: وَإِذَا مَرُّوا۟ بِهِمْ يَتَغَامَزُونَ
verses.translation: And when they passed by them, they would wink at one another.

verses.arabic: وَإِذَا ٱنقَلَبُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰٓ أَهْلِهِمُ ٱنقَلَبُوا۟ فَكِهِينَ
verses.translation: And when they went back to their families, they would go back exulting.

verses.arabic: وَإِذَا رَأَوْهُمْ قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ لَضَآلُّونَ
verses.translation: And if they saw them, they would say, "These people are lost."

verses.arabic: وَمَآ أُرْسِلُوا۟ عَلَيْهِمْ حَٰفِظِينَ
verses.translation: Yet they were not sent as guardians over them.

verses.arabic: فَٱلْيَوْمَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ مِنَ ٱلْكُفَّارِ يَضْحَكُونَ
verses.translation: But on that Day, those who believed will laugh at the unbelievers.

verses.arabic: عَلَى ٱلْأَرَآئِكِ يَنظُرُونَ
verses.translation: On luxurious furnishings, looking on.

verses.arabic: هَلْ ثُوِّبَ ٱلْكُفَّارُ مَا كَانُوا۟ يَفْعَلُونَ
verses.translation: Have the unbelievers been repaid for what they used to do?

verses.arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.translation: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.

verses.arabic: إِذَا ٱلسَّمَآءُ ٱنشَقَّتْ
verses.translation: When the sky is ruptured.

verses.arabic: وَأَذِنَتْ لِرَبِّهَا وَحُقَّتْ
verses.translation: And hearkens to its Lord, as it must.

verses.arabic: وَإِذَا ٱلْأَرْضُ مُدَّتْ
verses.translation: And when the earth is leveled out.

verses.arabic: وَأَلْقَتْ مَا فِيهَا وَتَخَلَّتْ
verses.translation: And casts out what is in it, and becomes empty.

verses.arabic: وَأَذِنَتْ لِرَبِّهَا وَحُقَّتْ
verses.translation: And hearkens to its Lord, as it must.

verses.arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ إِنَّكَ كَادِحٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ كَدْحًۭا فَمُلَٰقِيهِ
verses.translation: O man! You are laboring towards your Lord, and you will meet Him.

verses.arabic: فَأَمَّا مَنْ أُوتِىَ كِتَٰبَهُۥ بِيَمِينِهِۦ
verses.translation: As for him who is given his book in his right hand.

verses.arabic: فَسَوْفَ يُحَاسَبُ حِسَابًۭا يَسِيرًۭا
verses.translation: He will have an easy settlement.

verses.arabic: وَيَنقَلِبُ إِلَىٰٓ أَهْلِهِۦ مَسْرُورًۭا
verses.translation: And will return to his family delighted.

verses.arabic: وَأَمَّا مَنْ أُوتِىَ كِتَٰبَهُۥ وَرَآءَ ظَهْرِهِۦ
verses.translation: But as for him who is given his book behind his back.

verses.arabic: فَسَوْفَ يَدْعُوا۟ ثُبُورًۭا
verses.translation: He will call for death.

verses.arabic: وَيَصْلَىٰ سَعِيرًا
verses.translation: And will enter the Blaze.

verses.arabic: إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ فِىٓ أَهْلِهِۦ مَسْرُورًا
verses.translation: He used to be happy among his family.

verses.arabic: إِنَّهُۥ ظَنَّ أَن لَّن يَحُورَ
verses.translation: He thought he would never return.

verses.arabic: بَلَىٰٓ إِنَّ رَبَّهُۥ كَانَ بِهِۦ بَصِيرًۭا
verses.translation: In fact, his Lord was watching him.

verses.arabic: فَلَآ أُقْسِمُ بِٱلشَّفَقِ
verses.translation: I swear by the twilight.

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّيْلِ وَمَا وَسَقَ
verses.translation: And by the night, and what it covers.

verses.arabic: وَٱلْقَمَرِ إِذَا ٱتَّسَقَ
verses.translation: And by the moon, as it grows full.

verses.arabic: لَتَرْكَبُنَّ طَبَقًا عَن طَبَقٍۢ
verses.translation: You will mount stage by stage.

verses.arabic: فَمَا لَهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.translation: What is the matter with them that they do not believe?

verses.arabic: وَإِذَا قُرِئَ عَلَيْهِمُ ٱلْقُرْءَانُ لَا يَسْجُدُونَ ۩
verses.translation: And when the Quran is read to them, they do not bow down?

verses.arabic: بَلِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ يُكَذِّبُونَ
verses.translation: In fact, those who disbelieve are in denial.

verses.arabic: وَٱللَّهُ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا يُوعُونَ
verses.translation: But God knows what they hide inside.

verses.arabic: فَبَشِّرْهُم بِعَذَابٍ أَلِيمٍ
verses.translation: So inform them of a painful punishment.

verses.arabic: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ لَهُمْ أَجْرٌ غَيْرُ مَمْنُونٍۭ
verses.translation: Except those who believe and do good deeds; they will have an undiminished reward.

verses.arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.translation: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.

verses.arabic: وَٱلسَّمَآءِ ذَاتِ ٱلْبُرُوجِ
verses.translation: By the sky with the constellations.

verses.arabic: وَٱلْيَوْمِ ٱلْمَوْعُودِ
verses.translation: And by the Promised Day.

verses.arabic: وَشَاهِدٍۢ وَمَشْهُودٍۢ
verses.translation: And by the witness and the witnessed.

verses.arabic: قُتِلَ أَصْحَٰبُ ٱلْأُخْدُودِ
verses.translation: Destroyed were the People of the Trench.

verses.arabic: ٱلنَّارِ ذَاتِ ٱلْوَقُودِ
verses.translation: The fire supplied with fuel.

verses.arabic: إِذْ هُمْ عَلَيْهَا قُعُودٌۭ
verses.translation: While they sat around it.

verses.arabic: وَهُمْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَفْعَلُونَ بِٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ شُهُودٌۭ
verses.translation: And were witnessing what they did to the believers.

verses.arabic: وَمَا نَقَمُوا۟ مِنْهُمْ إِلَّآ أَن يُؤْمِنُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ ٱلْعَزِيزِ ٱلْحَمِيدِ
verses.translation: They begrudged them only because they believed in God the Almighty, the Praiseworthy.

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِى لَهُۥ مُلْكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍۢ شَهِيدٌ
verses.translation: To Whom belongs the sovereignty of the heavens and the earth. God is witness over everything.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ فَتَنُوا۟ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَٱلْمُؤْمِنَٰتِ ثُمَّ لَمْ يَتُوبُوا۟ فَلَهُمْ عَذَابُ جَهَنَّمَ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابُ ٱلْحَرِيقِ
verses.translation: Those who tempt the believers, men and women, then do not repent; for them is the punishment of Hell; for them is the punishment of Burning.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ لَهُمْ جَنَّٰتٌۭ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَٰرُ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْفَوْزُ ٱلْكَبِيرُ
verses.translation: Those who believe and do righteous deeds will have Gardens beneath which rivers flow. That is the great triumph.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ بَطْشَ رَبِّكَ لَشَدِيدٌ
verses.translation: The onslaught of your Lord is severe.

verses.arabic: إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ يُبْدِئُ وَيُعِيدُ
verses.translation: It is He who begins and repeats.

verses.arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلْغَفُورُ ٱلْوَدُودُ
verses.translation: And He is the Forgiving, the Loving.

verses.arabic: ذُو ٱلْعَرْشِ ٱلْمَجِيدُ
verses.translation: Possessor of the Glorious Throne.

verses.arabic: فَعَّالٌۭ لِّمَا يُرِيدُ
verses.translation: Doer of whatever He wills.

verses.arabic: هَلْ أَتَىٰكَ حَدِيثُ ٱلْجُنُودِ
verses.translation: Has there come to you the story of the legions?

verses.arabic: فِرْعَوْنَ وَثَمُودَ
verses.translation: Of Pharaoh and Thamood?

verses.arabic: بَلِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ فِى تَكْذِيبٍۢ
verses.translation: In fact, those who disbelieve are in denial.

verses.arabic: وَٱللَّهُ مِن وَرَآئِهِم مُّحِيطٌۢ
verses.translation: And God encloses them from beyond.

verses.arabic: بَلْ هُوَ قُرْءَانٌۭ مَّجِيدٌۭ
verses.translation: In fact, it is a Glorious Quran.

verses.arabic: فِى لَوْحٍۢ مَّحْفُوظٍۭ
verses.translation: In a Preserved Tablet.

verses.arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.translation: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.

verses.arabic: وَٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلطَّارِقِ
verses.translation: By the sky and at-Tariq.

verses.arabic: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا ٱلطَّارِقُ
verses.translation: But what will let you know what at-Tariq is?

verses.arabic: ٱلنَّجْمُ ٱلثَّاقِبُ
verses.translation: The Piercing Star.

verses.arabic: إِن كُلُّ نَفْسٍۢ لَّمَّا عَلَيْهَا حَافِظٌۭ
verses.translation: There is no soul without a Protector over it.

verses.arabic: فَلْيَنظُرِ ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ مِمَّ خُلِقَ
verses.translation: Let man consider what he was created from.

verses.arabic: خُلِقَ مِن مَّآءٍۢ دَافِقٍۢ
verses.translation: He was created from gushing liquid.

verses.arabic: يَخْرُجُ مِنۢ بَيْنِ ٱلصُّلْبِ وَٱلتَّرَآئِبِ
verses.translation: Issuing from between the backbone and the breastbones.

verses.arabic: إِنَّهُۥ عَلَىٰ رَجْعِهِۦ لَقَادِرٌۭ
verses.translation: He is certainly able to return him.

verses.arabic: يَوْمَ تُبْلَى ٱلسَّرَآئِرُ
verses.translation: On the Day when the secrets are disclosed.

verses.arabic: فَمَا لَهُۥ مِن قُوَّةٍۢ وَلَا نَاصِرٍۢ
verses.translation: He will have no strength, and no supporter.

verses.arabic: وَٱلسَّمَآءِ ذَاتِ ٱلرَّجْعِ
verses.translation: By the sky that returns.

verses.arabic: وَٱلْأَرْضِ ذَاتِ ٱلصَّدْعِ
verses.translation: And the earth that cracks open.

verses.arabic: إِنَّهُۥ لَقَوْلٌۭ فَصْلٌۭ
verses.translation: It is a Decisive Word.

verses.arabic: وَمَا هُوَ بِٱلْهَزْلِ
verses.translation: It is no joke.

verses.arabic: إِنَّهُمْ يَكِيدُونَ كَيْدًۭا
verses.translation: They plot and scheme.

verses.arabic: وَأَكِيدُ كَيْدًۭا
verses.translation: But I plot and scheme.

verses.arabic: فَمَهِّلِ ٱلْكَٰفِرِينَ أَمْهِلْهُمْ رُوَيْدًۢا
verses.translation: Therefore, give the blasphemers respite, a brief respite.

verses.arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.translation: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.

verses.arabic: سَبِّحِ ٱسْمَ رَبِّكَ ٱلْأَعْلَى
verses.translation: Praise the Name of your Lord, the Most High.

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ فَسَوَّىٰ
verses.translation: He who creates and regulates.

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِى قَدَّرَ فَهَدَىٰ
verses.translation: He who measures and guides.

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِىٓ أَخْرَجَ ٱلْمَرْعَىٰ
verses.translation: He who produces the pasture.

verses.arabic: فَجَعَلَهُۥ غُثَآءً أَحْوَىٰ
verses.translation: And then turns it into light debris.

verses.arabic: سَنُقْرِئُكَ فَلَا تَنسَىٰٓ
verses.translation: We will make you read, so do not forget.

verses.arabic: إِلَّا مَا شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ يَعْلَمُ ٱلْجَهْرَ وَمَا يَخْفَىٰ
verses.translation: Except what God wills. He knows what is declared, and what is hidden.

verses.arabic: وَنُيَسِّرُكَ لِلْيُسْرَىٰ
verses.translation: We will ease you into the Easy Way.

verses.arabic: فَذَكِّرْ إِن نَّفَعَتِ ٱلذِّكْرَىٰ
verses.translation: So remind, if reminding helps.

verses.arabic: سَيَذَّكَّرُ مَن يَخْشَىٰ
verses.translation: The reverent will remember.

verses.arabic: وَيَتَجَنَّبُهَا ٱلْأَشْقَى
verses.translation: But the wretched will avoid it.

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِى يَصْلَى ٱلنَّارَ ٱلْكُبْرَىٰ
verses.translation: He who will enter the Gigantic Fire.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ لَا يَمُوتُ فِيهَا وَلَا يَحْيَىٰ
verses.translation: Where he will neither die, nor live.

verses.arabic: قَدْ أَفْلَحَ مَن تَزَكَّىٰ
verses.translation: Successful is he who purifies himself.

verses.arabic: وَذَكَرَ ٱسْمَ رَبِّهِۦ فَصَلَّىٰ
verses.translation: And mentions the name of his Lord, and prays.

verses.arabic: بَلْ تُؤْثِرُونَ ٱلْحَيَوٰةَ ٱلدُّنْيَا
verses.translation: But you prefer the present life.

verses.arabic: وَٱلْءَاخِرَةُ خَيْرٌۭ وَأَبْقَىٰٓ
verses.translation: Though the Hereafter is better, and more lasting.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَفِى ٱلصُّحُفِ ٱلْأُولَىٰ
verses.translation: This is in the former scriptures.

verses.arabic: صُحُفِ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ وَمُوسَىٰ
verses.translation: The Scriptures of Abraham and Moses.

verses.arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.translation: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.

verses.arabic: هَلْ أَتَىٰكَ حَدِيثُ ٱلْغَٰشِيَةِ
verses.translation: Has there come to you the news of the overwhelming?

verses.arabic: وُجُوهٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍ خَٰشِعَةٌ
verses.translation: Faces on that Day will be shamed.

verses.arabic: عَامِلَةٌۭ نَّاصِبَةٌۭ
verses.translation: Laboring and exhausted.

verses.arabic: تَصْلَىٰ نَارًا حَامِيَةًۭ
verses.translation: Roasting in a scorching Fire.

verses.arabic: تُسْقَىٰ مِنْ عَيْنٍ ءَانِيَةٍۢ
verses.translation: Given to drink from a flaming spring.

verses.arabic: لَّيْسَ لَهُمْ طَعَامٌ إِلَّا مِن ضَرِيعٍۢ
verses.translation: They will have no food except thorns.

verses.arabic: لَّا يُسْمِنُ وَلَا يُغْنِى مِن جُوعٍۢ
verses.translation: That neither nourishes, nor satisfies hunger.

verses.arabic: وُجُوهٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ نَّاعِمَةٌۭ
verses.translation: Faces on that Day will be joyful.

verses.arabic: لِّسَعْيِهَا رَاضِيَةٌۭ
verses.translation: Satisfied with their endeavor.

verses.arabic: فِى جَنَّةٍ عَالِيَةٍۢ
verses.translation: In a lofty Garden.

verses.arabic: لَّا تَسْمَعُ فِيهَا لَٰغِيَةًۭ
verses.translation: In it you will hear no nonsense.

verses.arabic: فِيهَا عَيْنٌۭ جَارِيَةٌۭ
verses.translation: In it is a flowing spring.

verses.arabic: فِيهَا سُرُرٌۭ مَّرْفُوعَةٌۭ
verses.translation: In it are raised beds.

verses.arabic: وَأَكْوَابٌۭ مَّوْضُوعَةٌۭ
verses.translation: And cups set in place.

verses.arabic: وَنَمَارِقُ مَصْفُوفَةٌۭ
verses.translation: And cushions set in rows.

verses.arabic: وَزَرَابِىُّ مَبْثُوثَةٌ
verses.translation: And carpets spread around.

verses.arabic: أَفَلَا يَنظُرُونَ إِلَى ٱلْإِبِلِ كَيْفَ خُلِقَتْ
verses.translation: Do they not look at the camels-how they are created?

verses.arabic: وَإِلَى ٱلسَّمَآءِ كَيْفَ رُفِعَتْ
verses.translation: And at the sky-how it is raised?

verses.arabic: وَإِلَى ٱلْجِبَالِ كَيْفَ نُصِبَتْ
verses.translation: And at the mountains-how they are installed?

verses.arabic: وَإِلَى ٱلْأَرْضِ كَيْفَ سُطِحَتْ
verses.translation: And at the earth-how it is spread out?

verses.arabic: فَذَكِّرْ إِنَّمَآ أَنتَ مُذَكِّرٌۭ
verses.translation: So remind. You are only a reminder.

verses.arabic: لَّسْتَ عَلَيْهِم بِمُصَيْطِرٍ
verses.translation: You have no control over them.

verses.arabic: إِلَّا مَن تَوَلَّىٰ وَكَفَرَ
verses.translation: But whoever turns away and disbelieves.

verses.arabic: فَيُعَذِّبُهُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلْعَذَابَ ٱلْأَكْبَرَ
verses.translation: God will punish him with the greatest punishment.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ إِلَيْنَآ إِيَابَهُمْ
verses.translation: To Us is their return.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ إِنَّ عَلَيْنَا حِسَابَهُم
verses.translation: Then upon Us rests their reckoning.

verses.arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.translation: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.

verses.arabic: وَٱلْفَجْرِ
verses.translation: By the daybreak.

verses.arabic: وَلَيَالٍ عَشْرٍۢ
verses.translation: And ten nights.

verses.arabic: وَٱلشَّفْعِ وَٱلْوَتْرِ
verses.translation: And the even and the odd.

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّيْلِ إِذَا يَسْرِ
verses.translation: And the night as it recedes.

verses.arabic: هَلْ فِى ذَٰلِكَ قَسَمٌۭ لِّذِى حِجْرٍ
verses.translation: Is there in this an oath for a rational person?

verses.arabic: أَلَمْ تَرَ كَيْفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِعَادٍ
verses.translation: Have you not seen how your Lord dealt with Aad?

verses.arabic: إِرَمَ ذَاتِ ٱلْعِمَادِ
verses.translation: Erum of the pillars.

verses.arabic: ٱلَّتِى لَمْ يُخْلَقْ مِثْلُهَا فِى ٱلْبِلَٰدِ
verses.translation: The like of which was never created in the land.

verses.arabic: وَثَمُودَ ٱلَّذِينَ جَابُوا۟ ٱلصَّخْرَ بِٱلْوَادِ
verses.translation: And Thamood-those who carved the rocks in the valley.

verses.arabic: وَفِرْعَوْنَ ذِى ٱلْأَوْتَادِ
verses.translation: And Pharaoh of the Stakes.

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ طَغَوْا۟ فِى ٱلْبِلَٰدِ
verses.translation: Those who committed excesses in the lands.

verses.arabic: فَأَكْثَرُوا۟ فِيهَا ٱلْفَسَادَ
verses.translation: And spread much corruption therein.

verses.arabic: فَصَبَّ عَلَيْهِمْ رَبُّكَ سَوْطَ عَذَابٍ
verses.translation: So your Lord poured down upon them a scourge of punishment.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَبِٱلْمِرْصَادِ
verses.translation: Your Lord is on the lookout.

verses.arabic: فَأَمَّا ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ إِذَا مَا ٱبْتَلَىٰهُ رَبُّهُۥ فَأَكْرَمَهُۥ وَنَعَّمَهُۥ فَيَقُولُ رَبِّىٓ أَكْرَمَنِ
verses.translation: As for man, whenever his Lord tests him, and honors him, and prospers him, he says, "My Lord has honored me."

verses.arabic: وَأَمَّآ إِذَا مَا ٱبْتَلَىٰهُ فَقَدَرَ عَلَيْهِ رِزْقَهُۥ فَيَقُولُ رَبِّىٓ أَهَٰنَنِ
verses.translation: But whenever He tests him, and restricts his livelihood for him, he says, "My Lord has insulted me."

verses.arabic: كَلَّا ۖ بَل لَّا تُكْرِمُونَ ٱلْيَتِيمَ
verses.translation: Not at all. But you do not honor the orphan.

verses.arabic: وَلَا تَحَٰٓضُّونَ عَلَىٰ طَعَامِ ٱلْمِسْكِينِ
verses.translation: And you do not urge the feeding of the poor.

verses.arabic: وَتَأْكُلُونَ ٱلتُّرَاثَ أَكْلًۭا لَّمًّۭا
verses.translation: And you devour inheritance with all greed.

verses.arabic: وَتُحِبُّونَ ٱلْمَالَ حُبًّۭا جَمًّۭا
verses.translation: And you love wealth with immense love.

verses.arabic: كَلَّآ إِذَا دُكَّتِ ٱلْأَرْضُ دَكًّۭا دَكًّۭا
verses.translation: No-when the earth is leveled, pounded, and crushed.
