verses.arabic: وَجَآءَ رَبُّكَ وَٱلْمَلَكُ صَفًّۭا صَفًّۭا
verses.translation: And your Lord comes, with the angels, row after row.

verses.arabic: وَجِا۟ىٓءَ يَوْمَئِذٍۭ بِجَهَنَّمَ ۚ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ يَتَذَكَّرُ ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ وَأَنَّىٰ لَهُ ٱلذِّكْرَىٰ
verses.translation: And on that Day, Hell is brought forward. On that Day, man will remember, but how will remembrance avail him?

verses.arabic: يَقُولُ يَٰلَيْتَنِى قَدَّمْتُ لِحَيَاتِى
verses.translation: He will say, "If only I had forwarded for my life."

verses.arabic: فَيَوْمَئِذٍۢ لَّا يُعَذِّبُ عَذَابَهُۥٓ أَحَدٌۭ
verses.translation: On that Day, none will punish as He punishes.

verses.arabic: وَلَا يُوثِقُ وَثَاقَهُۥٓ أَحَدٌۭ
verses.translation: And none will shackle as He shackles.

verses.arabic: يَٰٓأَيَّتُهَا ٱلنَّفْسُ ٱلْمُطْمَئِنَّةُ
verses.translation: But as for you, O tranquil soul.

verses.arabic: ٱرْجِعِىٓ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكِ رَاضِيَةًۭ مَّرْضِيَّةًۭ
verses.translation: Return to your Lord, pleased and accepted.

verses.arabic: فَٱدْخُلِى فِى عِبَٰدِى
verses.translation: Enter among My servants.

verses.arabic: وَٱدْخُلِى جَنَّتِى
verses.translation: Enter My Paradise.

verses.arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.translation: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.

verses.arabic: لَآ أُقْسِمُ بِهَٰذَا ٱلْبَلَدِ
verses.translation: I swear by this land.

verses.arabic: وَأَنتَ حِلٌّۢ بِهَٰذَا ٱلْبَلَدِ
verses.translation: And you are a resident of this land.

verses.arabic: وَوَالِدٍۢ وَمَا وَلَدَ
verses.translation: And by a father and what he fathered.

verses.arabic: لَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا ٱلْإِنسَٰنَ فِى كَبَدٍ
verses.translation: We created man in distress.

verses.arabic: أَيَحْسَبُ أَن لَّن يَقْدِرَ عَلَيْهِ أَحَدٌۭ
verses.translation: Does he think that no one has power over him?

verses.arabic: يَقُولُ أَهْلَكْتُ مَالًۭا لُّبَدًا
verses.translation: He says, "I have used up so much money."

verses.arabic: أَيَحْسَبُ أَن لَّمْ يَرَهُۥٓ أَحَدٌ
verses.translation: Does he think that no one sees him?

verses.arabic: أَلَمْ نَجْعَل لَّهُۥ عَيْنَيْنِ
verses.translation: Did We not give him two eyes?

verses.arabic: وَلِسَانًۭا وَشَفَتَيْنِ
verses.translation: And a tongue, and two lips?

verses.arabic: وَهَدَيْنَٰهُ ٱلنَّجْدَيْنِ
verses.translation: And We showed him the two ways?

verses.arabic: فَلَا ٱقْتَحَمَ ٱلْعَقَبَةَ
verses.translation: But he did not brave the ascent.

verses.arabic: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا ٱلْعَقَبَةُ
verses.translation: And what will explain to you what the ascent is?

verses.arabic: فَكُّ رَقَبَةٍ
verses.translation: The freeing of a slave.

verses.arabic: أَوْ إِطْعَٰمٌۭ فِى يَوْمٍۢ ذِى مَسْغَبَةٍۢ
verses.translation: Or the feeding on a day of hunger.

verses.arabic: يَتِيمًۭا ذَا مَقْرَبَةٍ
verses.translation: An orphan near of kin.

verses.arabic: أَوْ مِسْكِينًۭا ذَا مَتْرَبَةٍۢ
verses.translation: Or a destitute in the dust.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ كَانَ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَتَوَاصَوْا۟ بِٱلصَّبْرِ وَتَوَاصَوْا۟ بِٱلْمَرْحَمَةِ
verses.translation: Then he becomes of those who believe, and advise one another to patience, and advise one another to kindness.

verses.arabic: أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ أَصْحَٰبُ ٱلْمَيْمَنَةِ
verses.translation: These are the people of happiness.

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا هُمْ أَصْحَٰبُ ٱلْمَشْـَٔمَةِ
verses.translation: But as for those who defy Our revelations-these are the people of misery.

verses.arabic: عَلَيْهِمْ نَارٌۭ مُّؤْصَدَةٌۢ
verses.translation: Upon them is a padlocked Fire.

verses.arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.translation: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.

verses.arabic: وَٱلشَّمْسِ وَضُحَىٰهَا
verses.translation: By the sun and its radiance.

verses.arabic: وَٱلْقَمَرِ إِذَا تَلَىٰهَا
verses.translation: And the moon as it follows it.

verses.arabic: وَٱلنَّهَارِ إِذَا جَلَّىٰهَا
verses.translation: And the day as it reveals it.

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّيْلِ إِذَا يَغْشَىٰهَا
verses.translation: And the night as it conceals it.

verses.arabic: وَٱلسَّمَآءِ وَمَا بَنَىٰهَا
verses.translation: And the sky and He who built it.

verses.arabic: وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا طَحَىٰهَا
verses.translation: And the earth and He who spread it.

verses.arabic: وَنَفْسٍۢ وَمَا سَوَّىٰهَا
verses.translation: And the soul and He who proportioned it.

verses.arabic: فَأَلْهَمَهَا فُجُورَهَا وَتَقْوَىٰهَا
verses.translation: And inspired it with its wickedness and its righteousness.

verses.arabic: قَدْ أَفْلَحَ مَن زَكَّىٰهَا
verses.translation: Successful is he who purifies it.

verses.arabic: وَقَدْ خَابَ مَن دَسَّىٰهَا
verses.translation: Failing is he who corrupts it.

verses.arabic: كَذَّبَتْ ثَمُودُ بِطَغْوَىٰهَآ
verses.translation: Thamood denied in its pride.

verses.arabic: إِذِ ٱنۢبَعَثَ أَشْقَىٰهَا
verses.translation: When it followed its most wicked.

verses.arabic: فَقَالَ لَهُمْ رَسُولُ ٱللَّهِ نَاقَةَ ٱللَّهِ وَسُقْيَٰهَا
verses.translation: The messenger of God said to them, "This is the she-camel of God, so let her drink."

verses.arabic: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَعَقَرُوهَا فَدَمْدَمَ عَلَيْهِمْ رَبُّهُم بِذَنۢبِهِمْ فَسَوَّىٰهَا
verses.translation: But they called him a liar, and hamstrung her. So their Lord crushed them for their sin, and leveled it.

verses.arabic: وَلَا يَخَافُ عُقْبَٰهَا
verses.translation: And He does not fear its sequel.

verses.arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.translation: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّيْلِ إِذَا يَغْشَىٰ
verses.translation: By the night as it covers.

verses.arabic: وَٱلنَّهَارِ إِذَا تَجَلَّىٰ
verses.translation: And the day as it reveals.

verses.arabic: وَمَا خَلَقَ ٱلذَّكَرَ وَٱلْأُنثَىٰٓ
verses.translation: And He who created the male and the female.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ سَعْيَكُمْ لَشَتَّىٰ
verses.translation: Your endeavors are indeed diverse.

verses.arabic: فَأَمَّا مَنْ أَعْطَىٰ وَٱتَّقَىٰ
verses.translation: As for him who gives and is righteous.

verses.arabic: وَصَدَّقَ بِٱلْحُسْنَىٰ
verses.translation: And confirms goodness.

verses.arabic: فَسَنُيَسِّرُهُۥ لِلْيُسْرَىٰ
verses.translation: We will ease his way towards ease.

verses.arabic: وَأَمَّا مَنۢ بَخِلَ وَٱسْتَغْنَىٰ
verses.translation: But as for him who is stingy and complacent.

verses.arabic: وَكَذَّبَ بِٱلْحُسْنَىٰ
verses.translation: And denies goodness.

verses.arabic: فَسَنُيَسِّرُهُۥ لِلْعُسْرَىٰ
verses.translation: We will ease his way towards difficulty.

verses.arabic: وَمَا يُغْنِى عَنْهُ مَالُهُۥٓ إِذَا تَرَدَّىٰٓ
verses.translation: And his money will not avail him when he plummets.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ عَلَيْنَا لَلْهُدَىٰ
verses.translation: It is upon Us to guide.

verses.arabic: وَإِنَّ لَنَا لَلْءَاخِرَةَ وَٱلْأُولَىٰ
verses.translation: And to Us belong the Last and the First.

verses.arabic: فَأَنذَرْتُكُمْ نَارًۭا تَلَظَّىٰ
verses.translation: I have warned you of a Fierce Blaze.

verses.arabic: لَا يَصْلَىٰهَآ إِلَّا ٱلْأَشْقَى
verses.translation: None will burn in it except the very wicked.

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِى كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ
verses.translation: He who denies and turns away.

verses.arabic: وَسَيُجَنَّبُهَا ٱلْأَتْقَى
verses.translation: But the devout will avoid it.

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِى يُؤْتِى مَالَهُۥ يَتَزَكَّىٰ
verses.translation: He who gives his money to become pure.

verses.arabic: وَمَا لِأَحَدٍ عِندَهُۥ مِن نِّعْمَةٍۢ تُجْزَىٰٓ
verses.translation: Seeking no favor in return.

verses.arabic: إِلَّا ٱبْتِغَآءَ وَجْهِ رَبِّهِ ٱلْأَعْلَىٰ
verses.translation: Only seeking the acceptance of his Lord, the Most High.

verses.arabic: وَلَسَوْفَ يَرْضَىٰ
verses.translation: And he will be satisfied.

verses.arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.translation: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.

verses.arabic: وَٱلضُّحَىٰ
verses.translation: By the morning light.

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّيْلِ إِذَا سَجَىٰ
verses.translation: And the night as it settles.

verses.arabic: مَا وَدَّعَكَ رَبُّكَ وَمَا قَلَىٰ
verses.translation: Your Lord did not abandon you, nor did He forget.

verses.arabic: وَلَلْءَاخِرَةُ خَيْرٌۭ لَّكَ مِنَ ٱلْأُولَىٰ
verses.translation: The Hereafter is better for you than the First.

verses.arabic: وَلَسَوْفَ يُعْطِيكَ رَبُّكَ فَتَرْضَىٰٓ
verses.translation: And your Lord will give you, and you will be satisfied.

verses.arabic: أَلَمْ يَجِدْكَ يَتِيمًۭا فَـَٔاوَىٰ
verses.translation: Did He not find you orphaned, and sheltered you?

verses.arabic: وَوَجَدَكَ ضَآلًّۭا فَهَدَىٰ
verses.translation: And found you wandering, and guided you.

verses.arabic: وَوَجَدَكَ عَآئِلًۭا فَأَغْنَىٰ
verses.translation: And found you in need, and enriched you?

verses.arabic: فَأَمَّا ٱلْيَتِيمَ فَلَا تَقْهَرْ
verses.translation: Therefore, do not mistreat the orphan.

verses.arabic: وَأَمَّا ٱلسَّآئِلَ فَلَا تَنْهَرْ
verses.translation: Nor rebuff the seeker.

verses.arabic: وَأَمَّا بِنِعْمَةِ رَبِّكَ فَحَدِّثْ
verses.translation: But proclaim the blessings of your Lord.

verses.arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.translation: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.

verses.arabic: أَلَمْ نَشْرَحْ لَكَ صَدْرَكَ
verses.translation: Did We not soothe your heart?

verses.arabic: وَوَضَعْنَا عَنكَ وِزْرَكَ
verses.translation: And lift from you your burden.

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِىٓ أَنقَضَ ظَهْرَكَ
verses.translation: Which weighed down your back?

verses.arabic: وَرَفَعْنَا لَكَ ذِكْرَكَ
verses.translation: And raised for you your reputation?

verses.arabic: فَإِنَّ مَعَ ٱلْعُسْرِ يُسْرًا
verses.translation: With hardship comes ease.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ مَعَ ٱلْعُسْرِ يُسْرًۭا
verses.translation: With hardship comes ease.

verses.arabic: فَإِذَا فَرَغْتَ فَٱنصَبْ
verses.translation: When your work is done, turn to devotion.

verses.arabic: وَإِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ فَٱرْغَب
verses.translation: And to your Lord turn for everything.

verses.arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.translation: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.

verses.arabic: وَٱلتِّينِ وَٱلزَّيْتُونِ
verses.translation: By the fig and the olive.

verses.arabic: وَطُورِ سِينِينَ
verses.translation: And Mount Sinai.

verses.arabic: وَهَٰذَا ٱلْبَلَدِ ٱلْأَمِينِ
verses.translation: And this safe land.

verses.arabic: لَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا ٱلْإِنسَٰنَ فِىٓ أَحْسَنِ تَقْوِيمٍۢ
verses.translation: We created man in the best design.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ رَدَدْنَٰهُ أَسْفَلَ سَٰفِلِينَ
verses.translation: Then reduced him to the lowest of the low.

verses.arabic: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ فَلَهُمْ أَجْرٌ غَيْرُ مَمْنُونٍۢ
verses.translation: Except those who believe and do righteous deeds; for them is a reward without end.

verses.arabic: فَمَا يُكَذِّبُكَ بَعْدُ بِٱلدِّينِ
verses.translation: So why do you still reject the religion?

verses.arabic: أَلَيْسَ ٱللَّهُ بِأَحْكَمِ ٱلْحَٰكِمِينَ
verses.translation: Is God not the Wisest of the wise?

verses.arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.translation: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.

verses.arabic: ٱقْرَأْ بِٱسْمِ رَبِّكَ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ
verses.translation: Read: In the Name of your Lord who created.

verses.arabic: خَلَقَ ٱلْإِنسَٰنَ مِنْ عَلَقٍ
verses.translation: Created man from a clot.

verses.arabic: ٱقْرَأْ وَرَبُّكَ ٱلْأَكْرَمُ
verses.translation: Read: And your Lord is the Most Generous.

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِى عَلَّمَ بِٱلْقَلَمِ
verses.translation: He who taught by the pen.

verses.arabic: عَلَّمَ ٱلْإِنسَٰنَ مَا لَمْ يَعْلَمْ
verses.translation: Taught man what he never knew.

verses.arabic: كَلَّآ إِنَّ ٱلْإِنسَٰنَ لَيَطْغَىٰٓ
verses.translation: In fact, man oversteps all bounds.

verses.arabic: أَن رَّءَاهُ ٱسْتَغْنَىٰٓ
verses.translation: When he considers himself exempt.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ ٱلرُّجْعَىٰٓ
verses.translation: But to your Lord is the return.

verses.arabic: أَرَءَيْتَ ٱلَّذِى يَنْهَىٰ
verses.translation: Have you seen him who prevents?

verses.arabic: عَبْدًا إِذَا صَلَّىٰٓ
verses.translation: A servant when he prays?

verses.arabic: أَرَءَيْتَ إِن كَانَ عَلَى ٱلْهُدَىٰٓ
verses.translation: Do you think he is upon guidance?

verses.arabic: أَوْ أَمَرَ بِٱلتَّقْوَىٰٓ
verses.translation: Or advocates righteousness?

verses.arabic: أَرَءَيْتَ إِن كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰٓ
verses.translation: Do you see how he disbelieved and turned away?

verses.arabic: أَلَمْ يَعْلَم بِأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَرَىٰ
verses.translation: Does he not know that God sees?

verses.arabic: كَلَّا لَئِن لَّمْ يَنتَهِ لَنَسْفَعًۢا بِٱلنَّاصِيَةِ
verses.translation: No. If he does not desist, We will drag him by the forelock.

verses.arabic: نَاصِيَةٍۢ كَٰذِبَةٍ خَاطِئَةٍۢ
verses.translation: A deceitful, sinful forelock.

verses.arabic: فَلْيَدْعُ نَادِيَهُۥ
verses.translation: Let him call on his gang.

verses.arabic: سَنَدْعُ ٱلزَّبَانِيَةَ
verses.translation: We will call the Guards.

verses.arabic: كَلَّا لَا تُطِعْهُ وَٱسْجُدْ وَٱقْتَرِب ۩
verses.translation: No, do not obey him; but kneel down, and come near.

verses.arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.translation: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.

verses.arabic: إِنَّآ أَنزَلْنَٰهُ فِى لَيْلَةِ ٱلْقَدْرِ
verses.translation: We sent it down on the Night of Decree.

verses.arabic: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا لَيْلَةُ ٱلْقَدْرِ
verses.translation: But what will convey to you what the Night of Decree is?

verses.arabic: لَيْلَةُ ٱلْقَدْرِ خَيْرٌۭ مِّنْ أَلْفِ شَهْرٍۢ
verses.translation: The Night of Decree is better than a thousand months.

verses.arabic: تَنَزَّلُ ٱلْمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ وَٱلرُّوحُ فِيهَا بِإِذْنِ رَبِّهِم مِّن كُلِّ أَمْرٍۢ
verses.translation: In it descend the angels and the Spirit, by the leave of their Lord, with every command.

verses.arabic: سَلَٰمٌ هِىَ حَتَّىٰ مَطْلَعِ ٱلْفَجْرِ
verses.translation: Peace it is; until the rise of dawn.

verses.arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.translation: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.

verses.arabic: لَمْ يَكُنِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِنْ أَهْلِ ٱلْكِتَٰبِ وَٱلْمُشْرِكِينَ مُنفَكِّينَ حَتَّىٰ تَأْتِيَهُمُ ٱلْبَيِّنَةُ
verses.translation: Those who disbelieved among the People of the Scripture, and the Polytheists, were not apart, until the Clear Evidence came to them.

verses.arabic: رَسُولٌۭ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ يَتْلُوا۟ صُحُفًۭا مُّطَهَّرَةًۭ
verses.translation: A messenger from God reciting purified scripts.

verses.arabic: فِيهَا كُتُبٌۭ قَيِّمَةٌۭ
verses.translation: In them are valuable writings.

verses.arabic: وَمَا تَفَرَّقَ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُوا۟ ٱلْكِتَٰبَ إِلَّا مِنۢ بَعْدِ مَا جَآءَتْهُمُ ٱلْبَيِّنَةُ
verses.translation: Those who were given the Scripture did not splinter, except after the Clear Evidence came to them.

verses.arabic: وَمَآ أُمِرُوٓا۟ إِلَّا لِيَعْبُدُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ مُخْلِصِينَ لَهُ ٱلدِّينَ حُنَفَآءَ وَيُقِيمُوا۟ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَيُؤْتُوا۟ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ ۚ وَذَٰلِكَ دِينُ ٱلْقَيِّمَةِ
verses.translation: They were commanded only to worship God, devoting their faith to Him alone, and to practice regular prayer, and to give alms. That is the upright religion.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِنْ أَهْلِ ٱلْكِتَٰبِ وَٱلْمُشْرِكِينَ فِى نَارِ جَهَنَّمَ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ ۚ أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ هُمْ شَرُّ ٱلْبَرِيَّةِ
verses.translation: Those who disbelieve among the People of the Scripture, and the Polytheists, will be in the Fire of Hell, where they will abide forever. These are the worst of creatures.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ هُمْ خَيْرُ ٱلْبَرِيَّةِ
verses.translation: As for those who believe and lead a righteous life-these are the best of creatures.

verses.arabic: جَزَآؤُهُمْ عِندَ رَبِّهِمْ جَنَّٰتُ عَدْنٍۢ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَٰرُ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدًۭا ۖ رَّضِىَ ٱللَّهُ عَنْهُمْ وَرَضُوا۟ عَنْهُ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ لِمَنْ خَشِىَ رَبَّهُۥ
verses.translation: Their reward is with their Lord: Gardens of Eternity beneath which rivers flow, where they will abide forever. God is pleased with them, and they are pleased with Him. That is for whoever fears His Lord.

verses.arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.translation: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.

verses.arabic: إِذَا زُلْزِلَتِ ٱلْأَرْضُ زِلْزَالَهَا
verses.translation: When the earth is shaken with its quake.

verses.arabic: وَأَخْرَجَتِ ٱلْأَرْضُ أَثْقَالَهَا
verses.translation: And the earth brings out its loads.

verses.arabic: وَقَالَ ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ مَا لَهَا
verses.translation: And man says, "What is the matter with it?"

verses.arabic: يَوْمَئِذٍۢ تُحَدِّثُ أَخْبَارَهَا
verses.translation: On that Day, it will tell its tales.

verses.arabic: بِأَنَّ رَبَّكَ أَوْحَىٰ لَهَا
verses.translation: For your Lord will have inspired it.

verses.arabic: يَوْمَئِذٍۢ يَصْدُرُ ٱلنَّاسُ أَشْتَاتًۭا لِّيُرَوْا۟ أَعْمَٰلَهُمْ
verses.translation: On that Day, the people will emerge in droves, to be shown their works.

verses.arabic: فَمَن يَعْمَلْ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ خَيْرًۭا يَرَهُۥ
verses.translation: Whoever has done an atom's weight of good will see it.

verses.arabic: وَمَن يَعْمَلْ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍۢ شَرًّۭا يَرَهُۥ
verses.translation: And whoever has done an atom's weight of evil will see it.

verses.arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.translation: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.

verses.arabic: وَٱلْعَٰدِيَٰتِ ضَبْحًۭا
verses.translation: By the racers panting.

verses.arabic: فَٱلْمُورِيَٰتِ قَدْحًۭا
verses.translation: Igniting sparks.

verses.arabic: فَٱلْمُغِيرَٰتِ صُبْحًۭا
verses.translation: Raiding at dawn.

verses.arabic: فَأَثَرْنَ بِهِۦ نَقْعًۭا
verses.translation: Raising clouds of dust.

verses.arabic: فَوَسَطْنَ بِهِۦ جَمْعًا
verses.translation: Storming into the midst.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلْإِنسَٰنَ لِرَبِّهِۦ لَكَنُودٌۭ
verses.translation: Indeed, the human being is ungrateful to his Lord.

verses.arabic: وَإِنَّهُۥ عَلَىٰ ذَٰلِكَ لَشَهِيدٌۭ
verses.translation: And he bears witness to that.

verses.arabic: وَإِنَّهُۥ لِحُبِّ ٱلْخَيْرِ لَشَدِيدٌ
verses.translation: And he is fierce in his love of wealth.

verses.arabic: ۞ أَفَلَا يَعْلَمُ إِذَا بُعْثِرَ مَا فِى ٱلْقُبُورِ
verses.translation: Does he not know? When the contents of the graves are scattered around.

verses.arabic: وَحُصِّلَ مَا فِى ٱلصُّدُورِ
verses.translation: And the contents of the hearts are obtained.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ رَبَّهُم بِهِمْ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ لَّخَبِيرٌۢ
verses.translation: Their Lord, on that Day, is fully informed of them.

verses.arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.translation: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.

verses.arabic: ٱلْقَارِعَةُ
verses.translation: The Shocker.

verses.arabic: مَا ٱلْقَارِعَةُ
verses.translation: What is the Shocker?

verses.arabic: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا ٱلْقَارِعَةُ
verses.translation: What will explain to you what the Shocker is?

verses.arabic: يَوْمَ يَكُونُ ٱلنَّاسُ كَٱلْفَرَاشِ ٱلْمَبْثُوثِ
verses.translation: The Day when the people will be like scattered moths.

verses.arabic: وَتَكُونُ ٱلْجِبَالُ كَٱلْعِهْنِ ٱلْمَنفُوشِ
verses.translation: And the mountains will be like tufted wool.

verses.arabic: فَأَمَّا مَن ثَقُلَتْ مَوَٰزِينُهُۥ
verses.translation: As for he whose scales are heavy.

verses.arabic: فَهُوَ فِى عِيشَةٍۢ رَّاضِيَةٍۢ
verses.translation: He will be in a pleasant life.

verses.arabic: وَأَمَّا مَنْ خَفَّتْ مَوَٰزِينُهُۥ
verses.translation: But as for he whose scales are light.

verses.arabic: فَأُمُّهُۥ هَاوِيَةٌۭ
verses.translation: His home is the Abyss.

verses.arabic: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا هِيَهْ
verses.translation: Do you know what it is?

verses.arabic: نَارٌ حَامِيَةٌۢ
verses.translation: A Raging Fire.

verses.arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.translation: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.

verses.arabic: أَلْهَىٰكُمُ ٱلتَّكَاثُرُ
verses.translation: Abundance distracts you.

verses.arabic: حَتَّىٰ زُرْتُمُ ٱلْمَقَابِرَ
verses.translation: Until you visit the graveyards.

verses.arabic: كَلَّا سَوْفَ تَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: Indeed, you will know.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ كَلَّا سَوْفَ تَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: Certainly, you will know.

verses.arabic: كَلَّا لَوْ تَعْلَمُونَ عِلْمَ ٱلْيَقِينِ
verses.translation: If you knew with knowledge of certainty.

verses.arabic: لَتَرَوُنَّ ٱلْجَحِيمَ
verses.translation: You would see the Inferno.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ لَتَرَوُنَّهَا عَيْنَ ٱلْيَقِينِ
verses.translation: Then you will see it with the eye of certainty.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ لَتُسْـَٔلُنَّ يَوْمَئِذٍ عَنِ ٱلنَّعِيمِ
verses.translation: Then, on that Day, you will be questioned about the Bliss.

verses.arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.translation: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.

verses.arabic: وَٱلْعَصْرِ
verses.translation: By time.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلْإِنسَٰنَ لَفِى خُسْرٍ
verses.translation: The human being is in loss.

verses.arabic: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ وَتَوَاصَوْا۟ بِٱلْحَقِّ وَتَوَاصَوْا۟ بِٱلصَّبْرِ
verses.translation: Except those who believe, and do good works, and encourage truth, and recommend patience.

verses.arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.translation: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.

verses.arabic: وَيْلٌۭ لِّكُلِّ هُمَزَةٍۢ لُّمَزَةٍ
verses.translation: Woe to every slanderer backbiter.

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِى جَمَعَ مَالًۭا وَعَدَّدَهُۥ
verses.translation: Who gathers wealth and counts it over.

verses.arabic: يَحْسَبُ أَنَّ مَالَهُۥٓ أَخْلَدَهُۥ
verses.translation: Thinking that his wealth has made him immortal.

verses.arabic: كَلَّا ۖ لَيُنۢبَذَنَّ فِى ٱلْحُطَمَةِ
verses.translation: By no means. He will be thrown into the Crusher.

verses.arabic: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا ٱلْحُطَمَةُ
verses.translation: And what will make you realize what the Crusher is?

verses.arabic: نَارُ ٱللَّهِ ٱلْمُوقَدَةُ
verses.translation: God's kindled Fire.

verses.arabic: ٱلَّتِى تَطَّلِعُ عَلَى ٱلْأَفْـِٔدَةِ
verses.translation: That laps to the hearts.

verses.arabic: إِنَّهَا عَلَيْهِم مُّؤْصَدَةٌۭ
verses.translation: It closes in on them.

verses.arabic: فِى عَمَدٍۢ مُّمَدَّدَةٍۭ
verses.translation: In extended columns.

verses.arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.translation: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.

verses.arabic: أَلَمْ تَرَ كَيْفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِأَصْحَٰبِ ٱلْفِيلِ
verses.translation: Have you not considered how your Lord dealt with the People of the Elephant?

verses.arabic: أَلَمْ يَجْعَلْ كَيْدَهُمْ فِى تَضْلِيلٍۢ
verses.translation: Did He not make their plan go wrong?

verses.arabic: وَأَرْسَلَ عَلَيْهِمْ طَيْرًا أَبَابِيلَ
verses.translation: He sent against them swarms of birds.

verses.arabic: تَرْمِيهِم بِحِجَارَةٍۢ مِّن سِجِّيلٍۢ
verses.translation: Throwing at them rocks of baked clay.

verses.arabic: فَجَعَلَهُمْ كَعَصْفٍۢ مَّأْكُولٍۭ
verses.translation: Leaving them like chewed-up leaves.

verses.arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.translation: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.

verses.arabic: لِإِيلَٰفِ قُرَيْشٍ
verses.translation: For the security of Quraish.

verses.arabic: إِۦلَٰفِهِمْ رِحْلَةَ ٱلشِّتَآءِ وَٱلصَّيْفِ
verses.translation: Their security during winter and summer journeys.

verses.arabic: فَلْيَعْبُدُوا۟ رَبَّ هَٰذَا ٱلْبَيْتِ
verses.translation: Let them worship the Lord of this House.

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِىٓ أَطْعَمَهُم مِّن جُوعٍۢ وَءَامَنَهُم مِّنْ خَوْفٍۭ
verses.translation: Who has fed them against hunger, and has secured them against fear.

verses.arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.translation: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.

verses.arabic: أَرَءَيْتَ ٱلَّذِى يُكَذِّبُ بِٱلدِّينِ
verses.translation: Have you considered him who denies the religion?

verses.arabic: فَذَٰلِكَ ٱلَّذِى يَدُعُّ ٱلْيَتِيمَ
verses.translation: It is he who mistreats the orphan.

verses.arabic: وَلَا يَحُضُّ عَلَىٰ طَعَامِ ٱلْمِسْكِينِ
verses.translation: And does not encourage the feeding of the poor.

verses.arabic: فَوَيْلٌۭ لِّلْمُصَلِّينَ
verses.translation: So woe to those who pray.

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ عَن صَلَاتِهِمْ سَاهُونَ
verses.translation: Those who are heedless of their prayers.

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ يُرَآءُونَ
verses.translation: Those who put on the appearance.

verses.arabic: وَيَمْنَعُونَ ٱلْمَاعُونَ
verses.translation: And withhold the assistance.

verses.arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.translation: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.

verses.arabic: إِنَّآ أَعْطَيْنَٰكَ ٱلْكَوْثَرَ
verses.translation: We have given you plenty.

verses.arabic: فَصَلِّ لِرَبِّكَ وَٱنْحَرْ
verses.translation: So pray to your Lord and sacrifice.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ شَانِئَكَ هُوَ ٱلْأَبْتَرُ
verses.translation: He who hates you is the loser.

verses.arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.translation: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.

verses.arabic: قُلْ يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلْكَٰفِرُونَ
verses.translation: Say, "O disbelievers.

verses.arabic: لَآ أَعْبُدُ مَا تَعْبُدُونَ
verses.translation: I do not worship what you worship.

verses.arabic: وَلَآ أَنتُمْ عَٰبِدُونَ مَآ أَعْبُدُ
verses.translation: Nor do you worship what I worship.

verses.arabic: وَلَآ أَنَا۠ عَابِدٌۭ مَّا عَبَدتُّمْ
verses.translation: Nor do I serve what you serve.

verses.arabic: وَلَآ أَنتُمْ عَٰبِدُونَ مَآ أَعْبُدُ
verses.translation: Nor do you serve what I serve.

verses.arabic: لَكُمْ دِينُكُمْ وَلِىَ دِينِ
verses.translation: You have your way, and I have my way."

verses.arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.translation: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.

verses.arabic: إِذَا جَآءَ نَصْرُ ٱللَّهِ وَٱلْفَتْحُ
verses.translation: When there comes God's victory, and conquest.

verses.arabic: وَرَأَيْتَ ٱلنَّاسَ يَدْخُلُونَ فِى دِينِ ٱللَّهِ أَفْوَاجًۭا
verses.translation: And you see the people entering God's religion in multitudes.

verses.arabic: فَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ وَٱسْتَغْفِرْهُ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ تَوَّابًۢا
verses.translation: Then celebrate the praise of your Lord, and seek His forgiveness. He is the Accepter of Repentance.

verses.arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.translation: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.

verses.arabic: تَبَّتْ يَدَآ أَبِى لَهَبٍۢ وَتَبَّ
verses.translation: Condemned are the hands of Abee Lahab, and he is condemned.

verses.arabic: مَآ أَغْنَىٰ عَنْهُ مَالُهُۥ وَمَا كَسَبَ
verses.translation: His wealth did not avail him, nor did what he acquired.

verses.arabic: سَيَصْلَىٰ نَارًۭا ذَاتَ لَهَبٍۢ
verses.translation: He will burn in a Flaming Fire.

verses.arabic: وَٱمْرَأَتُهُۥ حَمَّالَةَ ٱلْحَطَبِ
verses.translation: And his wife-the firewood carrier.

verses.arabic: فِى جِيدِهَا حَبْلٌۭ مِّن مَّسَدٍۭ
verses.translation: Around her neck is a rope of thorns.

verses.arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.translation: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.

verses.arabic: قُلْ هُوَ ٱللَّهُ أَحَدٌ
verses.translation: Say, "He is God, the One.

verses.arabic: ٱللَّهُ ٱلصَّمَدُ
verses.translation: God, the Absolute.

verses.arabic: لَمْ يَلِدْ وَلَمْ يُولَدْ
verses.translation: He begets not, nor was He begotten.

verses.arabic: وَلَمْ يَكُن لَّهُۥ كُفُوًا أَحَدٌۢ
verses.translation: And there is nothing comparable to Him."

verses.arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.translation: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.

verses.arabic: قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ ٱلْفَلَقِ
verses.translation: Say, "I take refuge with the Lord of Daybreak.

verses.arabic: مِن شَرِّ مَا خَلَقَ
verses.translation: From the evil of what He created.

verses.arabic: وَمِن شَرِّ غَاسِقٍ إِذَا وَقَبَ
verses.translation: And from the evil of the darkness as it gathers.

verses.arabic: وَمِن شَرِّ ٱلنَّفَّٰثَٰتِ فِى ٱلْعُقَدِ
verses.translation: And from the evil of those who practice sorcery.

verses.arabic: وَمِن شَرِّ حَاسِدٍ إِذَا حَسَدَ
verses.translation: And from the evil of an envious when he envies."

verses.arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.translation: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.

verses.arabic: قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ ٱلنَّاسِ
verses.translation: Say, "I seek refuge in the Lord of mankind.

verses.arabic: مَلِكِ ٱلنَّاسِ
verses.translation: The King of mankind.

verses.arabic: إِلَٰهِ ٱلنَّاسِ
verses.translation: The God of mankind.

verses.arabic: مِن شَرِّ ٱلْوَسْوَاسِ ٱلْخَنَّاسِ
verses.translation: From the evil of the sneaky whisperer.

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِى يُوَسْوِسُ فِى صُدُورِ ٱلنَّاسِ
verses.translation: Who whispers into the hearts of people.

verses.arabic: مِنَ ٱلْجِنَّةِ وَٱلنَّاسِ
verses.translation: From among jinn and among people."
